story:
Gozie Fogger in action in a typical aeroponic system called the "Smoking Aeroponics"  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d6kLNZ2QnT0 

" Healthy plant, Healthy food, Good Nutrition, Good Health =LONGER LIFE "

As we all know, land is getting short insupply. Good nutrition starts with good food. Good food is from good plants. Your plant is what you feed it with and the overall growth is largely dependent on the medium and nutrient. Presently, indoor gardening is taking a ceter stage and as we strive for a better way of growing plants indoor without soil, aeroponics and hydroponic systems became alternative approach to the issue.

Gozie -Fogger is a machine that is attached to Aeroponic and Hydroponic systems. When attached to the systems nutrient reservoir and plant chambers,Gozie-Fogger converts nutrient solution into a gasous state and pushes it into the plants' root system to feed the plants therby making it easy for the plant to absorb the nutrient. The food is easily and quickly absorbed and utilized than through a conventional reservoir liquid nutrient feed.This is the gardening of the future. See Gozie Fogger in action in a typical aeroponic system called the "Smoking Aeroponics"  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d6kLNZ2QnT0  The fog produced by my machine is high enough to feed both the pant root and the foliage  resulting in a speedy growth and high yield.

Gozie-Fogger combined with Aero-Gozie or other aeroponic systems make a unique machine and has no other system which could be paralled to it. GozieFogger and Aero-Gozie aree hybrid of all aero systems in the universe today.

Gozie Fogger  is a machine which breaks down nutrients into gasous state and transport to the plants root system. It also feeds the plants foliage and can speed-up growth upto 50% .  

Gozie-Fogger is affordable and will change the way people approach indoor gardening. It is user friendly and can deliver upto 500ml/hr of fog. It is made for both the hobbiest and the professional gardeners alike. A turn around in a controlled environment gardening. 

I am seeking $10000 as a fraction of the fund required to help create the final molds, start production and market the new products. This capital will be invested throughout  manufacturing process of these machines. I am confident that my company will properly utilize this fund to maximize production.

I will be very appreciative if this community of friends will give me a solid 100% support for this project. Get onboard, join the crowd and make this happen. 

See Gozie-Fogger in You Tube:  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=d6kLNZ2QnT0   


Thanks

story:
Voter Power Over Internet (VPOI)

Politicians, Can you Hear Me Now?

We're raising a little money for an Internet protocol to manage politicians. Couldn't be simpler ;-)

You know what Skype is, and you don't need to know what made it possible: Voice Over Internet Protocol. "VOIP" is a big deal because it made long distance calls free. That’s a big reason why 21st century Americans see the world differently than their parents.

Voter Power Over Internet, "VPOI", aims to help 21st century politicians see their world differently. Here's how:

A mapping genius figured out something amazing. Starting with 51,231 US jurisdictions*, he figured out how to generate a single hashtag, like #PZCA191527san-jose03, that IDs all your politicians from your school district to the President.

______________________________________________________________________
*every state & U.S. legislative district, county, city and unified school district

VPOI will turn any U.S. residence into a Voter's Command Post so politicians know how to earn the home's votes. And then VPOI throws away your address! 

  • VPOI gives you a Power Zone hashtag, like #PZCA191527san-jose03
  • So your politicians know that your tagged messages matter. 
  • #PZ tags can be tracked for each of the 6 - 20 politicians who work for you.

So the Internet can tell your politicians what you're thinking about, without you having to think about telling them. 

VPOI will make complaining useful 
Complain, suggest, cajole, gripe as much as you want. Use any account or handle you want. When we put VPOI in place, your #PZ tag will alert your politicians that a real constituent isn't taking it quietly any more.
Will your politicians still ignore their voters? Maybe.
  • But everyone will see it as it happens: how many, where, how much, how bad.
Once we get their attention, we can crowd-source policy like we fix bugs at GitHub.  
VPOI hides your real name and address, but shows everybody your Power Zone: the area you live in that shows your politicians you matter and they need to listen. No real name or address required.

What VPOI will be:

  • Privacy protection for Policy Protectors

  • Constituents verified by a trusted 3rd party, by jurisdiction

What VPOI will support:

  • Dedicated social networks for people in the same power zone.
  • Dedicated social networks for every politician.
  • Dedicated social networks for every issue.
  • Custom reports to politicians:
    • How many of your voters support which issues?
    • What tweets in your district support which issues?
    • What Facebook posts in your district support which issues?

What VPOI will not be
  • Voting on the Internet
  • An NSA program
  • A Do Not Track widget

Case Study: Where does your daughter live?

One of us has a daughter and 2 grandkids whose identity he wants to protect. But he's happy to share her Voter Power map and her VPOI tag:

#PZCA191527san-jose03

#PZCA191527san-jose03 is a mashup of:
  • California
  • California's 19th Congressional District
  • CA State Senate 15th District
  • CA State Assembly 27th District
  • San Jose 3rd City Council District
  • Santa Clara County
  • San Jose Unified School District
Who Cares about your daughter's Power Zone? These people:
  • Governor Jerry Brown
  • US Senator Diane Feinstein
  • US Senator Barbara Boxer
  • US Representative Zoe Lofgren
  • CA State Senator Jerry Beall
  • CA State Assembly Member Nora Campos
  • San Jose Mayor Sam Liccardo
  • San Jose City Council Member Raul Peralez
  • Santa Clara County Commissioners
  • San Jose Unified School District Board
The 18 People Who Work for #PZCA191527san-jose03


Not bad for a free and open web service. Everybody in #PZCA191527san-jose03 has the same politicians, so they can get together to fix problems together. 
Who we are 
  • We're some of the people active in the Internet Identity Workshop. 
  • We support personal privacy and anonymity.
  • We want to tell our politicians what we want, everywhere we say it.
  • Everybody online has hidden political power so we're unhiding the power.  
We are:
Craig Burton, Britt Blaser,  Phil Windley, Cheryl Snapp Conner, Braden Mackke, Paul Gustafson, Brian Blaser, and many more.
Technology has always played a role in US Presidential elections
The Internet has had a profound change on every aspect of the economy, society, advertising and business. It is about to have the same level of impact on politics.
The Printing Press
Since the Revolution to the 1800s, the main form of communication for candidates to address constituents was the newspaper. In face, candidates before Lincoln seldom spoke or did any campaigning. It was done in the papers by the writers for each party.
The Locomotive
Lincoln was the first candidate to travel the US extensively speaking about his election. From then until the 1940s, the train was the technology used for candidates to address voters.
The Radio
In the early 1900s, the radio was invented. Soon the radio became the technology used for addressing voters.
The Television
Since the 1960s until now. the television became the main technology for candidates addressing voters. Who can forget Kennedy's television snippits and his assassination? Or Bush's talk about the war on terrorism?
BYOD
There are 311 million people in the US. 65% of those people own smartphones. VPOI gives the power to the voter to join communities together to address common issues and make known what is wanted to politicians in no uncertain and certifiable terms by real constituents. Any device with a browser can participate.
Join Us
Join us in building a framework for constituents to band together and have a voice with power that can truly change the future of politics.

story:
NextDrive Plug is now available on Amazon!!




                                    

You have plenty of USB devices and even though smartphones are convenient, the two haven’t been compatible. Now, thanks to NextDrive IoT technology, your favorite USB devices can wirelessly connect to your smartphone in seconds.

 

The NextDrive Plug may look like a simple plug, but it’s actually a micro IoT computer. Simply plug your USB device into the NextDrive Plug, download the NextDrive Connect App to your smartphone, tablet or laptop, and in moments easily connect it wirelessly to your USB device. No matter wherever you are, as long as you have an internet connection, you can access your NextDrive Plug!


Learn more about the NextDrive Plug!





Personal Cloud / NAS

Create your own personal cloud to auto-backup photos, presentations and other pertinent files. Collecting and sharing with family, friends and co-workers has never been easier!

Unlimited Capacity

The storage capacity of your personal cloud is only limited by the size of the USB hard drive you connect! NextDrive supports up to 6TB single HDDs or 24TB RAIDs. No monthly fees required!






Remote Wireless Camera

Keep an eye on the things you cherish.

Connect a webcam to the NextDrive Plug to create a simple home serveillence system. Wherever you are, you can make sure your home, pets and valuables are safe.






Music Streaming

Stream and save music from your collection of favorite CDs. Connect a CD-ROM to your NextDrive Plug and stream music directly to your smartphone. Better yet - save your favorite songs as MP3s directly to your phone wirelessly, while you are on-the-go! Or, if you prefer, have your NextDrive plug save songs to an HDD connected to another Plug to create an entire digital copy of your music collection that you can access from anywhere, anytime!



 




The NextDrive Plug is powered by “Link2” P2P technology and works on Wi-Fi networks. To initialize settings, first associate your phone with your NextDrive Plug, and join the Plug to your local Wi-Fi network. After that, USB devices plugged into the NextDrive Plug will automatically become wireless and can be accessed via the app on your mobile device at any time, from anywhere with an internet connection.




Download NextDrive Connect APP


  1.  Plug the NextDrive Plug into a power outlet. Open the App and it will automatically find your NextDrive Plug.
  2.  Setup the Plug’s admin password.
  3.  Add your NextDrive Plug to your local Wi-Fi network.




Plug a compatible USB device into the NextDrive Plug and use it.

For security reasons, the NextDrive Plug and your smartphone need to be close to each other during association. If you would like to share your NextDrive Plug with your family or friends, they will first also need to associate their phones with your NextDrive Plug. Unauthorized phones are unable to connect to any NextDrive Plug at any time.







The NextDrive Plug can only be accessed by authorized devices, and all data transfers are secured and authenticated by bank-level security mechanisms and encryption chips. Unlike cloud storage services that require an ID registration, 

your personal data is stored only on your USB hard drive located in your home with multiple levels of security protection. If for any reason you notice suspicious activity – all you have to do is unplug your NextDrive Plug to prevent hacking.












‧What is the design concept of the NextDrive Plug？
The NextDrive Plug looks like a simple plug, but it actually a micro IoT computer. It makes existing USB devices wireless and connect to your smart phone, wherever you are. For example, if you connect a hard drive to the NextDrive Plug, you can get a personal cloud immediately.

‧What is the difference between the NextDrive Plug and those smart plugs which can control fans or lights?
The smart plugs control fans or lights function as the timer or remote controller of home appliance.

‧What's in the box? What if I need an optional EU/UK/AU type adapter?

The NextDrive Plug, AC Plug Adaptor (US Standard), Quick Start Guide.

We offer optional EU type adapter for $1, please add an additional adapter perk to your order. The UK and AU type adapters are currently not available. 

‧What color do you offer?
Black. If the fund reaches the $100,000 stretch goal, we will be able to provide several different colors for you choice. This special offer is for Indiegogo only.

‧Do you plan to make multi-port product?
We might have multi-port product in the future. However, the timing is not confirmed yet. If you need more than two ports, we suggest you use two NextDrive Plug in order to get maximum flexibility.



‧Which webcams are compatible with the NextDrive Plug?

The NextDrive Plug supports UVC protocol. Click here to view the list.

‧Which hard drives are compatible with the NextDrive Plug?
The NextDrive Plug supports many popular file systems, including FAT, FAT32, NTFS, EXT4, HFS, HFS+. exFAT is a Microsoft - patented file system that is not currently supported by the NextDrive Plug.

‧Which of thumb drives are compatible with the NextDrive Plug?
The NextDrive Plug supports most of the thumb drives that do not require drivers. Compatible file systems include FAT, FAT32, NTFS, EXT4, HFS and HFS+.

‧Does it support hub?
The NextDrive Plug currently does not support hub.

‧Does the NextDrive Plug have built-in memory?
No.


‧How many people can access the NextDrive Plug simultaneously?
We suggest don't allow too many people to access one NextDrive Plug for large files simultaneously or it will slow down the transfer speed.

‧How do I turn-off the NextDrive Plug?
Unplug the NextDrive Plug from the power outlet or use the power outlet's with switches.

‧When will the NextDrive Connect be ready to download?
The latest NextDrive Connect app with the auto-backup photo function will be updated in October 2015.

‧What do I need in order to use the NextDrive Plug?
1. Smartphone, or tablet, or PC
2. A Wi-Fi network - If you would like to access the Plug remotely, build a closed system without a Wi-Fi network.

‧How fast is the file transfer speed?
The transfer speed of the NextDrive Plug is dependent upon the Internet speed. The bottleneck is the Wi-Fi network combined with NextDrive Plug and the connection status  between smartphone and NextDrive Plug.

‧How do I set up the NextDrive Plug?
Please ensure the OS of your smartphone or tablet is iOS 7.0 (or higher) / Android 4.0 (or higher). Then, please refer to the "Quickstart Guide" to finish the setup.

‧Is the NextDrive Plug portable? Can I use it without internet?
Yes. You can bring the NextDrive Plug with you as long as there is a power source. With “Direct Link” mode, the NextDrive Plug can be connected to your phone even without an Internet connection.


‧When will the NextDrive Plug ship?

We have finished the NextDrive Plug’s hardware and app design and have passed all required certifications. The Production will take anywhere from  takes about 3-4 weeks and product will ship in October 2015.

‧Where do you ship?
The NextDrive Plug is available in the US, Canada, the EU, Norway, Switzerland, Australia, New Zealand, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Vietnam, Indonesia, Thailand, Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Peru and Mexico. Free shipping is available to the US, Hong Kong and Taiwan.

‧Is shipping included?
Free shipping is available to the US, Hong Kong and Taiwan. For all international orders, an additional shipping fee will be charged. Please select a perk and enter your address, the system will add the shipping fee to your perk automatically.

‧Do I have to pay VAT?
We will pay customs and VAT if applicable, however you are making a contribution and receiving a NextDrive Plug as a gift and should not have to pay VAT.

‧Do I need to pay for tariff?
If you are outside the US and Taiwan, there might be custom tariff. Please note that you are solely responsible for any taxes, duties, fees and/or surcharges that your country may impose on the ordered products.

‧Can I split a bulk order into multiple shipments?
For all questions regarding bulk orders, please email contact@nextdrive.io and use "BULK ORDER INQUIRY" as the subject line.


‧Is there a warranty for the NextDrive Plug?
Of course. The NextDrive Plug comes with a one-year limited liability warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.

‧I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?
Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, then you may need to contact support@indiegogo.com.

‧Can I get a refund?
Pre-orders are non-refundable. By making a contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are contributing to a work-in-progress and not making a direct purchase. For more details please see Indiegogo's Terms of Use.

‧There was an error with my contribution. What happened?
Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.

‧I don’t see my answer here. Who do I contact?
Please email to contact@nextdrive.io.We will get back to you as soon as possible.

‧I'm a member of the press. Who do I contact?
We encourage you to use our images and video as long as you credit the NextDrive Plug and link to http://www.nextdrive.io

For US/UK press, contact Kiersten von Grimmenstein at kiersten@blastmedia.com. All other inquires email connect@nextdrive.io.


Legal Disclaimer
"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

You can bring the NextDrive Plug with you as long as there is a power source. With “Direct Link” mode, the NextDrive Plug can be connected to your phone even without an Internet connection.




‧When will the NextDrive Plug ship?

We have finished the NextDrive Plug’s hardware and app design and have passed all required certifications. The Production will take anywhere from  takes about 3-4 weeks and product will ship in October 2015. ‧Where do you ship?The NextDrive Plug is available in the US, Canada, the EU, Norway, Switzerland, Australia, New Zealand, Taiwan, Hong Kong, Singapore, Malaysia, Vietnam, Indonesia, Thailand, Brazil, Argentina, Chile, Peru and Mexico. Free shipping is available to the US, Hong Kong and Taiwan. ‧Is shipping included?Free shipping is available to the US, Hong Kong and Taiwan. For all international orders, an additional shipping fee will be charged. Please select a perk and enter your address, the system will add the shipping fee to your perk automatically.‧Do I have to pay VAT?We will pay customs and VAT if applicable, however you are making a contribution and receiving a NextDrive Plug as a gift and should not have to pay VAT.‧Do I need to pay for tariff?If you are outside the US and Taiwan, there might be custom tariff. Please note that you are solely responsible for any taxes, duties, fees and/or surcharges that your country may impose on the ordered products.‧Can I split a bulk order into multiple shipments?For all questions regarding bulk orders, please email contact@nextdrive.io and use "BULK ORDER INQUIRY" as the subject line.













‧Is there a warranty for the NextDrive Plug?Of course. The NextDrive Plug comes with a one-year limited liability warranty that protects you against manufacturing defects.‧I didn’t get a confirmation email. How can I check the status?Please refer to this article on How to Check if Your Contribution is Successful. If there is still an issue, then you may need to contact support@indiegogo.com. ‧Can I get a refund?Pre-orders are non-refundable. By making a contribution to this campaign, you acknowledge that you understand that you are contributing to a work-in-progress and not making a direct purchase. For more details please see Indiegogo's Terms of Use.‧There was an error with my contribution. What happened?Please refer to this article on common contribution errors and steps to resolve: Common Contribution Errors.‧I don’t see my answer here. Who do I contact?Please email to contact@nextdrive.io.We will get back to you as soon as possible.‧I'm a member of the press. Who do I contact?We encourage you to use our images and video as long as you credit the NextDrive Plug and link to http://www.nextdrive.io 
For US/UK press, contact Kiersten von Grimmenstein at kiersten@blastmedia.com. All other inquires email connect@nextdrive.io.











Legal Disclaimer"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

story:
Please see our third party review of ShiftCam by Appsolutely Tech
 



SHIFTCAM is a 6-in-1 high quality mobile lens case that you can switch between them with just a flick. You can have all lenses around you so that your creativity will not be limited by the camera while using your iPhone 7 plus.

All-In-One Lens Attachment

 No more tiny glasses crumbled in your pocket ​

SHIFTCAM is the world’s first 6 in 1 dual lens case offers an all-in-one solution for iPhone 7 Plus. With SHIFTCAM, You no longer need to carry a bag of lenses in your pocket, or worry about forgetting to bring it.

Easy to Install and Switch Lens

One finger switching lens, Fast and Easy

SHIFTCAM comprises of a detachable and easy switching lens attachment, that you can install and switch lens at least 10 times faster than any other clip lens attachments in market.

Aligns With Your iPhone's Camera Perfectly

Built-in slide and snap mechanism aligns perfectly with your iPhone’s camera every time

Timing is everything in photography. Once you put SHIFTCAM on your iPhone, you are ready to go at any time and any places. You don't need to waste any second adjusting the lens because SHIFTCAM lenses fit immediately with a flick.

Detailed and Caring Design

This durable case keeps your iPhone safe on photography trips and everyday adventures

SHIFTCAM is much more than just a lens attachment or an iPhone case. It's created with detail-minded and caring designs, such as holding grip and strap, that you can take pictures easily and without a hassle.

SHIFTCAM is slim yet protective with its military shockproof design.




 

 SHIFTCAM's 6-in-1 Lens Set
We are excited to present the above stunning images taken by SHIFTCAM. You can make your phone the best camera at your fingertips.


SHIFTCAM can further improve iPhone 7 Plus's dual lens system, extent the cameras's capabilities, quality and values. Adding 6 additional features on your iPhone allows you to take as many stunning pictures as you can.

 SHIFTCAM comes with 6 optics lenses, a fisheye, wide angle, two for telephoto and two for macro photography.

Switch lens using 1x and 2x

When you pick up an iPhone 7 Plus, it comes along with a great dual lens system: 1X to use the first camera and 2X to use the second. SHIFTCAM expands the feature of switching between lenses with 1X mode and 2X mode. 

Simply tap on the 1X button to switch to 2X lens and tap on it again to switch back to 1X

Slide and Snap

Simply Slide and Snap between 6 exclusive lenses, Fisheye, 2.0X Telephoto, 10X Macro,  20 X Macro, Wide Angle, and Telephoto Lens. Every lenses will serve a purpose for you at every special moment.

Strap Attachment

The Strap attachment is wearable on your wrist so that you can take photos around you easier at anytime and carries it with a peace of mind.


Easy to install with Detachable Lens Set

Simply place SHIFTCAM onto your iPhone 7 Plus and put the 6-in-1 lens attachment on the case. Shift to the lens you want.

Premium Quality Lens for iPhone 7 Plus

SHIFTCAM attaches 6 high-quality lenses to iPhone 7 Plus Dual Lens system. It empowers you and your iPhone to take better pictures in an easier and faster way. 

Easy Switch Lens with 6 Special Effects

  • 120 Degree Wide-angle
  • 2X Telephoto
  • 10X Macro 
  • 20X Macro 
  • 180 Degree Fisheye Lens  
  • 2X Telephoto Lens 

Tapered Grip Designed

Matched with your gesture of holding your phone easier in both horizontal and vertical shooting and provide and strong and comfortable grip. 

 A tiny and slim attachment combines 6 different lenses, including Fisheye lens, Macro lens, Telephoto lens and wide angle lens.










Risks and challenges

We never underestimate the challenges and difficulties of producing a hardware product. As a first time creator, we tried our best to be well prepared for the unforeseen challenges. We have pre-established relationship with our supply partners as our original design manufacturer.

Our target shipping dates start by August, depending on which level you back. We aim to ship earlier as soon as possible and we try our best to make this happen.

story:
Fit both standard outlet and combo switch

Charge 2 tablets or 4 phones

Optional dual Qi wireless module

Switcharger is both simple and practical, converting any wall switch into a charging center, keeping all of your devices in one place. With Switcharger, you no longer need to run a wire from the outlet all the way to your desk.  Instead, you just place your device in the holder when you enter the room, wherever you choose to set up your new charging center.  You no longer need to bend down or crawl under the table to try to reach an outlet.   

Design concept

1. Durability:  The last thing you want is for your phone to fall to the ground and break.  We designed the holder for safety and strength in order to protect your phone when it is charging.

2. Flexibility: Originally, we designed our product to include the combo switch with built-in USB chargers all-in-one. We even applied for a patent on this design, but after rounds of debates and research, we decided to simplify our design by not including these plans, reducing the cost, reducing energy waste, and making the Switcharger more portable.

3. Functionality: The large holder plus the slanted back and divided line in the middle mean that four phones fit easily and comfortably in Switcharger.  The optional wireless module can be installed in the back of the holder, and you may install one or two wireless charging module as you wish.  Three extension outlets can be used for other appliances aside from charging.

Our story

My name is Steve Peng. With the help of my daughter Joycelyn and son Ivan, I invented this innovative device, which provides function and convenience to your daily charging needs.  

Like many of you, we were using a bed-side charger plugged in to a wall outlet every night.  One day, one of the night lights on the wall was accidentally kicked, and the plate broke. As I was thinking where to move the night light, I realized that all the outlets were behind the sofa or a cabinet.  I looked at the wall switch and thought it would be great if there was an available outlet that I could use. After checking Google, I found an existing wall combo switch that could do just that. I ordered it and replace the wall switch with the combo switch.  Simple enough, and the night light had a new home. 

Later, however, I found that my kids had unplugged the night light and instead plugged in their phone charger to charge their phones.  Since there was no place near the switch to put the phone, they just put it on top of the charger.  That's what gave me the idea to make something to hold the phone on top of the charger.  My daughter Joycelyn, who is a talented artist, came up with a nice looking design for the device, and the Switcharger was born. We applied for a patent on our invention and hope that it will bring sanity to people having to charge all of their electronic devices.

What We Need & What You Get

We are currently working with a manufacturer to get the Switcharger out onto store shelves where it belongs. The product is in its final design stage, and we are ready to make the mold.

In order to get our concept into production, we are offering the Switcharger at an early-bird price of $21.  If you instead like the wireless charging function the Qi Switcharger cost is only $35, with dual module, you can wireless charge two phone at the same time.  The family packs are best if you like multiple units!

Please help spreading the word by sharing this invention on your social media platform.

story:
What is Phonechievements?

Phonechievements is an Android app that comes with a list of goals that gives more color to your daily phone usage. The main goal of the app is to give you tiny rewards for using your phone (e.g. send/receive a number of SMS, place a number of calls, keep your phone alive without charging for a given time, have a number of apps installed and many others)

 

Phonechievements can be "used" in different ways: you can just leave it in the background and enjoy when you get an unlock notification or be an achievement hunter and do everything you can to unlock as many as possible. It's up to you.

Besides that, Phonechievements is also social. You can share your accomplishments with friends via Facebook, Twitter or Google +, and you can also sync your progress on an online profile.

The app is FREE an can be found on Google Play. 

The app is free, then WHY raising money?

Well, as you can see in the video I am using an HTC Desire for the app development. Of course there is an emulator but with so many phones and android versions it is very difficult to identify some newer Android versions issues and fix them. The community that enjoys the app wants quality and I would like to provide it, but I need a new Android phone, with the latest version.

Why? Well, statistically most users have Android >= 4.0 and also most of the issues come from these versions.

So, a new phone would help me a lot to debug and quickly fix any reported issues.

More?

If I can get enough funds (for a new phone and some coffee to keep me awake in the night when I develop :) ) I could also get into the iPhone world. If some of you would like to see this on their iOS based devices, I am willing to develop such a version, however, like the Android issue, I would need a phone. So it all depends of your support.

 

There's not much I can offer you but I also added some perks for different amounts.

 

Thanks!

story:
The Selfie Stick Pro is the hands down best way to take great selfies, videos, and group pictures. It works with any smartphone and can be remote controlled from over 30 feet away!

Super light, easy to carry and easily fits in a bag or purse

2 Incredible Ways To Take Photos and Video

The included Tripod makes filming the whole family fun and easy!

Comes in 5 Beautiful Colors

And thanks to my amazing photoshop skills, I've created an entirely new color. Introducing for the very first time ever, the magical color "Bule". Now it may look like a color you're familiar with "blue", but it's completely different. As they say, Bule is the new black.

Features

1. Built-in-Bluetooth,Remote Control Distance is 10m.

2. One-Click Photo,One-Click Switch.

3.Four Shooting Modes: Tripod Mode, Desktop Mode, Handle Mode, Pull Rod Mode.

4. Load Capacity is 3.5KG.

5. Can Enlarge/ Narrow the Focal Length.

6.Small Volume, Light Weight, Easy To Carry.

7.Extendable Length, Suitable For Different Scenes Shooting.

8.Environmental Protection Material, Non-Toxic Harmless, Green Product.

9.Apply To Most Of Photographic Equipment.

Tech Specs

I've been developing and prototyping the Selfie Stick Pro for over 11 months now, and it's finally ready for mass production, but I need your help to make my dream come true! Please help make the Selfie Stick Pro a reality and contribute to my campaign and share this page with your friends. With your help, everyone will be able to take awesome selfies and selfie-videos!



Thanks Indiegogo!

story:
For English version see below  

_____________________________________________________________________________
Beta [bey-tuh ]  climbing jargon that designates information about a climb.


Mijn naam is Arlen Strengers, 27 jaar oud uit Arnhem.

In de 14 jaar als enthousiaste sportklimmer ben ik al ruim 12 jaar actief als routebouwer. In die 12 jaar heb ik gemiddeld zo'n 4-5 routes per maand gebouwd (soms wat minder, soms véél meer).  Dat zijn 48 - 60 routes per jaar en dus 576 - 720 in totaal. uitgaande van 45 grepen per route  heb ik in mijn klimcarrière al flink wat grepen in de wand geschroefd; zo'n 30.000 om precies te zijn.

Het idee om zelf grepen te gaan ontwerpen is een paar jaar geleden ontstaan. soms uit frustratie om slecht ontworpen grepen, maar vaker nog door inspiratie na klim trips.  2 jaar geleden ben ik begonnen te experimenteren met verschillende materialen en technieken. Nu is de tijd rijp om de volgende stap te zetten.

Door mijn ervaring als (wedstrijd)routebouwer heb ik ondertussen een goed beeld gekregen van  waar een goede greep aan moet voldoen. Mijn doel is om in de eerste plaats ergonomische vormen te ontwikkelen die op een comfortabele manier uitdaging bieden.  Daarnaast vind ik het bijna net zo belangrijk dat een greep er goed uit ziet. Strakke lijnen en vernieuwende texturen zorgen ervoor dat deze grepen ook esthetisch van de hoogste kwaliteit zijn. Alle grepen worden met de hand en met veel aandacht voor detail ontworpen en alleen de beste ontwerpen gaan door naar de productiefase.  Voor een kleine selectie van de ontwerpen klik hier.

Naast mooie vormen vind ik het heel belangrijk dat Beta grepen van de hoogste kwaliteit zijn. De grepen worden gemaakt van een speciaal ontwikkelde mix van Polyurethaan. Polyurethaan is een stuk lichter en sterker dan het nu veel in Europa gebruikte Polyester. Dit resulteert in veel sterkere en lichtere grepen die minder snel beschadigen en verslijten bij intensief gebruik.

Beta Holds is niet zomaar een nieuw grepenmerk, Beta Holds streeft naar perfectie. We willen dat routebouwers en klimmers net zo enthousiast worden van onze grepen als wij zelf zijn!

Klik op hieronder om een kleine selectie uit onze ontwerpen te zien.

Beta Holds Slideshow


Beta Holds heeft jullie hulp nodig!

Nadat de grepen ontworpen zijn uit een high density foam, worden er siliconen mallen van gemaakt. Die mallen worden gebruikt om de grepen te gieten. 

Om een mooi assortiment aan te kunnen bieden moeten er veel mallen gemaakt worden.  Er is ongeveer  €4000,- nodig om een goede start te kunnen maken. Daarom vragen we jullie om hulp! Elke kleine donatie brengt ons weer iets dichter bij de Beta-droom! 

Ook als je niet financieel bij kunt dragen kun je me enorm helpen door deze pagina te delen!


------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My Name is Arlen Strengers, 27 years old from the Netherlands.

I've been climbing for about 14 years now, 12 years ago i got the chance to try some routesetting and I immediately loved the proces. In those 12 years of routesetting I've set approximately 4-5 routes a month. (somethimes a little less, sometimes wáy more). That's about 48 - 60 routes a year and 576 - 720 routes in total. If you take in account that every route uses about 45 climbing holds, it turns out i put about 30.000 holds to the wall. 

The idea to design my own climbing holds started a couple of years ago. sometimes due to frustration of poor designed holds, but most of the time i got inspired at climbing trips. 2 years ago i started experimenting with different materials and techniques. Now it's time to take the next step.

Thanks to my experience as a (competition) routesetter, I know what a good hold should look and feel like. My first priority is to design ergonomic shapes that feel friendly and comfortable. But I think it's almost equally important that all holds will look great. Smooth curves and revolutionary textures will make sure these holds will be of the highest aesthetical quality. All holds are designed by hand with a lot of attention to detail. Only the very best holds will go into production.

For a small selection of the designs, follow this link.

Besides the great looks, Beta holds are also made of the highest quality materials. They are made with a specially designed polyurethane mix. Polyurethane is a lot stronger than the commonly used polyester. This results in very strong and lightweight holds. 

Beta Holds is not just a new brand, we aim for perfection. We want other routesetters and climbers to be as excited about our holds as we are!

follow the link below to see a small selection of designs.

Beta Holds Slideshow

Beta Holds needs your help!

After the holds are desined out of a high density foam, sillicone molds are made. These molds are used to cast the final climbing holds.
To make a good start we want to provide a broad selection of great holds. For this, lots of molds have to be made.  €4000,- is needed for this purpose. That's why we ask for your help! Every small donation will bring us one step closer to the Beta-Dream!

Thank you!

Het idee om zelf grepen te gaan ontwerpen is een paar jaar geleden ontstaan. soms uit frustratie om slecht ontworpen grepen, maar vaker nog door inspiratie na klim trips.  2 jaar geleden ben ik begonnen te experimenteren met verschillende materialen en technieken. Nu is de tijd rijp om de volgende stap te zetten.
Door mijn ervaring als (wedstrijd)routebouwer heb ik ondertussen een goed beeld gekregen van  waar een goede greep aan moet voldoen. Mijn doel is om in de eerste plaats ergonomische vormen te ontwikkelen die op een comfortabele manier uitdaging bieden.  Daarnaast vind ik het bijna net zo belangrijk dat een greep er goed uit ziet. Strakke lijnen en vernieuwende texturen zorgen ervoor dat deze grepen ook esthetisch van de hoogste kwaliteit zijn. Alle grepen worden met de hand en met veel aandacht voor detail ontworpen en alleen de beste ontwerpen gaan door naar de productiefase.  Voor een kleine selectie van de ontwerpen klik hier.
Naast mooie vormen vind ik het heel belangrijk dat Beta grepen van de hoogste kwaliteit zijn. De grepen worden gemaakt van een speciaal ontwikkelde mix van Polyurethaan. Polyurethaan is een stuk lichter en sterker dan het nu veel in Europa gebruikte Polyester. Dit resulteert in veel sterkere en lichtere grepen die minder snel beschadigen en verslijten bij intensief gebruik.
Beta Holds is niet zomaar een nieuw grepenmerk, Beta Holds streeft naar perfectie. We willen dat routebouwers en klimmers net zo enthousiast worden van onze grepen als wij zelf zijn!
Klik op hieronder om een kleine selectie uit onze ontwerpen te zien.Beta Holds Slideshow
  Beta Holds heeft jullie hulp nodig! Nadat de grepen ontworpen zijn uit een high density foam, worden er siliconen mallen van gemaakt. Die mallen worden gebruikt om de grepen te gieten. Om een mooi assortiment aan te kunnen bieden moeten er veel mallen gemaakt worden.  Er is ongeveer  €4000,- nodig om een goede start te kunnen maken. Daarom vragen we jullie om hulp! Elke kleine donatie brengt ons weer iets dichter bij de Beta-droom! 
Ook als je niet financieel bij kunt dragen kun je me enorm helpen door deze pagina te delen!



------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

My Name is Arlen Strengers, 27 years old from the Netherlands.I've been climbing for about 14 years now, 12 years ago i got the chance to try some routesetting and I immediately loved the proces. In those 12 years of routesetting I've set approximately 4-5 routes a month. (somethimes a little less, sometimes wáy more). That's about 48 - 60 routes a year and 576 - 720 routes in total. If you take in account that every route uses about 45 climbing holds, it turns out i put about 30.000 holds to the wall. 
The idea to design my own climbing holds started a couple of years ago. sometimes due to frustration of poor designed holds, but most of the time i got inspired at climbing trips. 2 years ago i started experimenting with different materials and techniques. Now it's time to take the next step.
Thanks to my experience as a (competition) routesetter, I know what a good hold should look and feel like. My first priority is to design ergonomic shapes that feel friendly and comfortable. But I think it's almost equally important that all holds will look great. Smooth curves and revolutionary textures will make sure these holds will be of the highest aesthetical quality. All holds are designed by hand with a lot of attention to detail. Only the very best holds will go into production. For a small selection of the designs, follow this link.

Besides the great looks, Beta holds are also made of the highest quality materials. They are made with a specially designed polyurethane mix. Polyurethane is a lot stronger than the commonly used polyester. This results in very strong and lightweight holds. 
Beta Holds is not just a new brand, we aim for perfection. We want other routesetters and climbers to be as excited about our holds as we are!
follow the link below to see a small selection of designs.Beta Holds Slideshow
Beta Holds needs your help!

After the holds are desined out of a high density foam, sillicone molds are made. These molds are used to cast the final climbing holds.To make a good start we want to provide a broad selection of great holds. For this, lots of molds have to be made.  €4000,- is needed for this purpose. That's why we ask for your help! Every small donation will bring us one step closer to the Beta-Dream!Thank you!

story:
This Indiegogo Project is created by Junpiao Teng, male, aged 66, Never Say Retired,  Hong Kong born Taiwanese, educated in Hong Kong, now staying in Malaysia with my family. Enriched International Business Experiences for over 35 years based in Asia.

I was the first one to promote Primary School Computer Education in Hong Kong,, Taiwan and Malaysia about 20 years ago. During recent 11 years, concentrated to develop Health-care Products especially in China and Asean Countries. Now, being as Business Consultant for Asia EMT & Paramedic in Malaysia, which is to develop EMT & Paramedic Training Program uniquely for Asia people.. ( www.asiaemtp.webs.com )  Besides, I am also an Inventor, having invented some new Medical Devices under Patent Protection, in which only Safety & Quality (S&Q) Surgical Scalpel is focused in this Indiegogo Project.

In order to solve HIV/AIDS problem, whole world has done at the utmost:

~ Relief to the HIV/AIDS people;

~ Gift of Condoms;

~ Exchange of Syringe Program;

~ etc…..

But all of these are PASSIVE OPERATIONS only, similar as surrender to HIV/AIDS, in my opinion!

Before valid medications of HIV/AIDS comes out, why don’t do some operations ACTIVELY to fight back HIV/AIDS?

One of Examples, such as: Sharps & Needle Injuries!

HIV/AIDS transmission should not be only arose from sex and drug-abusers , there is also not rare due to the sharps and needle injuries accidentally happen to the respectable healthcare workers and medical students who should not be ignored. Especially for the surgical nurses who are still nervous everyday to fix and drag the used bloody surgical blade from the current traditional surgical scalpel with which they still keep using over half of century, this may bring them the nightmare in any minute as according to the following Statistic:

WHO Statistic: Globally, it is estimated that sharps injuries cause about 66,000 HBV, 165,000 HIV infections among health-care workers each year..

OSHA Statistic: Estimates that only in USA 5.6 million workers in the healthcare industry and related occupations are at such risk. Nursing staff are most frequently injured. This bloodborne infections have serious consequence, including long-term illness, disability and death.    

Statistics from Australia Medical Industry Association: At least One in Nine nurses in NSW will suffer a sharps injury each year.

Now, this problem possible be mostly solved, pls. refer to my invention, S&Q Safety Scalpel as shown on my Presentation Movie, which undoubtedly enables to safeguard any users, such as Surgical Nurses, Medical Students etc. from the bloody sharps injuries, resulting prevention of HIV/AIDS, further to minimize its transmission over the world as well.

Traditional Surgical Scalpel is generally made of metal, its weakness is dangerous when fixing the blade, which is pressed and congested tightly into the groove on the Handle with fingers, so that, after use, the nurse must use same big force to drag the bloody blade out of the groove with fingers also. It makes the surgical nurses very nervous every day, afraid of being hurt by the bloody blade, resulting to get HIV/AIDS etc. possibly.

My invented S&Q Safety Scalpel is also made of metal, but with ease to pave the blade on the Handle surface for use without force, and feel relax to release the bloody blade without touch, just by turning the Handle over, the blade will fall off automatically and the user discards the bloody blade as usual.. (Pls. refer to the Movie )  Clinical trials taken in Singapore, China, Malaysia and Denmark, Surgeons gave good comments, especially the nurses generally like it, so that, once they use my S&Q,  they must buy my specific blades which outlook, sharpness and cost are exactly the same as traditional blades, except that the “Groove” on my blade is tailor-made under my patent coverage.

Marketing Strategies:

At beginning marketing for promotion, my SQ Handle will be sold without making margin to the hospitals through Regional Distributors, our benefit mainly derived from the Sales of our specific blades later for long term. .

Business Profit: Initially, Margin is small, but later will grow bigger and bigger within the first year expectedly, until one day in future, all of nurses worldwide get used to use my S&Q, they will abandon the Traditional Scalpel, this is my dream!

Current Problem: Now, # 4 S&Q Handles as seen on the movie are ready, but most hospitals like to get #3 Handles also together for their more convenience. This causes me into trouble, because of having already spent all my savings on related R&D, so that I am now lack of funding to produce the #3 Handles, which outlook is the same as #4, but shorter only, therefore, no technical problem.

REQUEST: May I hereby request for your HEROIC Support, targeting to raise up a funding about US$15,000. I will use the fund through Indiegogo to order the tool of #3 Handle for production in March 2013 , (the more if I get, will order more tools to produce handles of #5, #6, #7, #9 etc.)  and also to build a S&Q Web-site, so as to let me expand  worldwide marketing through more Regional Sole Distributors ASAP, expectantly to minimize the transmission of HIV/AIDS & other Virus, so as to save more lives in the world. Contrarily, if I don’t reach my entire goal, I still will keep my promise to fulfill the Rewards promptly,  and can supply #3 S&Q Scalpel (made by mould) and Blades to the Perk of Distributor(s) when they place me the order because it can help me get the Bank loan to order the tool for #3 Handle and Blades without problem. (Handmade #3 Scalpel does not need mould, so that, no problem even under this circumstance.)  

HEROIC PERFORMANCE: It should be a great worthy achievement! Not only to me, your HEROIC Support on this Indiegogo Project will benefit to the whole world people! In order to express my gratitude, besides my own S&Q Scalpel, I also arrange some interesting Rewards which are supported by the friendly factories specially for this Campaign, such as: S&Q Not-fade Sticker, S&Q Whistle Key Finder, and quality Waterproof Touch Screen Mobile Phone Watches etc. (One Year Warranty), wishing you all to be the Hero to enjoy a significant coming Merry X’mas!

APPRECIATION ALSO! However, if this time you cannot help, never-mind, I still appreciate if you could kindly get the word out and make some noise about my campaign by using the Indiegogo share tools with thanks! 

Finally, most thanks to Indiegogo , for giving me the chance to online my Project here! Thank you all!  

FULL DETAILS FOR “REGIONAL DISTRIBUTOR” REWARD:

Pledge $2,000 or more

REGIONAL DISTRIBUTOR PACK!

1 pc. Genuine HAND MADE #4 S&Q Scalpel & 1 pc. Genuine HAND MADE #3 S&Q  Scalpel (both are Medical Stainless Steel) with specific blades,  attached with a  Gold Colored Medal marked with “SUPER S&Q Hero” in a classic wooden Display Box  for you to show off to the world proudly;

10 pcs. Genuine Scalpel (Medical Stainless Steel made by mould) with 100 pcs. of specific blades. (You may gift them to your friendly Biological / Nurse Students, they must like it! Or being my REGIONAL DISTRIBUTOR (First Come First Serve if same Region is chosen.), I will share with you my related marketing experience. Or at your option, you can transfer this Distribution Right to any Third Party that you think more appropriate.)   

6 pcs. Waterproof Touch Screen Mobile Phone Watch (pls. choose any SIX from Model #A-01 to #A-09 INCLUDING the #A-05 & #A-09 with Steel Bracelet) as X’mas gifts for your Spouse, Kids & best friends also (which function detail pls. see below) in order to show our great appreciation.

3 pcs. S&Q Miniature Scalpel Whistle Key Finder engraved with “ S&Q Hero”;

3 pcs. S&Q Blessing Sticker ;

1 pc. S&Q Thank You Card, and your USERNAME to be reserved, plus get a SUPER HERO EMBLEM forever emblazoned next to your USERNAME in the Member area, where we’ll update you our Progress and coming New Product(s);

Tag your family photo and names proudly display on our coming S&Q website “Super Hero” page

(Pls. add $350 for shipping charge. Too many heavy metals, sorry!)

Est. delivery: Phone Watches & others in Dec. 2012 except S&Q Scalpels in Mar, 2013

story:
Short Summary

We are few people, designers and developers, trying to do something helpful for everyone in our spare time. However, this time is limited, so we're forced to work on other things, not necessarily what we like or want.

If you help us fund this project, then we'll spend more time working on it and bring it to life, much faster. Other than that, this will keep us motivated for our next projects, which we will bring for free, too.

What We Need & What You Get

We have searched for FREE, good-looking application that does multi-currency converting and found none. We were motivated to create and share it with everyone for free. We need your help, so we can keep our products free.

The Product

The app features:

  • Sleek, subtle and lightweight gestural interface design. No overflooded design, no unneeded elements. Just what you need.
  • Quick conversion between user-selected currencies. Just swipe result to convert or swipe picker to change currency input mode.
  • Different currency rates providers (Google Finance and ECB supported)
  • Off-line mode (you do not need to be connected to use the function.)
  • Simple maths operations ( add, substract ) with different currencies
  • Saving history with description and date. So, you can easily track your expenses when work or traveling.
  • If you have any ideas ... drop us a note.

Design

Simplicity

User Experience

Gestural interface design - Just swipe result to convert or swipe picker to change currency input mode

The Impact

We will start this project as an iPhone 3GS/4/4S/5+ application. There's a plan to make an android app, too, with the same sleek design and the same great features. If we succeed, tablet versions will follow - both on iPad / Android tablets.

This project is a great test for us. If we're successful, then we're motivated to bring another great project (Personal finance/money manager, in the cloud) and fund it via Indiegogo. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like our idea, but you're unable to help, please share our project and help us get the funding we need. Everyone will benefit from this. You can help us, even without spending a dollar!

story:
Member of the Week - Brad Simpson MyTIKR   

We at At The Pool love new technology that makes your life easier and more efficient. Although we aren’t huge fans of the inundation of social networks and smart phone use (since it tends to get in the way of the experiences and people we care about), we are pretty excited about this new application that will bring all of your content together into one feed.

MyTIKR is a smartphone app aggregator that brings all your social feeds and content streams together in a simple, elegant, and customizable application across all your digital devices. 

Founded by an At The Pooler, Brad Simpson, we are happy to see him and his team making moves to make the world a better place. They are currently running an Indiegogo campaign to help subsidize the cost of creating an app, and they’d love your help!


My concept became the brainchild of myTIKR: to design a smartphone app aggregator that brings all your social feeds and content streams together in a simple, elegant, and customizable application across all your digital devices. 

                     

myTIKR takes Manhattan!  Our team is heading to New York to meet with our Golden Gekko development team and discuss some details, not the least of which will be our official launch date!  Stay tuned here or on www.mytikr.com for more details.  All the TIKRheads are so excited to see the vision moving forward.



The Single Screen Way to Manage Your Day!

myTIKR is a dynamic, new technology mobile application that offers an innovative new way to view, engage, and enjoy the content of a user’s most-used apps all at once on the smartphone screen, instead of having to constantly open and close independent apps such as emails, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Newsy, ESPN, and Nasdaq. 

myTIKR uses ticker tapes displaying real-time data crawling horizontally for each app, with multiple tracks stacked on top of each other, comprising a full-screen matrix snapshot of the user’s most used apps. 

The user glances down at his phone and sees all desired app content moving slowly in real-time across the screen, and then taps a finger on the scrolling graphic or text hyperlink icon to view the full-sized native content. Once finished with viewing that particular content, one swipe takes the user back to the scrolling app matrix dashboard. myTIKR is an app aggregator that brings all your social feeds and content streams together into a simple, elegant, and customizable application across all your digital devices.

Cheers, my name is Brad Simpson. I am the creator of the myTIKR application. With myTIKR, you can access, check and manage your “always-on” apps with an elegant, customizable single dashboard screen (currently patent-pending technology). I created myTIKR to solve a few problems I was having with managing my smartphone application use. To date, there are over 1.5 million applications available for download from Apple iTunes and Google Play. On average, each smartphone user checks apps over 35 times a day, spending over 30 seconds per app. Whether or not we are ready to accept it, we now live in a society of “App-Addicted” people controlled by their “Most Used” apps. For me, having so many apps made my phone (and me) slow and inefficient.


                                            


SPECIAL THANKS TO THE TEAM BELOW:

Sadat Huq, for his dedication and detailed work. And overall help on all Operational matters. And that Stanford education really helped too…:)

Christian Prezgay, for his quick turn-around on the financial documents. As well as, his early help in setting up the corporation format.

Matt Mangold, for writing the original code on the stacked ticker-tape. It could not have been easy taking directions from scatterbrained me! Great work, you're the reason we are here!

Paul Plemel, thanks for keeping ALL of us in line and on task. You are the task master and have an incredible ability to see through the BS....

Dutch Heuzen, thank you for being a sounding board and the go to guy for all things Marketing on the big business side....

Armen Printsian, thank you for the IT guidance and support with the backend process...You make it look so easy! :)

Mark Weinberg, thank you for your ability to rally me and the troops. You are a never ending source of kudo's and support moving forward. Looking forward to your incredible PR influence as we grow...

Richard Kaleh, What can I say.....A champion for everything myTIKR and me......Thank you for the years and I hope there will be more.....You have an incredible eye for style and design, I look forward to your site design help... 

Michael Duffield, my longtime business partner and confidant. You have been an incredible source of strength and style across the board. Thank you for keeping me in line and on track, when I have a propesity to get a little scatterbrained...

Charley Hoefer, You have been an incredible friend in the short time we've been working together. You have a great eye for the big picture and always the pragmatist when I get on a tangent. You bring me back.....

Jon Hall.......:) What can I say! You taught me to be a "Well, not a fountain." Thank you....Always listen to those that teach…..

Jayce Simpson, Thank you son for all that you do. You really did get the "Simpson Tech Gene." We appreciate everything you bring to the table. You have a bright future in this business. I hope it's ready for you….:)

Please visit the gallery and view our Investor Deck, Executive Summary, myTIKR Wireframe document, and other gallery pictures...

Please visit the gallery and view our Investor Deck, Executive Summary, myTIKR Wireframe document, and other gallery pictures...

mobile application that offers an innovative new way to view, engage, and
enjoy the content of a user’s most-used apps all at once on the smartphone
screen, instead of having to constantly open and close independent apps such as
emails, Twitter, Instagram, Facebook, Newsy, ESPN, and Nasdaq. 
myTIKR uses ticker tapes displaying
real-time data crawling horizontally for each app, with multiple tracks stacked
on top of each other, comprising a full-screen matrix snapshot of the user’s
most used apps. 
The user glances down at his phone
and sees all desired app content moving slowly in real-time across the screen,
and then taps a finger on the scrolling graphic or text hyperlink icon to view
the full-sized native content. Once finished with viewing that particular
content, one swipe takes the user back to the scrolling app matrix
dashboard. myTIKR is an app aggregator that brings all your social feeds
and content streams together into a simple, elegant, and customizable
application across all your digital devices.
Cheers, my name is Brad Simpson. I am the creator of the
myTIKR application. With myTIKR, you can access, check and manage your
“always-on” apps with an elegant, customizable single dashboard screen
(currently patent-pending technology). I created myTIKR to solve a few problems
I was having with managing my smartphone application use. To date, there are
over 1.5 million applications available for download from Apple iTunes and
Google Play. On average, each smartphone user checks apps over 35 times a day,
spending over 30 seconds per app. Whether or not we are ready to accept it, we
now live in a society of “App-Addicted” people controlled by their “Most Used”
apps. For me, having so many apps made my phone (and me) slow and inefficient.
                                            SPECIAL THANKS TO THE TEAM
BELOW:
Sadat Huq, for
his dedication and detailed work. And overall help on all Operational matters.
And that Stanford education really helped too…:)
Christian
Prezgay, for his quick turn-around on the financial documents. As well
as, his early help in setting up the corporation format.
Matt
Mangold, for writing the original code on the stacked ticker-tape. It
could not have been easy taking directions from scatterbrained me! Great work,
you're the reason we are here!
Paul
Plemel, thanks for keeping ALL of us in line and on task. You are the
task master and have an incredible ability to see through the BS....
Dutch
Heuzen, thank you for being a sounding board and the go to guy for all
things Marketing on the big business side....
Armen
Printsian, thank you for the IT guidance and support with the backend
process...You make it look so easy! :)
Mark
Weinberg, thank you for your ability to rally me and the troops. You
are a never ending source of kudo's and support moving forward. Looking forward
to your incredible PR influence as we grow...
Richard
Kaleh, What can I say.....A champion for everything myTIKR and
me......Thank you for the years and I hope there will be more.....You have an
incredible eye for style and design, I look forward to your site design
help... 
Michael
Duffield, my longtime business partner and confidant. You have been an
incredible source of strength and style across the board. Thank you for keeping
me in line and on track, when I have a propesity to get a little
scatterbrained...
Charley
Hoefer, You have been an incredible friend in the short time we've been
working together. You have a great eye for the big picture and always the pragmatist
when I get on a tangent. You bring me back.....
Jon Hall.......:)
What can I say! You taught me to be a "Well, not a fountain." Thank
you....Always listen to those that teach…..
Jayce Simpson,
Thank you son for all that you do. You really did get the "Simpson Tech
Gene." We appreciate everything you bring to the table. You have a bright
future in this business. I hope it's ready for you….:)
Please visit the gallery and view
our Investor Deck, Executive Summary, myTIKR Wireframe document, and other
gallery pictures...

Please visit the gallery and view our Investor Deck, Executive Summary, myTIKR Wireframe document, and other gallery pictures...

story:
Lynsay Vance, Dentsu Aegis Media Network

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Ben Putley, Numbate - Innovative Mobile Advertising

 

 

Tom Barry, Sleeping Giant Media

 

 

 

Natalie Glaze, the7stars Media Agency

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

$6,000 will help us to finish the iPhone app, begin development of the Android app, extend the database to include locations across the USA, and provide us with a healthy marketing budget to really drive the promotion.

Funds above $6,000 will be spent on Stage II development, which includes further optimization  and the sharing of our app with millions of people around the world.

 

 

We have been working day and night for the past 6 months and will be releasing an iPhone version soon. This is now 75% complete. 

We have invested all of our personal savings into this project. Our lives revolve around and we have every faith in its success. We are so close to revolutionizing how people can plan events with their friends and meet new people with similar interests.

This is where you come in Indiegogo, we need your help. Please choose your favourite perk.

Alternatively, if you do not wish to invest, please help us spread the word by sharing our campaign to your Facebook and Twitter.

Thank you for visiting our campaign. We hope to meet you at one of our future events.

 

 

Josh, James and Calum

We are a team of 3 school friends, housemates and co-founders, all with the shared goal of making success.

Josh studied Business Management at the University of Nottingham and recently left his job as the Business Development Manager of an established online company to pursue full-time.

When James left University he went out and started his own web/app development company that has been running successfully for the last 3 years.

As for me, I am a recent graduate with a passion for live events; especially sport, music and theatre. I have been fortunate enough to gather experience from a range of global organisations, including the London-based Premier League Football Club, Fulham FC.

We each have our own unique skill set, and are confident that as a team we can make this the perfect social app. We came up with the concept over a competitive (but friendly) game of Ping Pong in our garden last summer. Not knowing where our plans for the evening would take us, and as 3 single guys who love going out and meeting new people, the idea for a new social/dating app was born.

If you would like to get to know us better, please tweet us @joshwood21, @jamesthurlow989 and @calumward10. We would love to hear from you.

 


 

When is the app going live?

The official launch of this app is planned for summer 2014 (iPhone), with the Android version arriving later in the year. Excited?
 

How much will the app cost?

This app is free to download for everyone, and always will be. No excuses now!
 

I love your project, but don’t have much money to pledge, how can I help?

We could really use your help to spread the word to your friends and on social networks by sharing the link of the campaign.
 

What is Indiegogo?

Indiegogo is a crowdfunding platform. Here is a simplistic way of explaining it:

We have an innovative idea that we have dedicated our time and money to get to where we are. But we need your help to complete it.

If you like our project (if you’ve read this far we hope you do!), you make a pledge to support us. You can pick the reward you would like in exchange from our list on the right. We will then finalize our app, launch it, and send you the reward you chose.

We thank you for making it all possible. You should feel part of the adventure and know you have made a real difference in shaping this app's future.
 

Want to know more?

If you would like to find out more about this app, what we do, our Indiegogo campaign or my Oscar-worthy performance in the promo video, please do get in contact by tweeting me @calumward10. What's more, if you see me on a night out or at one of our app events, please come and say hello, I'd love to meet you in person and buy you a drink..

 

Thank you so much for visiting our campaign! Please help us spread the word by sharing on Facebook and Twitter!

story:
Diamond Nano Shield is a remarkable Super Science  in nanotechnology. It is a fluid that can be applied across the surface of the entire mobile device, including overtop a touch screen, glass, any surface, that will protect your device against scratches and water damage while sacrificing none of the appearance or functionality of your display. Diamond Nano Shield is Invisible by the naked eye and is synthesized to be next only to gemstones in hardness. It is also substance tough, suitable for those who must retain their particular unit’s sanitation. it will make the glass 9 times stronger and durable.

Water Resistant



At one point we’ve all done it – spilt a drink over a laptop, gotten our tablets soaked in the rain, or even dropped our phone in the toilet. Water has always been the bane of electronics, but now Diamond Nano Shield Using a revolutionary process, Diamond Nano Shield applies a hydrophobic nano coating to your devices that  water Resistant it and protects it against accidental exposure to liquids.

The coating is completely invisible to the human eye and is virtually undetectable. In fact, Diamond Nano Shield promise the coating will in no way “compromise the look, feel, and performance of your electronics.” In fact, the coating is 1000 X thinner than a human hair 

Anti Scratch



Anti FingerPrint


Diamond Nano Shield Coating Clear is an invisible glass coating that protects all types of glass. It provides a water repellent, non-stick barrier which prevents glass damage from scale, salt, scum, air pollutants, and other foreign material.

 

The non-stick protective coating minimizes dirt and grime build up on the glass, so glass requires much less maintenance. No scraping scrubbing or harsh chemical cleaners are needed to clean the glass.

 

The Diamond Nano Shield Coating Clear protective coating is chemically bonded to the glass, so will not rub off. This glass protection product does not change the appearance or clarity of the glass and is not affected by long term exposure to heat or UV light.

 

NanoCoat Clear Benefits

  • PROTECTION
    revents damage from salt, hard water minerals, dirt, grime and soap scum
  • INVISIBLE
    Surfaces look and feel the same after application
  • ECONOMICAL
    Reduces cleaning time and effort along with maintenance costs
  • WEATHER RESISTANT
    Not affected by extreme heat or UV exposure
  • LONG LASTING
    One application lasts 3-5 years in most conditions
  • EASY TO CLEAN
    Water and dirt repellent surface, so no scraping, scrubbing or harsh chemical cleaners needed
  

Glass Protection For...

  • BATHROOMS
    Shower Screens, Splashbacks, Mirrors
  • HOME
    Windows, Sliding Doors , Skylights, Louvres
  • OUTDOORS
    Balustrades, Pool Fencing,
  • OFFICE & COMMERCIAL
    Glass Facades, Windows, Partitions, Kitchens & Bathrooms
  • AUTOMOTIVE
    Windscreens, Mirrors, Car windows.

Also Ideal For Ceramics

Tiles, bath tubs, basins and toilets.

We want to put this incredible invisible Diamond Nano technology out there and available for everyone. By donating a certain amount as outlined on the right, you can have your own bottle of Diamond Nano Shield to use on your devices and much more thing you can work with to prevent liquid damage.

The Diamond Nano Shield Story

Has your cell phone, tablet damage with liquid ? Diamond Nano Shield Coatingwas founded on the idea of solving the problem. Headquartered in Garden Grove, CA, the company is best known for liquid protection devices. 

Their products can be found in thousands of locations around the world.

Shouldn't free liquid damages to all of your devices ?

We believe that "Diamond Nano Shield  Coating" will change the world; empowering people to do things they never could before. It brings convenience into people's everyday lives.


Risks and challenges

One of the biggest challenges is the manufacturing process. Quality control will be at the top of the list and most important issue. There are many reasons why the manufacturer's cooperation will not be easy. We understand that Indiegogo backers want their product as soon as possible, but we are limited by factory's capabilities. In our experience, most pre-production samples still have a slight variation from the final mass produced unit.

FAQs

What is it?

Diamond Nano Shield Coat Clear is a glass protection treatment which provides an invisible, water repellent, non-stick barrier to protect the glass surface. It chemically bonds to the glass, so won't rub off, and protects against scale and/or salt damage, while making the surface extremely easy to clean.
 

Works on ALL glass types, phone, tablet, , e.g., windows, pool fencing, shower screens, splashbacks, exterior glass doors, facades, balustrades, skylights, automotive windscreens and automotive windows.

 

Does it work on ceramic tiles or grout?

Diamond Nano Shield Coat Clear will work on glazed ceramic tiles, and ceramic baths, basins and toilets (treat the toilet BEFORE you fill it with water) as it would on glass. The product will work on new grout for a limited time, but will wear off long before it will on glass. Diamond Nano Shield Coat Clear was specifically designed for glass.

 

Can anyone apply it?

Yes. Application is simple and instructions are included with each purchase.


Is it safe to use?

Diamond Nano Shield Coat Clear is alcohol based, so safe to use.

 

What is the coverage rate?

Approximately 5ml per 4 Square Feet.

Diamond Nano Shield Clear 5 ml will protect approximately 4 square Ft of glass,

 

How long does it last?

Depends upon the age of the surface and level of exposure to environmental conditions. Typically 2-3 years in most conditions.

 

Does it work on other surfaces?

work on plastics, ceramics, glass

Will it leave a mark or stain the surface?

No. The appearance and clarity of the glass will not change after treatment.

 

Does the surface need to be cleaned prior to application?

Yes. Surface preparation is important to obtain maximum effects. A special glass cleaner is available (Quartz-Clean) and cleaning instructions are provided with each purchase.

 

What if the surface has already been marked or stained?

If the glass is scale or salt damaged (cloudy appearance which will not clean off), the damaged areas will need to be repaired before Diamond Nano Shield Coat Clear can be applied.

 

Is an aftercare program needed?

Treated glass becomes easy to clean, NOT self cleaning. Regular wiping with a wet microfibre cloth is all you need. Avoid the use of harsh chemical cleaners on the glass or ceramic surfaces as this may reduce the lifetime of the product, and are not needed to clean the treated glass or ceramic surface.

 

Will the coating crack, peel or discolour over time?

No. Diamond Nano Shield Coat Clear chemically bonds to the glass, and is not affected by UV light or heat (up to 250°C) so will not crack or discolour over time.

story:
The Slimmest Body, the Most Spacious Storage per Dollar, and the Earliest to Be Delivered Mini PC on Indiegogo!

Hercules Computing is excited to introduce the Hercules PalmTop - the lightest PALM size Windows 10 PC that does not compromise computing power!

You can use Hercules PalmTop as a mobile PC and a mini desktop at your home or office. Since it incorporates the same Windows 10 OS (Ubuntu, too) as your home or office PCs with compact palm size, you don't need to spend time and money on mobile version applications anymore!

Hercules PalmTop goes into a new category of PC, and you can see its position among other Windows based devices. Please understand the table below is only for comparison, and devices listed work synergistically together.

Hercules PalmTop and Other Windows Based Devices

Compact Desktop AND Light Weight Mobile PC

What You Can Do with Hercules PalmTop

Great Computing Power in a Smart Phone Size Windows 10 PC that Weighs as Little as 1~2 Eggs

Carry it anywhere, anytime, no backpack or computer bag needed – it's all in the palm of your hand.

Color Changed!!

Current backers voted between black and orange, and black won. Hercules now goes black! This is 3D image for the black color model.


Invincible Resources

Runs desktop applications as nimbly as a full size PC or laptop

Hercules PalmTop gives you more speed, storage, and efficiency than current high priced tablets and smartphones. Hercules PalmTop runs full functions of Windows OS and its applications in the palm of your hand and at a fraction of the price!

NOW, your mobile PC can do the work on a SAME PLATFORM as your Windows desktop in any room in the house or in any remote location.

Newest Intel Quad Core Cherry Trail CPU, 12 core GPU, 4G RAM, 64G~128G Storage

Powerful enough to run all Windows 10 applications with the strength of the newest Intel mobile CPU, Cherry Trail z8300, and 12 Core GPU, Hercules PalmTop can support graphic rich tasks more fluidly and than most other mobile devices including casual games.

Its 4G memory and 64G(or 128G optional) internal storage surpass most mobile computing requirements.

Need more storage? NO PROBLEM. Hercules PalmTop is equipped with an SD card port that grows your storage up to 128G, providing for a maximum 256G storage. Of course, you can use USB memory as well.  

Fast Connectivity / Noiseless Contruction

To deliver the fastest mobile computing experience, Hercules PalmTop has integrated the fastest, broadest WiFi module – 802.11ac – making gaming controller response or streaming your favorite movies the fastest available.

Bluetooth 4.0 is also ready to support all connectable devices to Hercules PalmTop.

Hercules PlamTop has great connectivity to conveniently use other peripherals. An HDMI port to connect HD TVs or projectors, 3.5 mm headphone jack, USB 3.0 and 2.0 one of each. USB 3.0 transfers data 10 times faster than USB 2.0.

Versatility from Fast / Convenient Connectors

Fanless noiseless construction

Hercules PalmTop has self cooling construction to handle the heat from Cherry Trail CPU, and doesn't have a separate fan.

Connect with More Devices

As a Windows 10 PC with the advance connectivity via wifi ac, Hercules PalmTop can be connected and controlled by Android/iOS phones and tablets using remote desktop control applications in the market. This way, you will feel you are turning a smartphone or a tablet into a Windows 10 PC, since you use full desktop version applications i.e. Photoshop or Powerpoint through the phone or the tablet.  

Although very possible, using Photoshop on a smartphone as the part of your routine daily job isn't practical at all. Please consider this as an technical example to show how much heavy desktop applications can be used on your mobile devices through Hercules PalmTop for an urgent tasks. 

Demonstration : iPAD - Photoshop by using a Third-party Remote Desktop Control


Demonstration : iPhone - Photoshop by using a Third-party Remote Desktop Control


Specification


Who Needs Hercules PalmTop


The Development

The commitment to Hercules PalmTop began in early 2014. Hercules evaluated all available base boards and dropped the idea of stick PCs, because the HDMI connector wasn’t firm enough with all connectors in use.

The chip sets available to the market were changing so rapidly and after Baytrail proved disappointing in both performance, Hercules Computing decided to wait for the sample run of Cherry Trail.

Combinations of integrated connectors were also limitless, but the optimum configuration was brought to the current Hercules PalmTop.

The housing design also had a huge number of possibilities - from square, vertical / horizontal rectangles. Horizontal rectangle had the most stable position when installed on a table with wires, and has become the final design.

Timeline


Team

Hea Yoon Park 

Founder. MBA and has over 4 years of comprehensive experience from R&D to sales - hardware and software.

Brian Bowen

Management Consultant. Operates 4 businesses successfully over 14 years. Believes the success in business comes from the perfect deployment of corporate mission.

Daniel Montano

Marketing director. Market communication expert. Studied design at the Institute of European Studies, Vienna, Austria.

In Kyu Kim

Engineering. Studied mechanical engineering. Experienced coordinator between laboratories and companies.


Risks and challenges

As you see from still photos and videos in the above content, we have real working prototypes with full functionality. Hercules Computing has done the required preliminary research thoroughly enough to make this project safe and continues to pursue manufacturing on a larger scale. From all the experiences, we are very confident to deliver final products to pledgers safe. On top of it, we will keep our whole project transparent.
