story:
ITEAD studio is based in Shenzhen, China, which is located with China's biggest electronics market as well as one of the most integrated electronic supply chains in the world. A vast number of exciting and innovative products are designed, sourced and manufactured around us every day.

In electronics the big picture is usually more compelling than the nuts and bolts of electronic design. To make innovation easier, we offer various modules and development platforms to accelerate the development process and to reduce barriers to entry and to soften those steep learning curves.

You can visit our site for more our products: imall.iteadstudio.com 

IBOX is a mini multi-function single board computer which is developed based on ITEAD A20 core board and hackable. Hardware configuration is as follows :

  • CPU Dual-core ARM Cortex-A7 
  • GPU Mali 400 MP
  • DDR3 RAM 1GByte
  • NAND FLASH 4GByte

It offers four USB ports , an HDMI port, an SP port, a 100M Ethernet interface, a Micro-SD interface and a 32-pin multi-function expansion interface. There is an infrared receiver that supports remote control and a two-color LED indicating the running status on front panel of IBOX.

IBOX can run multiple operating systems in both NAND FLASH version and SD card version, including Android and Linux. As it has the same core board configuration with Iteaduino Plus, all the system and software that run on Iteaduino Plus can also run on IBOX.


IBOX can be used as a high- performance mini- computer. After being connected to the monitor, keyboard and mouse and booted into linux operating system, it can realize the normal daily use and simple office use.


IBOX can work as a multimedia set-top box. After connecting it to TV via an HDMI cable, boot it into Android TV BOX system, you can perform various multimedia applications with a remote control, such as watching videos and listening to Internet radios, etc.


After being connected to all kinds of data acquisition expansion boards externally and running different applications, IBOX can realize a variety of functions of virtual instruments, such as oscilloscope, logic analyzer, frequency meter, etc. To achieve such functions, the expansion interface on IBOX must be used to connect with other function expansion modules / expansion boards externally. ( The above design sketch is for reference only, which cannot be considered as the final product image)


After being connected to customized control expansion boards externally and running control software, IBOX can achieve gateway and control functions of an intelligent home system, such as remote control of all kinds of home appliances with an infrared repeater and remote monitoring of room temperature and humidity, etc. To realize such functions, the expansion interface on IBOX must be used to connect with other function expansion modules / expansion boards externally. ( The above design sketch is for reference only, which cannot be regarded as the final product image)

As you can see, IBOX can work as a central-control development platform, and a variety of functions can be realized after being externally connected to various expansion boards and running the customized programs, which include the virtual instruments we mentioned above and gateway of intelligent home system, etc. Nothing is impossible to a willing mind. 

We do hope that we can provide an example for each typical application and create a new open-source project for it, while the workload is too heavy, and we cannot update and maintain so many projects, so we will only provide some simple DEMO to show you how to use it .

We expect to put forward the block diagram and create more open source projects for practical applications, and people who are interested can continue to update and improve them together. Of course, we will provide all kinds of assistance within our capacity for these projects.

If IBOX can only be used as a mini PC and Android TV BOX, it does not have any advantages over other TV boxes in the market indeed. Therefore, here we would like to introduce the differences between it and other boxes in more detail:

IBOX can support multimedia functions that other TV boxes support by adding with appropriate ROM. While compared to other TV boxes with closed properties, IBOX offers more freedom so that you can use various versions of firmware easily, including Android and various versions of linux in both NAND FLASH version and SD card version to meet your special requirements .

*Click here to download address of ROMs

In addition to more choices in software, IBOX offers an expansion interface to facilitate future expansion of various types of functions. With this interface, it can realize a variety of functions that other TV boxes cannot by adding all kinds of hardware modules externally. For example, as mentioned above: after an external data acquisition card is added, data accosted can be sent to IBOX via the expansion interface, and then application running on IBOX will analyze and display the data, thus realizes functions of a virtual instrument.

Hardware pins on expansion interface are defined as follows :

Expansion interface provides most of the commonly-used buses which are operated via direct drive of ITEAD OS SDK, thus users are free to make various self-development.

With open-source hardware and software design as well as development based on ITEAD A20 core board, IBOX can be easily upgraded by replacing the master control. To upgrade A20 from A10, simply open the box, then remove the A10 core board and replace it with A20 core board. For future A31 and other more powerful CPU modules, it also support upgrading by way of plugging - of course, due to its open property, you can even plug in a CPU core board customized according to your own needs.

We guarantee that, once this campaign is ended, you will get an intact IBOX and a development extension accessory ( the accessory supports debugging your IBOX through the serial port, external connection with SATA hard drive and direct external connection to various Arduino shields)

* More about this add-on board HERE

With regard to software, IBOX will be pre-installed with Android system of NAND FLASH version when leaving the factory. Moreover, we will provide the linux operating system that works on it, and you can download and install on your own when needed. Apart from the operating system, all the other applications mentioned above are temporarily not in our development schedule, thus we can not guarantee that there are ready-made hardware extensions and applications to transform IBOX directly into an oscilloscope or an infrared repeater controller when you have it - although it does support these features because of the hardware and its open property, someone needs to provide the hardware extensions and applications mentioned above first.

It is expected that the products will be sent out within 10 days after the campaign ends (10th, Aprail).Free shipping perks will be shipped via Hong Kong Registered Air Mail.Fast shipping perks will be sent via DHL which can get to you in 3-4 working days.

  • Source design file of IBOX baseboard
  • Schematic of IBOX baseboard
  • Schematic of ITEAD A20 CORE
  • Firmwares Download
  • Specifications Dimensions

  • About A10/20 Core, Iteaduino Plus and IBOX

*Submit more discussion post about IBOX to info@iteadstudio.com

As a new cross-border product, it expects more user feedback, which will contribute to the product promotion and design improvements in the future. To this end, we will carry out two "Gift winning" activities to allow more people to get involved.

Free sample

If you are an experienced writer on technology blog or en electronics website editor,and you are interested in this cross-border product, willing to use it and to write an review for it, we are glad to send one free sample for you to evaluate. And we will prepare ten samples in all.

For details about rules of the activity and form of application, please click HERE.

VIP upgrade

If you support IBOX project on indiegogo before the product is officially launched and share your experience with IBOX on your blog, or with users on social networking sites such as facebook or other forums after receipt of the product, we will offer you a one-year VIP account on imall, with which you can enjoy a 5 % discount when purchasing on imall. 

For details about rules of the activity and form of application, please click HERE.

ITEAD studio is based in Shenzhen, China, which is located with China's biggest electronics market as well as one of the most integrated electronic supply chains in the world. A vast number of exciting and innovative products are designed, sourced and manufactured around us every day.In electronics the big picture is usually more compelling than the nuts and bolts of electronic design. To make innovation easier, we offer various modules and development platforms to accelerate the development process and to reduce barriers to entry and to soften those steep learning curves.You can visit our site for more our products: imall.iteadstudio.com IBOX
is a mini multi-function single board computer which is developed based on ITEAD A20 core board and hackable. Hardware
configuration is as follows :


CPU
Dual-core ARM Cortex-A7 


GPU
Mali 400 MP


DDR3
RAM 1GByte


NAND
FLASH 4GByte


It offers four USB ports , an HDMI
port, an SP port, a 100M Ethernet interface, a Micro-SD interface and a 32-pin multi-function expansion interface. There is an infrared receiver that
supports remote control and a
two-color LED indicating the running status on front panel of IBOX.
IBOX
can run multiple operating systems in
both NAND FLASH version and SD card version, including Android and
Linux. As it has the same core
board configuration with Iteaduino
Plus, all the system and
software that run on Iteaduino
Plus can also run on IBOX.

IBOX can be used as a high- performance mini- computer. After being connected to the monitor, keyboard and mouse and
booted into linux operating
system, it can realize the normal daily use and simple
office use.
IBOX can work as a multimedia set-top box. After connecting it to TV via an HDMI cable, boot it into Android TV BOX system, you can perform various multimedia
applications with a remote control, such as watching videos and listening to Internet
radios, etc.
After being connected to all kinds of data
acquisition expansion boards externally and running different applications, IBOX
can realize a variety of functions of virtual instruments, such as
oscilloscope, logic analyzer, frequency meter, etc. To achieve such functions,
the expansion interface on IBOX must be used to connect with other function expansion
modules / expansion boards externally. ( The above design sketch is for
reference only, which cannot be considered as the final product image)
After being connected to customized control
expansion boards externally and running control software, IBOX can achieve
gateway and control functions of an intelligent
home system, such as remote control of all kinds of home
appliances with an infrared repeater and remote monitoring of room
temperature and humidity, etc. To realize such functions, the expansion
interface on IBOX must be used to connect with other function expansion modules
/ expansion boards externally. ( The above design sketch is for reference only,
which cannot be regarded as the final product image)As you
can see, IBOX can work as a
central-control
development platform, and a variety of functions can be realized after being externally connected to
various expansion boards and running the customized
programs, which include the virtual
instruments we mentioned above and gateway of intelligent home
system, etc. Nothing is impossible to a willing mind. We do hope
that we can
provide an
example for each typical application and create a new open-source project for it, while the
workload is too heavy, and we cannot
update and maintain so many projects, so we will only provide some simple DEMO to show you how to use
it .
We expect to put
forward the block diagram and create more open source projects for practical
applications, and people who are interested
can continue
to update and
improve them together.
Of course, we will provide all kinds
of assistance within our capacity for these projects.

If
IBOX can only be used as a mini PC and Android TV
BOX, it does not have any advantages
over other TV boxes in the
market indeed. Therefore, here we would like to introduce the
differences between it and
other boxes in more detail:
IBOX
can support multimedia functions that
other TV boxes support by adding with appropriate ROM. While compared to other TV boxes with closed properties, IBOX offers more freedom so that you can use various versions of
firmware easily, including
Android and various versions of linux
in both NAND FLASH version and
SD card version to meet your
special requirements .*Click here to download address of ROMsIn
addition to more choices in
software, IBOX offers an expansion interface to facilitate future expansion of
various types of functions. With this interface, it can realize a variety of functions that other TV boxes cannot by adding all kinds
of hardware modules externally. For
example, as mentioned above:
after an external data
acquisition card is added, data
accosted can be sent to IBOX via the expansion interface, and then
application running on IBOX will
analyze and display the data, thus realizes functions of
a virtual instrument.
Hardware
pins on expansion interface are
defined as follows :Expansion
interface provides most of the commonly-used buses which are operated via direct drive of ITEAD OS SDK, thus users are free to make various self-development.With open-source hardware and software design as well
as development based on ITEAD A20 core board, IBOX can be easily upgraded by
replacing the master control. To upgrade A20 from A10, simply open the box,
then remove the A10 core board and replace it with A20 core board. For future
A31 and other more powerful CPU modules, it also support upgrading by way of
plugging - of course, due to its open property, you can even plug in a CPU core
board customized according to your own needs.
We guarantee that, once this
campaign is ended, you will get an intact IBOX and a development extension
accessory ( the
accessory
supports debugging your
IBOX through the serial port, external connection with SATA
hard drive and
direct external connection
to various Arduino shields)* More about this add-on board HERE
With regard to
software, IBOX will be pre-installed with Android system of NAND
FLASH version
when leaving the factory. Moreover, we will provide the linux
operating system that works on it, and you can download and install on your own when needed. Apart from the
operating system, all the other applications mentioned
above are temporarily not in our development schedule, thus we can
not guarantee that there are ready-made hardware extensions and
applications to
transform IBOX directly into an oscilloscope or an infrared repeater
controller when
you have it -
although it does
support these features because of the hardware and its open property,
someone needs to
provide the hardware extensions and
applications mentioned above first.
It is expected that the products
will be sent out within 10 days after the campaign ends (10th, Aprail).Free shipping perks will be shipped via Hong
Kong Registered Air Mail.Fast shipping perks will be sent
via DHL which can get to you in 3-4 working days.


Source design file of IBOX baseboard


Schematic of IBOX baseboard

Schematic of ITEAD A20 CORE

Firmwares Download

Specifications Dimensions
About A10/20 Core, Iteaduino Plus and IBOX*Submit more discussion post about IBOX to info@iteadstudio.com
As a new cross-border
product, it expects more
user feedback, which will contribute to the product promotion and
design improvements in the future. To this end, we will carry out two
"Gift
winning" activities to allow more people to get
involved.
Free sample
If you
are an experienced writer on technology blog or en electronics
website
editor,and you are
interested in this
cross-border product, willing to use it and to write an review for it, we
are glad to
send one free
sample for you to evaluate. And we will prepare ten samples
in all.For details about rules
of the
activity and form of application, please click HERE.
VIP
upgrade
If you
support IBOX project on indiegogo before the product
is
officially launched and share your experience with IBOX on your blog, or with
users on social networking sites such as facebook or other forums
after receipt of the product, we will offer you a
one-year VIP account
on imall, with which you can enjoy a 5 % discount when purchasing on imall. For details about rules
of the
activity and form of application, please click HERE.

story:
Proudly Presents


The Most Trusted Home Security Camera! It's also the World's Smallest Too.

Amaryllo International


Please watch our introduction video below and meet the team!




The iSensor HD is a modular, self-installed, home security system that runs all of its communications through Skype. It is a small and unimposing security device that can be mounted on walls, ceilings, or even set atop a desk. 

Several sensors can be added around your home or small office, all connecting through Skype to your phone or tablet. Offering up to 1280 x 720 HD quality in real-time, the iSensor HD aims to bring the ease of self-installation and the ultra-high level of Skype's 256-bit encryption to the home security market!


Come check us out on Facebook, Twitter and our Amaryllo website!



Featuring


 



Super Compact


iSensor HD is slightly shorter than the iPhone 5. With a built-in motor and gears, iSensor HD is the world's smallest and lightest high definition IP camera that offers over 180 degrees of viewing. Powered by a standard 5 volt and 1 amp supply, iSensor HD is also the world's lowest power-consuming high definition IP camera with a panning feature. 


iSensor HD in action!





USB Connector for Portability


Did you know iSensor HD uses USB for its power and WiFi for its internet? Just look at all the places you can use it!


First off, it can be wall or ceiling mounted anywhere in the house with the included bracket. 


Or plug it into a USB power adapter and make it cordless!


The back of the iSensor HD can be manually rotated 90° for when the electric socket is near the ground. Here you can remotely 'tilt' 180° instead of 'panning'!


You can even plug it into a portable USB power bank and carry it around the house! In this method, where ever you have WiFi you can place the iSensor!


Even connect it to your computer or laptop to guard your desk at work!




How Do I Control the Camera?


 For all platforms, you can simply send Skype messages (L,R) to move the camera left or right. For Android devices, there are two more ways to do it. You can swipe the screen to move the camera (as the demo video shows below) or you can tilt the phone to move the camera. For iOS devices, both texting and tilting work well with that platform.



The video below shows how to remotely control different Amaryllo products (such as iBabi HD) with all 3 different ways.




Skype Push Alert


iSensor HD has built-in audio and motion sensors. Once triggered, it will automatically send you push text or push picture alerts. You can also customize your device name. For example, I have re-named mine as "iBabi Azure" as shown below. The push message includes a time stamp, so you know exactly when the alert was triggered. Simply press the alert icon to download the picture at your command.




Why Skype?


Skype allows us to bring you the industry leading 256-bit encryption on all of the iSensor HD's audio and video transmissions! Other companies often use unknown 3rd party servers that offer as little as 32-bit encryption. This low level of security renders them easily able to be hacked, as had happened to two major companies in the summer of 2013.

In addition, Skype software employs dynamic video channeling. This automatically adjusts the video quality according to the internet connection, always ensuring there is less than 0.5 seconds of delay and giving true real time communication.




Amaryllo in the News


"The iCam is every IP camera owners dream. It’s easy to setup, has 256-bit encryption, supports 1080 x 720 video without lag-time, and free cloud service. Then there are the little things like no contracts, no monthly fees, and a rocking Android app." - SecurityGem (iCam HD)

"Your best bet would presumably be to use one that’s actually designed for – and licensed by – Skype." -  Gizmag

"Simply connect via Skype and watch what’s going on in your home from your smartphone." - City A.M.

"An internet-accessible real-time monitor/alarm for infants, pets, home security or other applications." - PanTech Solutions

"[The setup was] simple, straightforward" - Techno Traveler 

"This cam is styled to fit in nicely on a kid’s shelf, rotates 360 and tilts up and down, and integrates with Skype. Plus, it’s adorable when it moves around." - CES 2014 Blog (iCam HD)

"The Amaryllo iCam separated itself from the crowd." - Linux.com (iCam HD)

"It’s a wireless baby monitor that I wish was around when my babies were in cribs!" - Blue Suit Mom (iBabi HD)


Recognition & Awards


Amaryllo was selected as a Cool Vendor by Gartner in their Connected Home Report 2014. Gartner is the world's biggest investment research company.





 Amaryllo was also the recipient of 2 prestigious awards at Computex 2014. The iSensor HD was the top winner of the Best Choice Award in the "SmarTech" category.









Design Patents


We have filed close to 20 patents in our design and innovation.  Shown below is iSensor HD's industry design patent granted by 26 European countries.

 



Why Choose iSensor HD?


1. Most compact panning HD IP camera available 

With its tiny size and super low power consumption, you can even plug it into a power bank for portable use!


2. Free 15 GB of online storage 

We charge NO subscription fees, other companies usually charge up to $200 per year!


3. 256-bit encryption

 Other companies simply can't afford to have the same level of encryption, that's why we leverage Skype's encryption technology to bring you by far the highest security in the home IP camera industry!


4. Skype's worldwide P2P servers provide real-time video/audio

Through the use of Skype's massive P2P network, users will have less than 0.5 seconds of delay anywhere in the world. Other products suffer from servers being based in one geographic location and can experience severely long delays depending on location.




HD Video Quality at Google Drive

Below is a snapshot of a recorded 1280 x 720 HD video at our assembling site. 


By clicking here, you can see the actual recorded audio and video from Google Drive. You can hear and see crystally clear sound and HD video.


Picture Quality


Here's a shot of the iSensor HD's 1280 x 720 taken live on Skype from a computer all the way across the world (the far wall is about 20 meters away). The image keeps its integrity without visual distortion.


Here's a shot of one of the competitor's HD cameras inside a small office (notice the strange curvature of their industry standard fish eye lens):




Comparison





Industry leading 256-bit encryption



Through Skype, the iSensor HD features 256-bit encryption, which is the highest found in the IP camera home security market. Be sure that no uninvited stranger will ever be looking in on your home, as had happened to other IP camera companies in the Summer of 2013.


Free  15 GB of Online Storage on Google Drive


Did we mention that there is a built-in memory to automatically upload recorded videos to your Google Drive account after setup? Did we mention that it is a FREE cloud storage service?  Amaryllo is the first security company to offer free online storage on Google Drive for all of its products! Simply enter in your Google account details and choose which kind of recording format you want. After that you can access your videos from anywhere in the world...at no additional charge!


Sleek and Stylish Design


iSensor HD comes in all white or all black. It can fit seamlessly inside any home or office while offering peace of mind without distraction.


Hand Motion Controlled Remote Panning



Our patent pending technology allows the user to call into the camera through Skype and remotely pan the sensor by tilting the smartphone left and right!


See Everything in Your Home



Being mounted on a wall or ceiling and with 180° of panning plus the lens angle of 60° makes sure the user can see everything in the room from anywhere in the world!


Audio and Motion Triggered Picture Alerts





All iSensor HD's come with built-in audio and video sensors to catch thieves in the act! The iSensor HD will send either a Skype picture or text alert to your phone as soon as the action takes place.


Up to 1280 x 720 HD




With the 1.0 MP lens of the iSensor HD, the user can see all of the action going on in crystal clear imaging. Amaryllo's products also feature dynamic channel adjustment. This will automatically adjust the video quality according to the internet connection, always ensuring a delay of less than 0.5 seconds, giving you true real time communication! Other products on the market can have lag time up to several minutes, making two-way communication almost impossible.


Intruder Warning Light



iSensor HD comes with a super bright white LED light for use at night time. This is the same type that is found in the iPhone 5s. The user can easily control the function of the light inside the iSensor HD app.


Privacy Mode



 All of Amaryllo's products have a built-in privacy mode function that can be turned on or off from anywhere in the world via the app. If you do not want anyone else calling into the camera, or want to turn off all the detecting and recording, simply turn on privacy mode. This will rotate the camera to the side and shut off all transmissions, as well as change the sensor's Skype status to 'Do not disturb.'




Perks


$5 USD - Email and Discount Code

Come be a part of Amaryllo's development and stay updated by being added to our email list! In return, we'll send you a 20% off discount code that you can use to buy any of Amaryllo's products for 90 days.



$160 USD - Bronze Package

Buy one iSensor HD and receive a free iCam HD: Cube Edition! This great value deal gives you two amazingly useful Amaryllo products that you can put anywhere around your home or office. 

This offer also includes free shipping anywhere in the world, so be sure to enter in your shipping details.



$320 USD - Silver Package

Buy two iSensor HD's and receive either a free iCam HD 360 or a free iBabi HD 360! This high-end model comes fully loaded with all the features available to the user including remote pan & tilt as well as motion & audio detecting.

This offer also includes free shipping anywhere in the world, so be sure to enter in your shipping details.



$480 USD - Gold Package

For the true techie! Buy 3 iSensor HD's and receive a free iCam HD: Sensor Edition AND a free iCam HD: Pan & Tilt Edition. Cover your complete household or small office with these 5 products, and have access to all these areas at the touch of your phone.

This offer also includes free shipping anywhere in the world, so be sure to enter in your shipping details.


$640 USD - Platinum Package

Our best deal yet! Buy 4 iSensor HD's and receive 2 free iCam HD 360's OR 2 free iBabi HD 360's. Cover your complete household or small office with these 6 products or send to your friends and family!

This offer also includes free shipping anywhere in the world, so be sure to enter in your shipping details.






@ The Amaryllo Office


Ready to Ship!


Product Planning


Soldering Away



Internal Testing


Assembly & QC


Individual Product QC



In the Boss's Office!

(notice that it can be cordless)





About Us

Amaryllo International is a company headquartered in Amsterdam, the Netherlands. It designs, markets, and sells an increasingly larger line of wireless smart home networking products. 

www.amaryllo.eu 

Legal Disclaimer


"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."

story:
An easy to use platform for robotic applications.

Für unsere deutschen Unterstützer, bitte hier klicken.

Cagebot Website


Exciting news!
We will get our molding forms in around two weeks and can start to produce our first batch of bricks. Seems like we can ship earlier than expected.


Please vote for us at Project Future Berlin:

   Vote here (click the heart)


Seen on:

   Bild article

   B.Z. article



Content
 Perks 
Parts
How it works 
 Stretchgoals
Risks 
Timeline


We are a team of three German engineers from Berlin who love new and creative technology. Ringo and Kai worked several years in a company for industrial automation. There they had built production machines, robots and camera detection systems and installed them in different countries around the world. Jonas on the other hand is currently finishing his studies of Business and Engineering and is now helping us to communicate our project.



     Our goal is to create a robotic platform that everyone can use 
and is compatible to existing systems, like LEGO Mindstorms.


We are frustrated with the solutions on the market. If you are a technology enthusiast like us, but don't have the time to learn everything from the beginning you won't find any product that will satisfy you.


You can build whatever you have in mind.


In order to accomplish this, we created very special bricks, so there is no limit in creation.

You can build whatever you have in mind and will get a very stable structure that won't bend on your needs. Several creations are possible. You can create for instance robots, 3D printers, bridges, towers, buildings or you build just your own small fully automated factory. On top, we created a software that is easy to understand and will satisfy very fast, without a long manual to read. Check it out!


There are no limits for your creativity!


Our easy-to-use software does not have any limits, even for advanced users. We are using the Arduino® Software Platform to support a growing and really awesome community. You will get help with your own ideas and you can spread yours to support others. It is a very satisfying experience.
And on top of that you could still work with our windows, mac, android or future iOS software to control and set up your creation.


To make this a reality we need your help!



After 3 years of research and development we now have fully functional prototypes in our hand. We are currently a small start up with limited capacities to finance production runs. With your support we will be able to produce our whole product range and to deliver complete sets to your homes for the first time. Additionally, you will speed up further research and development for even more fun and excitement in the future. It is you who can support us in doing so! It is you who enables us to deliver adventure and education to your home!


Education means future!


By supporting us you will invest in the future of many people, not only in our project! Our goal is to support as many people as possible with the chance to learn more about our modern world and the technology within it.


Be one of the first users of Cagebot! Our awesome perks will enable you to become one of the first users in a growing community. Conventional technology is short-lived and fast disposed of. We would like to introduce a system which is modular and can be used even after years.


                                                          Perks







Examples of Bots




                                                               


                                                          Parts







How it works
 With the Motion Editor you can simply tell your Cagebot what to do.

You want Cagebot to paint for you? No problem!

A small demonstration of how solid are our bricks.


That will be the size of our Cagebot Starter Edition Kit.






                                                Stretch goals

If we reach our founding goal and above following stretch goals become available


On our way to the final product there are some steps.


First thing will be the molding forms and first batch of bricks. Second, we will start the printed circuit board production and third, we will do additional tests so we can deliver a satisfying product!

Furthermore, there are several certification goals to achieve, like CE or UL.

We will use the money to start up our production line in Taiwan.
We worked and lived there for a long time and are very close with this nation. 
For those, who are further interested in this country, please visit
http://www.lonelyplanet.com/taiwan


We already invested in the development and trial run with all the necessary parts which are vital for our prototype. We have contracts with all the important partners for a longterm relationship and want to create many varieties of upgrades. Then we will start our online shop and hope people like our idea as much as we do. We will ask you guys regularly what you need for your creations. All this will be available as upgrades, so you won't need to buy the same stuff again.



During our search for components we found the best electronics, like the most useful sensors and most powerful motors. If you have your own hardware, we offer you the possibility to acquire the single components you still need. Until now there is no sensor like ours on the market. With this reasonable price you will get a bus system ready sensor with a lot of functions.


Risks and Challenges


We tried to minimize the risk but our way is still full of challenges. The system is very complex and contains a lot of components and parts. We prepared ourselves as good as possible and we are quite confident to manage the coming obstacles together with our partners.

We are using Flexible Funding because even if we won't reach our funding goal we will start a small production line. We want to make our dream come true.

Even if you are not able to contribute money you can help us with sharing our idea/project with other people. You also can easily use the tool from indiegogo to share with others.



                                                   Timeline




                                                 The Team

  Ringo Winkelmann - Co-founder, Construction and E-Design

With the love for robot toys and the world of technology, Ringo developed the prototype of the Cagebot system in 2011. He studied mechatronics and is always thinking at least two products ahead of current development. He has one decade of hands-on and business management experience in the automation industry.


  Kai Semmig -  Co-founder, Software development

With the interest in "smart" software, Kai developed the software of the Cagebot system. He studied automation technology and has his interests in robotics and camera detection. In order to advance his skills he was working for more then 7 years in the automation industry. 


  Jonas Zimmermann - Public relations, Design

Jonas has a vibrant interest in modern technologies. Most of all he is interested in those innovations that enable & empower people to interact and shape their environment. Only by moving and being moved one forges the basis for a “good life”. He wants to help spread technologies which inherent those virtues. What’s your vision?






                                       Für unsere deutschen Unterstützer


Cagebot Webseite


Inhalt
 Perks 
Teile
Wie es funktioniert 
 Stretchgoals
Risiken 
Zeitplan


Neuigkeiten!
Wir lassen gerade unsere Bausteinformen herstellen und können in etwa zwei Wochen mit der ersten Produktion unserer Bausteine starten. Es sieht gut für einen vorgezogenen Versandtermin aus.


Was ist Cagebot?

                                                     Modular in allen Bereichen.

Cagebot ist ein modulares Robotik-System, mit dem du deine Vision der Zukunft verwirklichen kannst, und das schon heute. Steig ein in die futuristische Welt der Robotertechnik. Bei Cagebot erwarten dich eine Vielzahl modular aufgebauter Komponenten. Das heißt, sie können beliebig miteinander kombiniert werden und sind sogar mit anderen Systemen kompatibel. Motoren, Sensoren und Energiequellen werden zu Bausteinen deiner Ideen. Ob du ein vollautomatisches Chassis für Kamerafahrten entwickeln möchtest, ein Fernlenkauto oder einen intelligenten Staubsauger. Die Modularität sorgt dafür, dass am Ende alle Teile zu einer Einheit verschmelzen. Dann schnappst du dir PC, Tablet oder Smartphone und hauchst deinem Roboter Leben ein.


                               Benutzerfreundlich

                                                        Vom Anfänger bis zum Profi.

Uns, dem Cagebot-Team, war es besonders wichtig, dir den Einstieg so einfach wie möglich zu machen. Alle Komponenten können ohne Elektronikkenntnisse zusammengebaut und ohne Programmierkenntnisse gesteuert werden. Baue schon am ersten Tag deinen multifunktionalen Roboter. So entdeckst du spielerisch die Faszination dieser neuen Welt. Entwickle dich Schritt für Schritt weiter, um komplexere Projekte zu realisieren und mehr Kontrolle zu gewinnen. Hinter der benutzerfreundlichen Oberfläche von Cagebot verbirgt sich ein professionelles Robotiksystem, das im Advanced-Modus frei programmierbar ist. All dies wird kontinuierlich weiterentwickelt und mit euren Ideen, eurer Unterstützung und eurem Feedback sind Cagebot bald keine Grenzen mehr gesetzt.


Wir sind ein 3 Mann Team aus Berlin und lieben Neues und im speziellen besonders neue Technologien. Wir sind seit vielen Jahren in der Automatisierungsindustrie tätig, in welcher wir mit Produktionsmaschinen, Robotern und Kameras für Objekterkennung arbeiten. Unsere Arbeit führte uns um den ganzen Globus.
Bei Jonas sieht es etwas anders aus, er ist beim Abschluss seines Studiums zum Wirtschaftsingenieur und hilft uns nun bei der Kommunikation unseres Projektes.

Unser Ziel ist eine modulare Roboterplattform, die jeder bedienen und nutzen kann, dazu noch kompatibel zu Systemen wie LEGO Mindstorms ist.

Wir waren auf der Suche nach einem System welches einfach bedienbar ist und jedem die Möglichkeit bietet komplexe Technologien in ein eigenes Robotersystem zu integrieren. Wenn Du ein Technikfan bist wie wir, aber nicht die Zeit hast alles vom Grunde auf zu lernen, dann wirst Du kein Produkt finden welches Dich befriedigt.

Um dies zu ändern kreierten wir spezielle Bausteine mit denen es keine Limitierung in den Möglichkeiten gibt.
Baue was immer Dir auch in den Sinn kommt!

Viele verschiedene Kreationen sind möglich. Du kannst Roboter, 3D Drucker, Brücken, Türme, Gebäude bauen oder Du baust Dir einfach Deine eigene kleine vollautomatische Fertigungsstrasse. Obendrauf kreierten wir eine Software die einfach zu verstehen und zu benutzen ist. Damit wirst Du schnelle Erfolge verzeichnen, ohne lange Anleitungen lesen zu müssen.


                                 Es gibt kein Limit für Deine Kreativität!


Bei einfach zu benutzender Software gibt es meistens Einschränkungen in den Anwendungen. Nicht mit unserer! Solltest Du weiter und mehr ins Detail gehen wollen, kein Problem! Wir benutzen die Arduino® Software Platform um das Wachstum einer herausragenden Gemeinde zu unterstützen. Diese kannst Du ebenfalls benutzen und die Systeme in der Dir bekannte Weise programmieren.
Du wirst Unterstützung bei der Umsetzung Deiner Ideen erhalten.

Natürlich kannst Du auch mit der Cagebot Windows, Mac, Android oder zukünftigen iOS Software arbeiten.


         Um all dies möglich zu machen benötigen wir Deine Hilfe!



Wir verbrachten 3 Jahre mit der Entwicklung und nun haben wir voll funktionsfähige Prototypen. Derzeit sind wir ein kleines Start-Up mit limitierten finanziellen Kapazitäten. Mit eurer Unterstützung werden wir fähig sein die Produktion zu starten und euch fertige Sets nach Hause zu liefern. Zusätzlich werden zukünftige Entwicklungen beschleunigt. Dies verspricht noch mehr Spass für die Zukunft.
Du bist es, der uns darin unterstützen kann! Du machst es möglich, dass wir mehr Abenteuer und Bildung bereitstellen können.

Bildung heißt Zukunft! 


Wenn Du unser Projekt unterstützt, investierst Du in die Zukunft von vielen Menschen, nicht nur in unser Projekt! Unser Ziel ist es so viele Menschen wie möglich zu erreichen und ihnen die Möglichkeit geben, mehr über unsere moderne Welt und der darin enthaltenen Technik zu lernen.


Seid einer unser ersten Cagebot Anwender. Unsere herausragenden Perks werden Dich befähigen einer der ersten Benutzer in einer wachsenden Gemeinschaft zu werden!
Viele Dinge sind nur für den Moment und werden später weggeworfen. Wir möchten ein System schaffen, welches modular ist und selbst noch nach Jahren benutzt oder erweitert werden kann. 


                                                                          

                                                          Perks







Beispiele für Bots




                                                                           
 

                                                    Teile






Wie es funktioniert

Mit dem Motion Editor kannst du deinem Cagebot einfach "sagen" was zu tun ist.

Du möchtest Cagebot für dich malen lassen? Kein Problem!

Ein kleiner Stabilitätstest mit unserer Bausteinen.

Hier die Größe unseres Cagebot Starter Edition Kits.





                                                Erweiterte Ziele




Auf unserem Weg zum fertigen Produkt werden wir einige Schritte bewältigen müssen.

Zuerst werden die schon vorhandenen Spritzgussformen erweitert und dann wird eine erste Produktion von Konstruktionselementen erfolgen.
Im zweiten Schritt werden wir die Produktion der elektronischen Hardware starten.
Im dritten Schritt werden dann umfangreiche Tests durchgeführt, damit wir ein zufriedenstellendes Produkt abliefern können. Dazu gehören auch nötige Zertifizierungen wie CE oder UL.

Wir werden die Gelder für den Start der Produktion in Taiwan verwenden. Wir arbeiteten und lebten hier für eine lange Zeit und sind mit diesem Land eng verbunden. Wer mehr Informationen über Taiwan haben möchte, findet diese hier: http://www.lonelyplanet.com/taiwan

Wir haben bisher in die Entwicklung und Fertigung von diversen Prototypen und Test's für alle notwendigen Komponenten investiert.
Wir konnten Verträge mit allen wichtigen Partnern schließen und wollen in der Zukunft eine grosse Vielfalt an Upgrades zur Verfügung stellen.

Wir werden unseren Onlineshop starten und hoffen, dass ihr genauso an unsere Idee glaubt wie wir.

Wir werden euch regelmässig nach euren Ideen für Upgrades befragen!



Auf unserer Suche nach den best geeignetsten Bauteilen fanden wir zuverlässige Sensoren und bärenstarke Motoren.

Mit diesen Teilen haben wir eine sehr gute Qualität, die uns und Dich zufriedenstellen wird. Solltest Du schon eigene elektronische Hardware besitzen, kannst du trotzdem Teile von uns benutzen und in Dein System integrieren. Im Moment gibt es keine Sensoren in diesem Segment am Markt, die so einfach zu handhaben sind wie unsere. Du wirst busfertige Komponenten mit einer Menge Funktionen erhalten. Einfach anschließen und benutzen. Mach Dir keine Sorgen über die Hintergründe, denn das haben wir schon für Dich gemacht!


Risiken und Herausforderungen


Wir haben versucht, das Risko so gering wie möglich zu halten. Trotzdem ist unser Weg voll von Herausforderungen, das System ist sehr komplex und enthält eine Vielzahl an Komponenten. Jede Komponente für sich bedurfte eines langen Entwicklungsprozesses und viele neue Komponenten sind bereits in der Entwicklung oder werden es in Kürze sein.  Wir haben uns so gut wie möglich auf die kommenden Probleme vorbereitet und sind sehr zuversichtlich, dass wir diese gemeinsam mit Euch und unseren Partnern zur vollsten Zufriedenheit meistern werden!

Wir haben uns für ein flexibles Funding entschieden, da wir in in jedem Fall eine kleine Produktion starten werden, selbst wenn wir unser Ziel bei den Einnahmen nicht erreichen! Wir wollen unseren Traum in jedem Fall Wirklichkeit werden lassen!

Selbst wenn Du uns nicht finanziell unterstützen kannst, kannst Du uns helfen unsere Idee mit anderen zu teilen. Du kannst neben Facebook auch das Indiegogo Tool nutzen um unsere Idee mit anderen zu teilen!



                                                   Zeitplan



                                                 Das Team

  Ringo Winkelmann - Co-founder, Konstruktion und E-Design

Mit der Liebe zu Roboterspielzeugen und der Welt der Technik, entwickelte Ringo das Cagebot System im Jahre 2011. Er studierte Mechatronik und denkt immer mindestens zwei Produkte weiter in die Zukunft. Er hat ein Jahrzehnt praktische Erfahrung mit Automation und Business Management.


  Kai Semmig - Co-founder, Software Entwickler

Mit einem großen Interesse an intelligenter Software hat Kai das Softwaresystem von Cagebot entwickelt. Er hat Automatisierungstechnik studiert und seine Interessen liegen besonders in dem Roboter- und Kamerabereich. Um seine Fähigkeiten weiterzuentwickeln hat er mehr als 7 Jahre in der Industrie für automatisierte Systeme gearbeitet.


  Jonas Zimmermann - Public Relations, Design

Jonas hat ein lebendiges Interesse an modernen Technologien. Vor allem aber interessieren ihn Neuerungen, die dem Individuum neue Möglichkeiten zur Interaktion und zur Mitgestaltung der Gesellschaft eröffnen. Denn erst die Mitgestaltung der eigenen Umwelt, ein "Berühren und Berührt werden", erschafft Raum für ein gutes Leben. Er ist hier mit angetreten, um mitzuhelfen diese Werte in die Welt zu tragen. Was ist deine Vision?

An easy to use platform for robotic applications.


Für unsere deutschen Unterstützer, bitte hier klicken.


Cagebot Website

Exciting news!We will get our molding forms in around two weeks and can start to produce our first batch of bricks. Seems like we can ship earlier than expected.

Please vote for us at Project Future Berlin:

   Vote here (click the heart)


Seen on:





   Bild article

   B.Z. article


Content
Perks Parts

How it works 
Stretchgoals

Risks 
Timeline

We are a team of three German engineers from
Berlin who love new and creative technology. Ringo and Kai worked several years
in a company for industrial automation. There they had built production machines, robots
and camera detection systems and installed them in different countries around
the world. Jonas on the other hand is currently finishing his studies of Business
and Engineering and is now helping us to communicate our project.
     Our goal is to create a robotic platform that everyone can use and is compatible to existing systems, like LEGO Mindstorms.



We are frustrated with the solutions on the market. If you are a 
technology enthusiast like us, but don't have the time to learn 
everything from the beginning you won't find any product that will 
satisfy you.

You can build whatever you have in mind.

In order to accomplish this, we created very special bricks, so there is no limit in creation.
You can build whatever you have in mind and will get a very stable structure that won't bend on your needs. Several creations are possible. You can create for instance robots, 3D printers, bridges, towers, buildings or you build just your own small fully automated factory. On top, we created a software that is easy to understand and will satisfy very fast, without a long manual to read. Check it out!


There are no limits for your creativity!




Our easy-to-use software does not have any limits, even for advanced users. We are using the Arduino® Software Platform to support a growing and really awesome community. You will get help with your own ideas and you can spread yours to support others. It is a very satisfying experience.And on top of that you could still work with our windows, mac, android or future iOS software to control and set up your creation.



To make this a reality we need your help!







After 3 years of research and development we now have fully functional prototypes in our hand. We are currently a small start up with limited capacities to finance production runs. With your support we will be able to produce our whole product range and to deliver complete sets to your homes for the first time. Additionally, you will speed up further research and development for even more fun and excitement in the future. It is you who can support us in doing so! It is you who enables us to deliver adventure and education to your home!Education means future! 

By supporting us you will invest in the future of many people, not 
only in our project! Our goal is to support as many people as possible 
with the chance to learn more about our modern world and the technology within it.

Be one of the first users of Cagebot! Our awesome perks will enable you to become one of the first users in a growing community. Conventional technology is short-lived and fast disposed of. We would like to introduce a system which is modular and can be
 used even after years.



                                                          Perks










Examples of Bots




                                                                

                                                          Parts















How it works

 With the Motion Editor you can simply tell your Cagebot what to do.



You want Cagebot to paint for you? No problem!



A small demonstration of how solid are our bricks.


That will be the size of our Cagebot Starter Edition Kit.


                                                Stretch goals

If we reach our founding goal and above following stretch goals become available





On our way to the final product there are some steps.


First thing will be the molding forms and first batch of bricks. Second, we will start the printed circuit board production and third, we will do additional tests so we can deliver a satisfying product!
Furthermore, there are several certification goals to achieve, like CE or UL. 
We will use the money to start up our production line in Taiwan. We 
worked and lived there for a long time and are very close with this nation. For those, who are further interested in this country, please visithttp://www.lonelyplanet.com/taiwan


We already invested in the development and trial run with all the necessary parts which are vital for our prototype. We have contracts with all the important partners for a longterm relationship and want to create many varieties of upgrades. Then we will start our online shop and hope people like our idea as much as we do. We will ask you guys regularly what you need for your creations. All this will be available as upgrades, so you won't need to buy the same stuff again.




During our search for components we found the best electronics, like the most useful sensors and most powerful motors. If you have your own hardware, we offer you the possibility to acquire the single components you still need. Until now there is no sensor like ours on the market. With this reasonable price you will get a bus system ready sensor with a lot of functions.



Risks and Challenges



 

We tried to minimize the risk but our way is still full of challenges. The system is very complex and contains a lot of components and parts. We prepared ourselves as good as possible and we are quite confident to manage the coming obstacles together with our partners.
We are using Flexible Funding because even if we won't reach our funding goal we will start a small production line. We want to make our dream come true.
Even if you are not able to contribute money you can help us with sharing our idea/project with other people. You also can easily use the tool from indiegogo to share with others.








                                                   Timeline







                                                 The Team

  Ringo Winkelmann - Co-founder, Construction and E-Design
With the love for robot toys and the world of technology, Ringo developed the prototype of the Cagebot system in 2011. He studied mechatronics and is always thinking at least two 
products ahead of current development. He has one decade of hands-on and business management experience in the automation industry. 

  Kai Semmig -  Co-founder, Software development
With the interest in "smart" software, Kai developed the software of the Cagebot system. He studied automation technology and has his interests in robotics and camera detection. In order to advance his skills he was working for more then 7 years in the automation industry. 

  Jonas Zimmermann - Public relations, Design
Jonas has a vibrant interest in modern technologies. Most of all he is interested in those innovations that enable & empower people to interact and shape their environment. Only by moving and being moved one forges the basis for a “good life”. He wants to help spread technologies which inherent those virtues. What’s your vision?

enthaltenen Technik zu lernen.


Seid einer unser ersten Cagebot Anwender. Unsere herausragenden Perks werden Dich befähigen einer der ersten Benutzer in einer wachsenden Gemeinschaft zu werden!Viele Dinge sind nur für den Moment und werden später weggeworfen. Wir möchten ein System schaffen, welches modular ist und selbst noch nach Jahren benutzt oder erweitert werden kann. 

                                                                          

                                                          Perks












Beispiele für Bots







                                                                           
                                                      Teile












Wie es funktioniert
Mit dem Motion Editor kannst du deinem Cagebot einfach "sagen" was zu tun ist.


Du möchtest Cagebot für dich malen lassen? Kein Problem!


Ein kleiner Stabilitätstest mit unserer Bausteinen.



Hier die Größe unseres Cagebot Starter Edition Kits.





                                                Erweiterte Ziele






Auf unserem Weg zum fertigen Produkt werden wir einige Schritte bewältigen müssen.
Zuerst werden die schon vorhandenen Spritzgussformen erweitert und dann wird eine erste Produktion von Konstruktionselementen erfolgen. Im zweiten Schritt werden wir die Produktion der elektronischen Hardware starten.Im dritten Schritt werden dann umfangreiche Tests durchgeführt, damit wir ein zufriedenstellendes Produkt abliefern können. Dazu gehören auch nötige Zertifizierungen wie CE oder UL.
Wir werden die Gelder für den Start der Produktion in Taiwan verwenden. Wir arbeiteten und lebten hier für eine lange Zeit und sind mit diesem Land eng verbunden. Wer mehr Informationen über Taiwan haben möchte, findet diese hier: 
http://www.lonelyplanet.com/taiwanWir haben bisher in die Entwicklung und Fertigung von diversen Prototypen und Test's für alle notwendigen Komponenten investiert.Wir konnten Verträge mit allen wichtigen Partnern schließen und wollen in der Zukunft eine grosse Vielfalt an Upgrades zur Verfügung stellen.
Wir werden unseren Onlineshop starten und hoffen, dass ihr genauso an unsere Idee glaubt wie wir.
Wir werden euch regelmässig nach euren Ideen für Upgrades befragen!


Auf unserer Suche nach den best geeignetsten Bauteilen fanden wir zuverlässige Sensoren und bärenstarke Motoren.Mit diesen Teilen haben wir eine sehr gute Qualität, die uns und Dich zufriedenstellen wird. Solltest Du schon eigene elektronische Hardware besitzen, kannst du trotzdem Teile von uns benutzen und in Dein System integrieren. Im Moment gibt es keine Sensoren in diesem Segment am Markt, die so einfach zu handhaben sind wie unsere. Du wirst busfertige Komponenten mit einer Menge Funktionen erhalten. Einfach anschließen und benutzen. Mach Dir keine Sorgen über die Hintergründe, denn das haben wir schon für Dich gemacht!






Risiken und Herausforderungen


Wir haben versucht, das Risko so gering wie möglich zu halten. Trotzdem ist unser Weg voll von Herausforderungen, das System ist sehr komplex und enthält eine Vielzahl an Komponenten. Jede Komponente für sich bedurfte eines langen Entwicklungsprozesses und viele neue Komponenten sind bereits in der Entwicklung oder werden es in Kürze sein.  Wir haben uns so gut wie möglich auf die kommenden Probleme vorbereitet und sind sehr zuversichtlich, dass wir diese gemeinsam mit Euch und unseren Partnern zur vollsten Zufriedenheit meistern werden!


Wir haben uns für ein flexibles Funding entschieden, da wir in in jedem Fall eine kleine Produktion starten werden, selbst wenn wir unser Ziel bei den Einnahmen nicht erreichen! Wir wollen unseren Traum in jedem Fall Wirklichkeit werden lassen!
Selbst wenn Du uns nicht finanziell unterstützen kannst, kannst Du uns helfen unsere Idee mit anderen zu teilen. Du kannst neben Facebook auch das Indiegogo Tool nutzen um unsere Idee mit anderen zu teilen!




                                                   Zeitplan










                                                 Das Team

  Ringo Winkelmann - Co-founder, Konstruktion und E-Design
Mit der Liebe zu Roboterspielzeugen und der Welt der Technik, entwickelte Ringo das Cagebot System im Jahre 2011. Er studierte Mechatronik und denkt immer mindestens zwei Produkte weiter in die Zukunft. Er hat ein Jahrzehnt praktische Erfahrung mit Automation und Business Management.

  Kai Semmig - Co-founder, Software Entwickler
Mit einem großen Interesse an intelligenter Software hat Kai das Softwaresystem von Cagebot entwickelt. Er hat Automatisierungstechnik studiert und seine Interessen liegen besonders in dem Roboter- und Kamerabereich. Um seine Fähigkeiten weiterzuentwickeln hat er mehr als 7 Jahre in der Industrie für automatisierte Systeme gearbeitet.

  Jonas Zimmermann - Public Relations, Design
Jonas hat ein lebendiges Interesse an modernen Technologien. Vor allem aber interessieren ihn Neuerungen, die dem Individuum neue Möglichkeiten zur Interaktion und zur Mitgestaltung der Gesellschaft eröffnen. Denn erst die Mitgestaltung der eigenen Umwelt, ein "Berühren und Berührt werden", erschafft Raum für ein gutes Leben. Er ist hier mit angetreten, um mitzuhelfen diese Werte in die Welt zu tragen. Was ist deine Vision?

story:
Designed Exclusively For Apple Macbook 12"
2015 & 2016 Compatible

  • Charge Macbook 12
  • Charge & Sync iPhone or iPad
  • Link To A 4K External Monitor
  • Utilise A USB-C Hard drive 

All At Once, With A Clip.

Eliminate cable mess, create more space and increase your port-ability with this seamless innovation.

CONSTRUCTED WITH A HIGH PERFORMANCE POLYCARBONATE FRAME FOR LIGHTWEIGHT STRENGTH, THE SOFT TOUCH FINISH DEFIES ACCESSORY DESIGN NORM AND MUST BE EXPERIENCED TO BE BELIEVED.



TAKE ADVANTAGE OF THE HIDDEN USB C PASSTHROUGH CHARGING PORT, DESIGNED TO CHANNEL YOUR CHARGING CABLE OUT THE BACK OF YOUR MACBOOK, REDUCING WORKSPACE CLUTTER.


DESIGNED FOR THE MODERN CREATIVE, AN ACCESSORY THAT YOU'LL ACTUALLY WANT TO SHOW OFF WITH YOUR MACBOOK.


From the inception of the idea, The KADi Port has taken months of long nights to prototype and design due to its perfection in being seamless in the Macbook's design. We could have come up with a stand alone USB Hub in two weeks which all USB Hubs currently are, but the curving clip on design makes The KADi Port the most beautiful accessory for Macbook in the market.


Instead of paying for extra adapters worth up to 10% of the Macbook's price, KADi has ensured its low cost price a testimony to the benefit it gives to Macbook users. The KADi Port also avoids turning the look of the Macbook from a seamless portable device into an octopus with the many adapters and loose cords that all other adapters offer as an alternative.

story:
Nano Suction Car Mount

NanoSuction car mount for phones & cases

Nano Suction Car Mount adopted Germany technology of nanosuction that can tightly "grip" your phone without cradles. It is 720 degree rotation designed, and small in size that can be installed in the right place for your view. Either a sudden turn, a braking, or even in cross country condition, Nano Suction Car Mount stays steady by your side.

 

Are You Still Using These Car Mounts?

 

Using phone navigation when driving is extreme common nowadays, but current car mounts are just not good enough. 

  • Traditional cumbersome cradle-style mount that may obstruct driver's view. 
  • CD-slot-based holder is difficult to place and withdraw and some even cannot adjust view angle.
  • Magnet car mount cause distortion to navigation and signal, or even damage your phone.

We've been  working on a better solution and found Nano technology is a good fit in this area. So here we are, introduce, the most convenient car mount.

 

Nano Suction, Stay Steady In Any Situation

 

The adhesive face adopted Germany technology of nanosuction that can tightly "grip" your phone with the power of millions of miniature suction cups.

Using just the power of small air pockets, the surface generates a powerful vacuum which can hold up a tremendous amount of weight.

It sticks to your phone firmly in even the worst road condition, and with no residue left.Either a sudden turn, a braking, or even in cross country condition, stays steady by your side.

 

Farewell To Metal Plate

 

NanoSuction can be used in any smooth phone or phone case without any metal plate to attach on your phone. Keeps your phone in a better looking and way convenient use. It is reusable, washable and can work on any smooth surface, including wood, metal, marble, tile, glass, and painted walls. 

If your phone or phone case is leather or frosted, you can use our smooth stick.

 

Easy Installation For Every Location

 

Nano Suction Car Mount uses top-tier adhesive to mount onto a flat part of your dashboard, console or air vent. The adhesive is removeable, reusable and washable that can be used multiple times without fear of losing stickiness. It makes placement and repositioning easy and with no harm to your car. And it's built to withstand high temperatures in the sun too.

Nano Suction Car Mount is one of the slimmest mounts you can find with 35mm adhesive tray and 65mm in height. It's small in size compared with other car mounts you used, but powerful out of your image.

 

Long Lasting Quality

 

The major challenge for nano membrane is temperature, many nano membrane lost it’s viscosity soon after exposure to high or cold temperature, which is quite common inside any vehicle. We started to design Nano since 2014 and Nano membrane is where we spend most of our time and energy. Luckily with the help of the Germany engineer, we are able to develop a Nano membrane that performs excellently in both hot and low temperature.

 

Double Axis 720 Degree Rotation

 

The flexibility of most car mounts is awful, especially for big screen phones. Through our innovational design we solve this problem for good. The double axis makes sure you get the right angle with 720 degree rotation design.

 

Easy Cleaning With Water Only

 

Suction will be weaken when the Nano membrane is covered with dust. Nano Suction Car Mount comes with a cover to protect the NanoSuction surface and extend its life. And you can clean and rejuvenate the NanoSuction surface by wiping it with a damp cloth or paper towel and allowing it to dry. You can also use cellophane tape for a waterless method to clean the dust.

 

Patent Design

 

By changing the structure of the axis, we make sure the components won’t scratch each other, Nano Suction Car Mount is more durable and won’t fade.

Using imported 3M glue in the base, which is reuseable and damage-free, Nano Suction Car Mount can be re-positioned for with no stain left on your car.

Using technology adopted by Apple, aluminum alloy body design with anodizing and CNC grinding that keeps the color and luster. Nano Suction Car Mount makes a great decoration for your car.

story:
Short Summary

Welcome Supporters!

We are SafeTrek, currently the #1 personal safety mobile app for iOS and Android that is improving the way people request emergency help! 

Our app is available for download to your phone with either iOS/Android today!! https://www.safetrekapp.com/

We need your support to build our smart watch app! Every app supporter gets our current app for iOS or Android, which will allow you to use our watch app when it is launched or use our mobile app at a great discount!!!

SafeTrek is a group of tech geeks that aspired to devise a way to make the world around us a safer place, utilizing smart phones  as our mode of achieving this goal. Our inspiration was first sparked by the blue-light safety stations we observed in our respective colleges, their existence led us to wonder: why not build a mobile app that goes beyond a stationary blue-light safety station? An app that has the ability to quickly alert police or emergency services to individuals by pinpointing their location and communicating their personal information. And- if police or emergency services seem unnecessary by the user- our app simply gives them peace of mind when in a unsafe or unknown area (Our trade marked “Hold Until SafeTM” feature). Thus, arrived the birth of SafeTrek in 2014!


We are excited tell our supporters that the SafeTrek mobile app has been out on both Android and iOS devices for the last 8 months maintain a rating of five stars for both platforms! Users are so fond of our safety application due to its convenience, accessibility, and simple- but effective- design. One can conveniently access our Hold Until SafeTM  button at anytime, which allows our users the peace of mind in unfamiliar and unsafe areas. It’s like having 911 emergency services on hold until you're safe. 

As a company, we have witnessed a positive trend over the last year involving smart watch purchases and wish to keep up with our tech savvy users by constructing a SafeTrek app for the Apple Watch.To achieve this goal, we need your support to subsidize the costs of design, engineering, and testing. It is imperative for us to build the smart watch application because we believe in our product and know it has the ability to save lives. We are a small, but passionate, four-person team that works diligently around the clock to keep our users safe. We have everything laid out and ready to build, however, we need additional funding to fully design, engineer, and test the smart watch app to our SafeTrek standards. 

In addition to the current SafeTrek app features, our customers will have the ability on the smart watch app to set alerts to “check in” or “snooze,” while they are in an unsafe or unfamiliar area or situation. If they do not “check in” or hit “snooze,” emergency services will be alerted. This is an invaluable tool for an array of reasons: for the person who goes running by themselves, the real estate agent showing a home or apartment, an individual out on a hike, or any other circumstance that one can not have their finger on our  Hold Until Safe feature. This enables individuals to still have emergency services on hold until they are safe.


With that request in mind, the way we like to think about our Indiegogo campaign is that in being a supporter and funding this project, you are also helping make the world a safer place. To show our appreciation, the SafeTrek team will also be providing you with certain perks. We ask that you please check out our reviews and see what users have to say about us on iOS and Android and help us make this project possible! 

What We Need & What You Get

We need to raise $20,000 for the Apple Watch app development to cover all of our costs from design, engineering, and testing. We realize that the Apple watch is one of many smart watches, which is why if we can reach a goal of $30,000 we will also be developing a smart watch app for Android as well!

The money will be spent on the following:

  • Design engineer - To ensure app is aesthetically pleasing and easy to use
  • iOS engineer - To develop the code needed to make the actual watch
  • Test engineer - To test everything that has been built, ensuring 100% accuracy
  • Hardware device - Purchasing product to test
  •  Software - Purchasing software to assist with the development and testing of the application

If we are able to raise $30,000 or more we will build for the Android smart watches as well! If this is the case, we will also need to hire:

  • Android engineer - To develop the code to make the actual watch app
  • Test engineer - Additional hours for our test engineer to test iOS and Android watch app
  • Hardware device - Purchase products to test


The Perks!!!!

We are going to shower you in perks! Believe in us now and we will give you our application at a HUGE discount from the current retail price!

We need your support to build our smart watch app! Every app supporter gets our current app for iOS or Android, which will allow you to use our watch app when it is launched or use our mobile app at a great discount!!!

Supporter Perk $5

  • You get your name put on our SafeTrekApp.com site under our Indiegogo page. This page is dedicated to everyone that helped give to our Indiegogo campaign! You will get all the updates on our project and an email when your name is listed to our site.

Platinum Supporter $250

  • You get your logo at the top of our Support page on SafeTrekApp.com. You will be considered one of our partners and we will open our doors to work with you or your company on how we can make your neighborhood or community safer with SafeTrek as a partner! Plus get you can purchase bulk subscriptions for SafeTrek at a steep discount! (email us for specific details)

App Supporter $18

  • You get our mobile app at 60% off the one-year retail price- big savings the whole year! Plus, we will notify you when we launch our smart watch apps and you can download those ASAP! Plus you get your name on our Indiegogo support page!

Swag Pack $35

  • Not only do you get a sweet SafeTrek t-shirt to make everyone jealous, you get our app for 1 year!  Plus you get your name on our Indiegogo support page!

Family Pack $70

  • We know that safety is a top priority for every family, which is why with this perk you get 5 codes for 1 year on our app. This is 60% off our retail price. Family safety is what we are all about! Plus you get your name on our Indiegogo support page!

Be our SafeTrek Smart Watch Tester! $100

  • We are giving the chance for those super savvy techies out there to be a part of our trial team and test the product before it is out on the market! You get to give us notes and feedback on the product! As a tester, you get to see the top secret workings of the app before it goes live! You are also get our app for 1 year! Plus you get your name on our Indiegogo support page!

Corporate Package! $1,436

  • You get 100 codes for a 1 year subscription, which is 60% off our retail price. You can choose who gets the codes and the one year starts when the app is downloaded, so there is no rush to get them to everyone!

Co-Branded App $10,000

  • We will co-brand our app to your company! We allow you to have our app with your company logo and colors. You will get a special link to share with your employee or friends, they will see your companies awesome safety app powered by SafeTrek when they download and open the app! You will also get 200 free codes to go with your co-branded app. Any additional codes you might need? No problem, it is 50% off the 1 year retail price!

The Impact

When you contribute to this campaign you are funding a safer world! You can help us reach our goal of making people be and feel safer anywhere they may be with the SafeTrek mobile app and soon the smart watch app!

We are passionate individuals who sincerely believe in our product and know our experience in the tech world will ensure our success. In fact, our team has a track record of successful Indiegogo campaigns and software experience. One of the team members, Robert Roderick, was part of the Breathometer Indiegogo campaign. Breathometer is a successful hardware and mobile app for users to have a smartphone Breathalyzer. It was one of the top funded projects on the Indiegogo site. 

With our past experience, we will be delivering you a great product! 


Risks & Challenges

One of the greatest things about our campaign is that we are already so close to having an app completed, that with the amount of work we need to do, there is very little risk. The more our supporters help SafeTrek, the faster we can release the product!

Our biggest challenge is the amount of funds we need to pay our engineers.

We expect to launch our app no later than 30 days after the close of this campaign so that people may start downloading and using it thereafter. Because this is such a fast turn around time our biggest risk is that time may extend to the maximum of 45 days due to spreading out expenses.

We believe in being open and honest and we keep you updated weekly on our progress. 

Even if our campaign is not fully funded, we are committed to delivering you an Apple Watch app! 100% guaranty!! 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot contribute financially at this time, you can still help us out by sharing our Indiegogo campaign with friends and family. You can also email us and let us know what ideas you might have for us at info@safetrekapp.com . Thank you for your support in helping make the world a safer place for all of us.

your logo at the top of our Support page on SafeTrekApp.com. You will be
considered one of our partners and we will open our doors to work with you or
your company on how we can make your neighborhood or community safer with SafeTrek
as a partner! Plus get you can purchase bulk subscriptions for SafeTrek at a steep discount! (email us for specific details)

App Supporter $18

You get
our mobile app at 60% off the one-year retail price- big savings the whole year! Plus,
we will notify you when we launch our smart watch apps and you can download
those ASAP! Plus you get your name on our Indiegogo support page!

Swag Pack $35

Not
only do you get a sweet SafeTrek t-shirt to make everyone jealous, you get our
app for 1 year!  Plus you get your name on our Indiegogo support page!

Family
Pack $70

We know
that safety is a top priority for every family, which is why with this perk you
get 5 codes for 1 year on our app. This is 60% off our retail price. Family
safety is what we are all about! Plus you get your name on our Indiegogo support page!

Be our
SafeTrek Smart Watch Tester! $100

We are
giving the chance for those super savvy techies out there to be a part of our trial
team and test the product before it is out on the market! You get to give us notes and feedback on the product! As a tester, you get to see the top
secret workings of the app before it goes live! You are also get our app for 1 year! Plus you get your name on our Indiegogo support page!

Corporate Package! $1,436

You get
100 codes for a 1 year subscription, which is 60% off our retail price. You can choose who gets the
codes and the one year starts when the app is downloaded, so there is no rush
to get them to everyone!

Co-Branded App $10,000

We will co-brand our app
to your company! We allow you to have our app with your company logo and
colors. You will get a special link to share with your employee or
friends, they will see your companies awesome safety app powered by SafeTrek when they download and open the app!
You will also get 200 free codes to go with your co-branded app. Any additional
codes you might need? No problem, it is 50% off the 1 year retail price!


The Impact
When you contribute to this campaign you are funding a safer
world! You can help us reach our goal of making people be and feel safer
anywhere they may be with the SafeTrek mobile app and soon the smart watch app!
We are passionate
individuals who sincerely believe in our product and know our experience in the
tech world will ensure our success. In fact, our team has a track record of
successful Indiegogo campaigns and software experience. One of the team members,
Robert Roderick, was part of the Breathometer Indiegogo campaign. Breathometer is a successful hardware and mobile
app for users to have a smartphone Breathalyzer. It was one of the top funded
projects on the Indiegogo site. With our past experience, we will be delivering you a great product! 
Risks & Challenges
One of the greatest things about our campaign is that we are already
so close to having an app completed, that with the amount of work we need to
do, there is very little risk. The more our supporters help SafeTrek, the
faster we can release the product! 
Our biggest challenge is the amount of funds we need to pay our
engineers. 
We expect to launch our app no later than 30 days after the
close of this campaign so that people may start downloading and using it
thereafter. Because this is such a fast turn around time our biggest risk is
that time may extend to the maximum of 45 days due to spreading out expenses. 
We believe in being open and honest and we keep you updated weekly on our progress. Even if our campaign is not fully funded, we are committed to delivering you an Apple Watch app! 100% guaranty!! 

Other Ways You Can Help
If you cannot contribute financially at this
time, you can still help us out by sharing our Indiegogo campaign with friends
and family. You can also email us and let us know what ideas you might have for
us at info@safetrekapp.com . Thank
you for your support in helping make the world a safer place for all of us.

story:
Greetings, I’m Dan Deulen, a fifth generation wood & metal worker. 
I'm on a mission to spare woodworkers from life changing table saw accidents. Each year, more than 67,000 workers and do-it-yourselfers are injured by table saws in the USA alone, according to the Consumer Product Safety Commission , resulting in more than 33,000 emergency room visits and 4,000 amputations, at an average cost of $35,000 each. These accidents lead to more than $2.3 billion in costs to society annually, including medical bills, lost wages, and pain and suffering. I have accomplished that mission with my Patent Pending invention "The Deulen Safety Fence". What I need from contributors is to help get the word out so these kinds of accidents will stop! http://www.sawaccidents.com/table-saw-injury-pi... 
Please help me get my Safety Fence to market.    I'm deeply in debt to my many generous family and friends who have helped me along my long journey to make this dream become a reality.  If you know of any woodworkers who still have

fingers and want to keep them, please share my campaign with them.Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Ask folks to get the word out and make some noise about your campaign.
  • Remind them to use the Indiegogo share tools!

And that's all there is to it.
