story:
Short Summary

Dolly is your child’s new best friend. Dolly is a smart, customized doll that will adapt to your child's educational needs.  Dolly can sing, play games and read stories. Dolly can be a virtual teacher and help your child develop new skills. Dolly has the ability to adjust the games and the stories to your child's educational requirements and age.

Dolly uses Wi-Fi to connect to the internet. It has a smart touch screen that is easy to use.

It is simple to navigate and ready to work right out of the box.


What We Need & What You Get

Dolly is a cuddly bear, designed as a personalized plush toy companion, which is a great developmental tool for children up to 9 years old.

Parents are able to choose the child's favorite apps , whether it be songs, videos, trivia, and games.

Dolly also features numerous activities to further enhance motor skills and language development, via interactive learning games while offering multiple levels of complexity built within.  Thus, allowing parents to adjust learning levels appropriately to the child's growth.

Dolly will amaze your child with its engaging storytelling, games, and dialogue! Not only is Dolly so much fun, but it's learning activities help further enhance motor skills and language development. 

Using WiFi and speech recognition technology, Dolly can interact individually with each child. They can ask her a questions and Dolly will give them the answer.

It's a whole new way to interact with toys.


Dolly includes On/Off line activities teaching counting, colors, animals and more, all of which adapt to the level your children's needs as they grow! At any time, parents can manually adjust learning levels appropriately as their child develops.


Dolly has a video, a photo camera and albums.  It also has a 8 GB memory card that stores all this to keep your child entertained for hours


Features

-Wi-fi

-4.2 Inch touch screen

-Blue tooth

-8 GB Memory card

-Android 4.4

-Support Google Play

-Video camera

-Photo camera

-Microphone

-On/Offline games

-On/Offline stories

-On/Offline songs

-You can talk to Dolly: Ask Dolly a question and it will answer you. 

-Age 0-9

-Educational games

-Auto switch off

-G sensor support screen rotation

-Battery: 1500mah (Included)

-Supports multiple languages: English, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Portuguese, Turkish, Italian, German, Chinese, French, Japanese, Polish, Ukrainian, Greek, Hebrew

You can play your child’s favorite music, record your own song or play some of Dolly's songs.

Dolly Will Grow with Your Child!

You have access to the entire Google Play Store and can download the relevant development apps for your kid.

Dolly is Kid Safe!

Worried about safety? Dolly will protect your child from offensive or sensitive words.

Shipping

Dolly is available worldwide. 

When do we start shipping?

Orders will begin to be fulfilled on April 2016. We will keep you notified of your Dolly's shipment date and tracking number.


Parent Control Panel



FAQ

Is Dolly easy to use? How do I use it? 

Dolly is easy for both parents and kids to use! Just switch Dolly on and click on the screen on the relevant Game / Story / Song.

What is Dolly actually like?
Dolly is like any other soft, cuddly bear. Its about 19 inches tall and can stay in a sitting position. Its very huggable with minimal “hard pieces” inside the body. Dolly is light weight and easy for a child to carry around.

Does the app have parent control?
Yes, you can determine which app will be available for your child and how much time they can play with Dolly.

Can I adjust the volume?
Yes, you can adjust the volume with the Screen Meter or press on Dolly's ears to increase or decrease the volume.

How can I download more apps to Dolly?
Easily, connect to Google Play and download any app you want.


What happens if I don't have Wi-Fi? 
In case you do not have Wi-Fi Dolly has off line games that your child can enjoy or just connect your Smartphone and share your Wi-Fi with Dolly.


Can I use Dolly without my Smartphone?
Yes, we designed Dolly with special care of independent play without the need of the parent's phone or monitor.

Does it have a front-facing video camera?
Yes, Dolly has a video & photo camera  and a mic.

Where are my photos/videos/songs stored? Who can access it?
Dolly has a 8GB memory card that you can take out or connect dolly to your computer using a USB cable then copy the photo/video/song.

Is it wireless?
Yes, Dolly connects to Wi-Fi for downloading, streaming, gaming and browsing.

How is it powered?
Dolly comes with an AC adapter AC100-240V 50-60Hz.

Who do I contact for investment opportunities?
Please contact support@MySmartDolly.com

Do you have distribution partnerships available?
Please contact support@MySmartDolly.com

Do you have offensive words block?
Yes. When you talk to Dolly or ask it a question you can be assured that Dolly will block off all offensive words.

Can Dolly be played with by both boys and girls?
Yes. Dolly is fun for both boys and girls.

Does Dolly have an On/Off switch?
Yes and an auto sleep system.

Do I need to pay for the application?
No. You can download as many application s as you want from Google Store.

Prototype Testimonial



Risks & Challenges

We put in a lot of time designing Dolly and interviewing parents to understand what would be most useful. We worked on several different prototypes and have already developed a network of industrial partners that we can count on to help manufacture Dolly. But before we can start manufacturing, we're bringing Dolly to you through Indiegogo to get the feedback and funds that we need to help make Dolly a reality. 

We currently have a working pre production product and we're now focused on finalizing the final details of Dolly. Furthermore, we are working on production rates with our manufacturing partners. Our team has years of experience in creating hardware products. We have been working closely with our manufacturing partner to guarantee a flawless product and we're confident that production and delivery will go without a hitch and comply with timings.

story:
Feast. Your. Eyes.

On the sexiest, and the most ethical antibacterial phone case out there.

 

 

 

 

 

Your Case provides amazing protection from drops and scratches, as the calcium carbonate creates has a natural shock-absorbing qualities. 

 

Case has a soft texture with bamboo fibre and wheat straw waste in structure.  High-quality real materials make our phone case so soft that you can't stop touching it. It's nice to your hands and to your surroundings. 

 

This biologic phone case is made with starches from sustainably harvested plants (bamboo waste and wheat straw waste). It meets standards for composting in an industrial composting facility and is completely free of BPA, phthalates, lead, and cadmium.

 

Your Phone Case doesn't consist of any plastic or animal leather. We refuse considering animals to be a manufacturing material. Once you switch to a new phone or case, you can simply put this one in a compost pit to nourish the soil.

 

It has natural grippy texture that avoids extremes. On the one side, it minimises the risk of slipping out of your hand. On the other side, you don't need to lose your patience each time you want to put your case in and out of the pocket. 

 

Our zero-waste phone case is shockproof up to 6 feet. Long lifespan, high protection and perfect functionality ensure that a phone case not only does its job as a phone protector but also as an earth-conscious one.

 

Why flexibility is an advantage? Sometimes, you need to slide your phone into the case. Hard cases make it difficult and occasionally these can scratch your Phone. 

 

We pick up germs when we open the doors to schools and office buildings, use ATM machines; since we constantly touch our phones, they become a repository for bacteria and viruses. If you are average smartphone user, you touch your smartphone more than 2,600 times a day.  

 

 

All phone cases are not created equal. This beautifully crafted phone protector lets you make earth consciousness a credible part of your personal message.

 

 

Are your bored of looking for a biodegradable phone case which enables you to create a customized message? 

 

 

BLACK SPACE

For the independent ones, strong-willed and those who are in control of themselves; we bring Black Space colour. It's associated with power, elegance, prestigiousness, and sophistication. Stay serious about our future with the colour of black space!

 

MINT GREEN

It is the colour of balance, forgiveness and compassion. Our favourite colour represents tranquillity to many people. In the hectic era of digital culture, a mint green case may be a subconscious attempt to reconnect with nature.

 

 

NAVY BLUE

The colour of the year. Our Navy Blue colour is representing confidence, authority, as well as intelligence, stability and unity. Elegance which connects us into the new era.

 

 

YELLOW SUN

Yellow is uplifting to the spirits. It helps create enthusiasm for life. In almost every culture yellow represents sunshine, happiness, high energy, and warmth. If your favourite colour is yellow, you look forward to the future.

 

 

PINK ROSE

The passion of red combined with the purity of white. The pink colour symbolizes friendship, affection, and approachability. It also stands for femininity, elegance, refinement and sweetness.   If you choose pink case, you are sensitive to the needs of others.

 

The current process of trading in and returning a product to be upcycled is complicated. So complicated that people avoid it. Brands in the old model do not want to use this service because it costs them a lot. We change it by making it easier. The easier, the better. 

It's a phone case that doesn't make you feel guilty. Get a discount each time you trade-in your old phone case. Save money while you do good. 

lImgWorlds first easy online solution to take your old case back and handle it responsibly. We manage the existence of our products from their birth until the end of their functional life. Solutions like this drive responsible economic development and reduce the flow of plastic into our oceans. You keep us responsible. 

 

It goes round and round and round in the circle... like the seasons.

We made it so easy that everybody can trade in an old phone case. We accept all phone case brands and we will upcycle them. That's the real end of the plastic era in everyday products. 

 

Below is the list of phone models we'll be supporting during this campaign. We start with iPhone models. Once we see there is a demand, we will release stretch goals unlocking cases for Android smartphones. 

 

 

We all love phone cases. But we also know that it often comes at a cost. The world produces 1.5 billion plastic phone cases a year. Generating a ton plastic waste. 

Of all the environmental challenges our world is currently facing, humanity's love affair with plastic is definitely one of the biggest. We use it because it's cheap and nearly indestructible, but that lasting power is exactly what makes it so harmful.

We are nature lovers and always try to find a purpose in everything we do. More than 2000 kilograms of toxic plastics end up in the sea every ten seconds. 40% of earth’s ocean areas are impacted by plastic. That’s isn’t affecting only sea animals, but also our health. Think of the fish you ate last time. Have you eaten only fish or microplastics too?

Most plastics take centuries to degrade, polluting the land and oceans with tiny particles called microplastics. They do an immense amount of harm to wild animals too. That's why we believe that every step you take towards reducing plastic use is valuable. Why not make a change today?

Your phone case no longer needs to be a danger for our environment. 

 

FUNDING IS NEEDED TO:

  • Launch manufacturing: Manufacturing, packaging, transportation and distribution.
  • Develop a technologically advanced website: trade-in software, customisable feature to a product page, tracking features for transparent reporting of each item. 
  • Integrate trade-in software with manufacturers, couriers, customers, recycling companies and industrial composting facilities. 
  • Collaborate and reward communities working on beach cleanups. 
  • Supporting communities focused on planting trees in selected areas.
  • Disrupt the e-commerce industry by being a leading sustainable accessories company at affordable prices (accessories are considered to be the worst retail niche for creating circular flow)
  • Invest in two moulds to produce new models which will be tested for ocean water biodegradation. 

Now we come to you, the early adopters, the leaders, the ones who decide how the world is shaped, to support our campaign to ignite this revolution and make the najture case the pioneer. With your help, we can change what a phone case can be. We can create a world where everyday lives are in perfect harmony with nature.

 

 

 

 

logun

 

 

 

 

 

                

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

During unprecedented times like the ones we are facing today, there are always unknowns for the future. We have made it our priority to develop products that will have the highest quality features. We believe in radical transparency so if any issues occur, we will let you know as quickly as possible. When you decide to become our Backer we will be proud to make you happy with our products and services. 

We have the highest level of confidence that we can provide the best quality phone cases to every one of our backers. After a rigorous prototyping process and an intensive search for the best manufacturing and logistics partners, we are prepared to exceed your expectations. 

We realize that there will be circumstances out of our control. We may face unexpected challenges, but it will make us stronger and our product better. We are committed to communicating with you with the utmost sense of sincerity and transparency for every bump in the road.

Develop a technologically advanced website: trade-in software, customisable feature to a product page, tracking features for transparent reporting of each item. 
Integrate trade-in software with manufacturers, couriers, customers, recycling companies and industrial composting facilities. 
Collaborate and reward communities working on beach cleanups. 
Supporting communities focused on planting trees in selected areas.
Disrupt the e-commerce industry by being a leading sustainable accessories company at affordable prices (accessories are considered to be the worst retail niche for creating circular flow)
Invest in two moulds to produce new models which will be tested for ocean water biodegradation. 
Now we come to you, the early adopters, the leaders, the ones who decide how the world is shaped, to support our campaign to ignite this revolution and make the najture case the pioneer. With your help, we can change what a phone case can be. We can create a world where everyday lives are in perfect harmony with nature.    logun                     RISKS AND CHALLENGESDuring unprecedented times like the ones we are facing today, there are always unknowns for the future. We have made it our priority to develop products that will have the highest quality features. We believe in radical transparency so if any issues occur, we will let you know as quickly as possible. When you decide to become our Backer we will be proud to make you happy with our products and services. We have the highest level of confidence that we can provide the best quality phone cases to every one of our backers. After a rigorous prototyping process and an intensive search for the best manufacturing and logistics partners, we are prepared to exceed your expectations. We realize that there will be circumstances out of our control. We may face unexpected challenges, but it will make us stronger and our product better. We are committed to communicating with you with the utmost sense of sincerity and transparency for every bump in the road.

story:
Quilt 2012:  The Digital Experiences

The AIDS Memorial Quilt will be on display in Washington DC in June - July 2012.

The AIDS Memorial Quilt is an unique work of international ARTS ACTIVISM that reflects the worldwide scope and personal impact of the AIDS pandemic. 

  • The textile Quilt is composed of 48,000 individual PANELS that commemorate more than 91,000 names.
  • The size of the physical Quilt measures more than 1.3 million square feet. If laid out in its entirety, it would cover more than 29 acres of land.
  • It would take a visitor more than 33 days to view every panel—spending only 1 minute at each panel.  
  • It is the largest LIVING MEMORIAL of its kind in the world. 

The year 2012 marks the 25th anniversary of the creation of the Quilt. In June 2012, the Quilt will be featured at the Smithsonian Folklife Festival in Washington DC.  In July 2012, te Quilt will be laid out—in its entirety—on the Mall of Washington for the first time since 1996. 

It will take four days (July 21-25) to display all 48,000 panels.  These events are part of the Quilt 2012 program sponsored by the NAMES Project Foundation—the non-profit organization that maintains and displays the Quilt.

We know that not everyone who has an interest in the AIDS Memorial QUILT can make the trip to Washington, DC this summer.  Moreover, the entire QUILT has grown so large that all the panels cannot be viewed in one session.

We have designed a mobile web app called AIDS QUILT TOUCH that enables people to SEARCH for a specific NAME on a panel and to CONTRIBUTE comments to a Digital Guest Book. For visitors in Washington DC this summer, this application will ALSO enable them to LOCATE the display of a specific panel when it is laid out on the National Mall.

OUR FUNDRAISING GOALS:

We seek support through this fundraising campaign to:

  • Complete the mobile web app -- this involves several groups of people working in small teams in different locations throughout the US;
    • $5k for web programmers
    • $5k for database re-configuration
    • $7.5k for image clean-up and recropping
    • $2.5k for site design 
    • $5k for rewards, reward mailings, and printed materials
  • Develop, print and disseminate user instructions for the several thousand visitors who are expected to view the Quilt this summer;
  • Attract a group of supporters who will get early access to the first release of the mobile web app, and have the first opportunities to submit comments to the Digital Guest Book.
  • Support a day-long set of panels discussing the Historical Lessons of the AIDS Pandemic, the Cultural Significance of the AIDS Memorial Quilt, and the plans for the creation of a Digital Archive of the Quilt and other materials.
THE IMPACT OF THIS PROJECT

We consider the development of the AIDS QUILT TOUCH mobile web app an appropriate use of digital technologies in the service of cultural good.  The aim is NOT to replace or interfere with the experience of viewing the textile Quilt, but to augment that experience and to extend the opportunity to view the Quilt to people all over the world through on-line access. 

After the Quilt 2012 events, the AIDS QUILT TOUCH mobile web app will continue to serve as a portal that enables people to browse the entire collection of Quilt panels, to read the many stories of the Quilt, to trace the travels of any single panel, and to participate in crowdsourcing information about individual panels.

WHO IS PARTICIPATING IN THIS DEVELOPMENT PROJECT

Anne Balsamo and the Public Interactives Research Team at the Annenberg School for Communication and Journalism at the University of Southern California (USC) are collaborating with the NAMES Project Foundation in Atlanta, GA to create several interactive digital experiences designed to augment the viewing of the physical Quilt during the summer Quilt 2012 events.  We have begun development of the web-based application in collaboration with the Digital Studio for the Public Humanities at the University of Iowa, under the direction of artist Jon Winet.  

Here are some of the WIREFRAMES for key pages of the AIDS QUILT TOUCH mobile web app.

Last year we received a small grant from the National Endowment of the Humanities to build a table-top browser that allows viewers to search through the massive database of Quilt images.  This interactive experience will ALSO be on display during the Quilt in the Capital events, but the size of the table limits the number of viewers who can use the browser at any given time.  

We want to make the Quilt images and information available to a greater number of people, so we are now building the AIDS QUILT TOUCH mobile web app.  

REWARDS for our BACKERS

We have a LIMITED time to create the digital application.

The public LAUNCH date for the first version of the AIDS Quilt Touch is June 27, 2012, in time for the opening of the Smithsonian Folklife Festival.  That version will launch with the NAME Search function.

If we reach our funding goal by July 8, 2012, we will proceed to finish and launch two additional functions for the AIDS Quilt Touch mobile web app:  the Digital Guest Book and the Panel Location Map.

We will make the mobile web app available early to all our financial backers, so that they can get the first experience browsing the extensive collection of digital images and information about Quilt panels and add the first entries to the Digital Guest Book.  During the Quilt 2012 events and afterwards, the mobile web app will be freely available for all users.

We appreciate all levels of support.  And we have a number of "thank you" gifts for our backers.  For supporters who have the means to contribute larger amounts, we offer rooms at a boutique hotel in Washington DC during the QUILT on the MALL events from July 20-25, 2012

If you have ever wanted to browse the AIDS Memorial Quilt, contribute a story about its meaning and significance, or support the work to make the Quilt stories available to a wider audience, this is your chance. 

Even if you cannot donate to this campaign, you can still contribute to the effort by spreading the word to your friends.  

Once the mobile web app is launched, please download it from www.aidsquilttouch.org.  Engaging with the Quilt panels and taking time to remember the activist efforts that are part of the history of AIDS in the US, helps raise awareness about the current status of HIV and AIDS not only in the US, but throughout the world.  

Thank you.

story:
NAVIGATE OUR CAMPAIGN

iQi Our Perks
What is iQi Koolpuck charger
Why iQi FAQ
Media Coverage



“Technology is at its very best; is at its most empowering when it simply disappears” – Jony Ive

iQi MOBILE FOR iPHONE

Seamless wireless power for iPhone 5, 5C, 5S & iPod Touch (5G)

 

FAST...

EASY… 

SEAMLESS…


iQi Mobile blends into your phone by slipping under most soft cases. So seamless you will forget it’s there.

iQi for iPhone is incredibly easy way to wirelessly charge your iPhone.

It’s  smaller and thinner than your credit card, at only 0.5mm at its thinnest point to 1.4mm.

No need for ugly unsightly and bulky charging cases. Set it down and go about your day, when you need it just grab and go! Great for those that are always on the run because there is no fussing with wires. Now that’s smart technology! 

MEDIA COVERAGE:
top

Gigaom: Want to add a skinny wireless charger to your iPhone? iQi is it

Cult of Mac: Wireless iPhone Charger Slim Enough To Fit Inside Your Case 

iPhone Islam:  اشحن جهازك لاسلكياً مع iQi

AppleWeblog: iQi, el cargador inalámbrico para iPhone más cómodo del mundo

MacNewsWorld: iQi Mobile Wireless Charging for iPhone Is a Cool Convenience 

iSpazio: Qi, il sistema di carica ad induzione per i nuovi iPhone con connettore lightning

iFun: Induktive iPhone-Ladestation im Kreditkarten-Format

Mobile Syrup: iQi brilliantly adds wireless charging to the iPhone

GQ Japan: iPhoneの厚みをほぼ変えず、置くだけで充電できる魔法のシート 

Geeky Gadgets: iQi Mobile Wireless iPhone Charger Launches On Indiegogo (video) 

Slash Gear: iQi Mobile adds iPhone wireless charging to any soft case 

Qi wireless: Indiegogo Campaign Aims To Create Wireless Charger For iOS Devices 

iPhone Italia: iQi, il caricatore wireless per iPhone

Kevin C. Tofel at Gigaom takes and in depth preview of the iQi Mobile preproduction model:

WHAT IS iQi MOBILE?
top

iQi Mobile is a Qi standard wireless charging receiver with a uniquely designed lightning connector attached via an ultra-thin flexible ribbon cable. The iQi Mobile powers your iPhone conveniently through the lightning connector, that seamlessly disappears behind your soft iPhone case. This technology enables you to top off your charge on any Qi compatible charging pad, like the Koolpuck charger.

WHY iQi MOBILE?
top


Not only are irritating and messy wires a thing of the past so are battery life woes, as charging becomes effortless, just set down your phone on any Qi charging pad to top up charge anywhere.

Use iQi everyday...

and everywhere.

Effortlessly charge on kitchen counter in the morning

or when inspiration strikes...

...or when in a rush.

OUR PERKS:
top

We have upgraded all bundle perks with a free case streched reward after we reached 50K.



LIMITED EDITION KOOLPUCK CHARGER DETAILS:
top

  • Charges any Qi compatible receiver or device, and of course the iQi Mobile.
  • Available in 14 colours.,basic black & white model with special back and front silicone grips in 7 colours.
  • Only 70mm diameter and 11mm in height, smaller than a hockey puck.
  • Powered by any powered USB port (fastest charging at 1000mA  or higher).
  • Box content: Koolpuck  and 1.5m MicroUSB to USB cable.
  • A vote has determined that the Limited Edition Koolpuck charger will have audible alert and green to blue LED change when charge initiates.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS
top

Will iQi Mobile work with my iDevice?

iQi Mobile is designed to work with iPhone 5, 5C, 5S and iPod Touch (5th generation) only.

What is Qi Wireless Charging?

It's the use of a simple coil receiver in the device which interfaces with the charging pad’s coil to transmitter. 

What do I need to Charge my iPhone Wirelessly?

In order to have a complete wireless charging system, you will need both a receiver (iQi Mobile), a transmitter (Koolpuck) and soft case of your iPhone.

Where can I get a Qi charging pad?

Bundle Perks will include iQi Mobile (the receiver) and the Koolpuck charger ( the transmitter). iQi Mobile is compatible with any Qi compatible charging pad, such as our Koolpuck and Koolpad. 

How fast will iQi Mobile charge my phone?

iQi Mobile will charge your iPhone faster than a USB 2 port on Mac or PC (500mA)

Will my iPhone get hot while Charging?

No. iQi Mobile has been throughly tested and charges well below Below 45°C

Is iQi Mobile Apple certified?

iQi Mobile is not part of the MFi program, and as such is not Apple certified. It works well with iOS 7.0.4.

When will I get my iQi Mobile perks?

We aim to have First batch of Indiegogo iQi Mobile perks fulfilled in time for Christmas.

The second batch will be in early 2014.

When is the scheduled launch date for retail of the iQi Mobile?

The scheduled launch date for the full retail iQi Mobile is 2014 at the retail price of $35. Orders will be shipped from EU or USA.

What if I want to upgrade my perk?

Just upgrade to the  bundle you want, contribute the difference and send us a private comment.

Is the iQi Mobile compatible with my soft case?

Most soft cases (at least all the hundreds we tested) work with the iQi Mobile effortlessly and leaving unnoticeable bump, the softer the case, the less noticeable.

Is the iQi Mobile compatible with a hard case?

iQi Mobile is not compatible with normal hard cases. The hard plastics will not be able to mold itself around the iQi Mobile like the soft cases will.

Is iQi Mobile compatible with my particular brand of case?

We have not tested all brands of cases but have found the majority of soft cases to work with iQi Mobile seamlessly

Are you doing any variations of the iQi?

Yes, we are bringing out two variations of the iQi Mobile:

iQi Mobile - designed for iPhones and iPod touch

Please note: We have put the iQi Air for iPad on hold to focus on the iQi Mobile for the moment.

Still have questions or comments? 
Email us: iqi@fonesalesman.com

story:
Short Summary

There are three members of our team: Chandler Newsome, Jorge Carrillo, and Ty Griffiths. Our company is Okeoke Poro, which by interpretation means "rolling ball" in Maori, the traditional language of New Zealand where these zorbing balls originated. We are constantly searching for interactive ways to have fun, and so when we saw this activity we were sold. We desire to bring that fun to Utah Valley and at an affordable price so families, friends, and groups can participate.

What We Need & What You Get

The funding we receive will go towards purchasing the zorbing balls from the manufacturer. This is by and large our greatest expense and need a lot of assistance in seeing that it is met. That being said, we do not expect free money. We offer a variety of perks, a couple of which act as early reservations on playing this yourself for free! If, in the end, we are unable to achieve our goal we will still utilize all available funds towards purchasing the balls.

The Impact

Okeoke Poro is a great way for a group to experience laughter, excitement, bonding, and physical activity together. It is our hope that families, friends, and communities will become more unified through zorbing. If nothing else, we desire to provide a good time at an affordable price. 

Other Ways You Can Help

The fundraising goal we've set by no means encapsulates our costs. Donations of any amount are greatly appreciated and not without reward. If, however, you are unable to support Okeoke Poro financially, feel free to share our link with others via social media or other means. Indiegogo makes sharing easy with the variety of tools they have available. Thank you so much for any assistance you are able to provide!

story:
Today, Most project involves standards like USB, I2C and UART. It has been a tedous time in debugging these protocols while the availiable tools are with narrow functionalities or higher costs. We are working on developing a ultra low cost product which will be all in one analyzer for debugging USB , I2C and UART . We are developing this product so that this product can be easily modified to support more protocols and functionalities.

SmartAnalyzer is a project to design & Develop a device that will allow the capturing , Inspection and debugging of USB , I2C and UART traffic that will help with the reverse engineering and debugging of various hardware devices, SmartAnalyzer will be a great tool for developers working with Protocols like USB , I2C and UART . The project is created by Ameen and Team from an early stage Startup WaferLabs .

We have named it a SmartAnalyzer as we are planning to add most of the debugging functionality which any developer may think of while  dealing with protocols like USB , I2C and UART and are also thinking out possibilities to extend the product to support other protocols with the most easy and compact updates.

Protocol analysis and reverse engineering is necessary for most of the hardware projects and these tasks rely on the real-time capture of data traffic. there are a couple of devices availiable which are either too costly or with too limited functionality .Software-based analyzers are also available, but again, only useful in certain limited applications.

Most of the Hardware based protocol analyzers are quite expensive and are usually out of the reach of most independent developers, hobbyists and hackers. The most popular products cost $1000+ and, with few exceptions, support only USB or I2c debugging . Also there are lots of limitations which most of us across have already experienced.

SmartAnalyzer will be a complete one stop analysis and debugging device  that can capture USB 1.1/2.0 (high-speed, full-speed and low-speed) , I2C and UART traffic between a target  and the connected host . SmartAnalyzer can be configured with a very easy GUI based application where in the user is provided with options to select the protocol, A variety of trigger options , capture size/window options and more on .

We also are planning to keep few reserved pins to extend the functionality of our device in near future. We hope to eventually support additional sniffing interfaces (SPI, SD card , etc) and extend the device capability to the utmost possible.

The SmartAnalyzer device is self powered meaning which is that there is no necessary for additional power sources . It will be powered from the USB connected to the PC where the data will be delivered and stored 

Our team is having strong hands on experience in developing various debugging products like High precision oscilloscope, sniffers and logic analyzers.  We are presently working on bring this low cost  and high precision product with a mix of our technical expertise .

We have been working on this project in various forms for over two years now, and large parts of the hardware design have already been proven. We think we can produce a device that will be affordable to many, but only if we can buy all of the components in bulk and afford to have some prototypes professionally assembled.

We need considerable investment so that we can build the next innovative and low cost product for the embedded hardware industry . We need more team to work on completing the prototype and more team to throughout test and validate the design. Hence more engineering cost  . Althrough we do even require investments for buying the components in bulk , its assembly and again, throughout testing . We hope our research and effort will be a of a considerable value to the hardware industry .

We do have experienced and qualified engineers to deliver this project but since w eare still a startup , we are very limited with resources . we need your financial and moral support to bringout our prototype and first production runs. Depending on your level of support, you will get various tokens of our appreciation, and you will be an important person in making SmartAnalyzer a successful and resourceful product for the industry.

Our team is progressing well on the schematics ,  firmware, FPGA HDL / Programming, and GUI software. Funding this project will ultimately help speeding up the ongoing development and will help us cross the barriers to cover the engineering and fabrication costs. We think with your support we will be able to deliver this project at the earliest possible time . SmartAnalyzer will indeed be a  great product to debug and analyze serial data .

Few of the features of SmartAnalyzer are as follows-

  • Debug and analyze USB , I2C and UART devices
  • High precision sampling
  • Multiple triggering options including external trigger, trigger based on time, etc
  • User Friendly GUI interface with smart data analyzer
  • Multichannel with reserved pins / channels
  • Real Time data Analysis
  • Self powered device - no extra power supply needed
  • Easy analysis and display and Lot more

We are currently building a webpage which will let you know more about the work progress and the features of the product . 

Thanks

story:
FuelBox has been declared winner of Indiegogo's Maker Challenge sponsored by Amazon & Autodesk!!

Here at Team FuelBox, we are inspiring entrepreneurs everywhere to build & launch their own companies and chase their dreams!


We've worked extremely hard to get this far! We'd love to hear your thoughts on Facebook & Twitter...


In today's world, you need to stay connected to stay on top. And to do this,

YOU NEED POWER!

FuelBox has you covered. We’ve created the FuelBox Ultimate Charging Solution (Dock + boostPack). The Ultimate Charging Solution is the first 2-in-1 charging solution providing both stationary charging at home or in the office with mobile charging on-the-go! Plus, it's full compatible with all your favorite mobile devices. There’s nothing else like the FuelBox Ultimate Charging Solution on the market. No more cords to lose, no more mess or waste, no more overloaded outlets…no more losing touch as your phone loses power.

The Ultimate Charging Solution is a combination of a stationary docking base and a mobile battery pack with 25+ hours of extra battery life. It can handle all your charging needs both at home and on the go. 

Stay connected. Stay on top. Power your life.


FuelBox in Robert and Dan’s words:

When the FuelBox idea was first developing, we knew we had a great idea. But many people told us we couldn’t make it happen. They said we were too young and too green to create a new innovative and successful mobile charging solution in a market filled with large companies. But we didn’t believe them and our first product –The Ultimate Charging Solution– has now launched!

It all started one day as we searched for our roommate’s lost phone charger – again.. We realized there’s got to be a better solution. We looked around at what was available on the market and it was clear: nothing was good enough. 

We quickly became passionate about creating a BETTER universal solution – with everything you need in one place. The ONLY charger you will ever need, at home and on-the-go. Less stuff, less waste, no more cords to lose. More life-friendly. A better way to stay connected. And more fuel to power our busy lives.

But we didn’t want to just create a new product. We want to lead a revolution that will change the way you charge your mobile device. A charger that is life friendly, sleek, efficient and powerful. 

Many people told us our idea would never work – two guys like us could never build a product like this and make it successful. We were told we could never make a viable product from scratch…BUT WE DID! So to all of the entrepreneurs out there, never give up on your dreams!

FuelBox is leading a revolution that will change the way we charge our mobile devices because...

Your impact:

Your contributions help fuel a dream, a revolution, AND you get your very own Ultimate Charging Solution – the last charger you will ever need! It’s a win-win situation.

Your contributions will also help us take on the big boys and get the Ultimate Charging Solutions on store shelves. Plus, Robert is tired of sleeping in a tent in Dan’s backyard. He’s been working without pay for three years, these funds will help get a roof over his head – El Nino is coming. 


Please take just a minute or two to join the revolution and help us spread the word about FuelBox and the Ultimate Charging Solution and bring us to life! Here's how we will be using your contributions..

Ohh, we almost forgot we have some more good news for you. We've designed the FuelBox Ultimate Charging Solution to be incredibly easy to install. Simply plug the FuelBox Ultimate Charging Solution into your outlet and you're ready to go!


1. When will I get to choose the color of my pre-ordered products? Following the end of the campaign and prior to kicking off manufacturing, all backers will be contacted to confirm their color preferences! FuelBox products come in two elegant colors: Moonrock White or Astro Gray. 

2. Will the FuelBox Ultimate Charging Solution work with my iPhone 4/4s or older versions? We've eliminated the old Apple® 30-pin chargers, however you can still plug your old charging cords into the Dock's surge protected outlets or USB port to recharge. The old generation Apple® devices are phasing out of the market, but until they do, let's keep you fully powered shall we?

3. Will the Ultimate Charging Solution work with my iPhone 5/5s/5c & iPhone 6/6+?  Yes it will! We have 2 built-in Apple® certified Lightning-pin chargers so you can charge all of your new generation Apple® devices without a problem as well.

4. What else can the Ultimate Charging Solution charge? Glad you asked! Because of the elegant and efficient universal design, the FuelBox Ultimate Charging Solution charges thousands of devices including all Apple® devices (iPads included), Samsung®, LG®, HTC®, Android® & Motorolla® devices, e-readers, GoPros, e-cigs and anything else charged with a Micro-USB device. It is truly the best charging solution on the market!! 

5. Am I supposed to manually add shipping if I'm not in the US? Yes, you have to add shipping on top of your selected perk if you're outside of the United States. Sorry friends around the world, wish we didn't have to! When you pledge, please manually add an additional $10 to the price of the perk you want. 

6. Help! What do I do if I forget to pay for shipping? No problem. Click the contribute now button at the top of the page and manually enter $10. It will be added to your pledge amount. Enter the same personal information you did on your initial order. We will do the matching ourselves at the end of the campaign.

7. When are you going to be shipping my Ultimate Charging Solutions?  Indiegogo isn't like Amazon or other online stores where you get the product you ordered next week. When you contribute to FuelBox on Indiegogo you are funding all of our engineering, tooling process, manufacturing, shipping and everything that is needed to bring a premium quality product to market. Because we truly appreciate your support in helping bring FuelBox to life, you are receiving special early adopter prices (only on Indiegogo) for pre-ordering!  Our estimated delivery date is September 2015. Thanks again for supporting the dream!!

8. I asked for my perk to be sent to the wrong address! What do I do? We will be contacting all our backers at the end of the campaign and prior to shipping about your perk choice. When we do, please respond and let us know the correct address where you would like your Ultimate Charging Solutions shipped.

9. What is the battery size in the boostPack? Another good question! We have a built-in 5200 mAh battery. For those of you who don't care for the technical terms, that's approximately 25+ hours of extra battery in your pocket, purse, or however else you choose to carry your boostPack. Stay connected, stay on top, power your life!

10. Are FuelBox products MFi certified (Made for iPhone--Apple® stamp of approval)? Our manufacturing partner is a long-time MFi certified vendor and we have been working alongside them in order to meet Apple's guidelines. The MFi certification is a lengthy, multi-step process, however we are taking all of the right steps to produce the highest quality product for you, our backers, as physically possible!

11. Can you give me a short synopsis about FuelBox? Headquartered in beautiful Santa Barbara, California, FuelBox Inc is a rapidly developing technology start-up committed to providing better, life-friendly charging solutions for mobile devices. Back in late 2011, FuelBox started as an innovative idea that incubated for many months at the Scheinfeld Center for Entrepreneurship & Innovation at Santa Barbara City College. FuelBox founders (and Santa Barbara City College graduates) Robert Herr and Dan Friedman then invested countless hours, days, months and years of hard work to develop a unique and innovative universal charging solution for mobile devices.

Do you have any questions we didn't answer? Please contact our campaign and send us any and all questions you may have. We'd love to hear your feedback!

-Team FuelBox

story:
We need your help to fund the launch of Qrate Search!

Qrate Search is being developed by two guys in thier spare time while working full time to pay their mortgages. They need your help to pay for servers and additional development on their new system. Together we can change the way people search the internet! 

What We Need & What You Get

All of the funds will go directly into the development of the site. Our goal does not even come close to what we need to make this happen. However, if we hit it, we will be super enthusiastic knowing that people out there care about curated search results! 

We will reward you with points that can be redeemed after certain traffic targets are hit, this allows us all to benefit from the development of Qrate Search! 

The Impact

This sytem has the potential to change the way we make decisions in life. Each month over 615 million people search Google for phrases including "Best" and "Top"... We plan to answer those queries with fantastic socially curated results. By integrating social networking functionality, we could concievably take huge market share from every major information based social and search platfrom you can think of, and give a huge chunk of the profits back to the users!  

Other Ways You Can Help

If you're short on change, don't sweat it. We can relate to that...

We still need your help! 

When the site goes live November 4th, be one of the first ones on it to start creating and Qrating content! Sign up at the current holding page to be the first ones notified when we launch this Sunday!

story:
With an Aerospace Grade Battery (12000mAh) and Super Fast Intelligent Charging (SFICTM) the multi-purpose energy supply box has enough power to jump-start your car and only requires 1.5 hours charge-time. Enhanced with PITTM Jump Start Technology, KAENTM is extremely safe and usable in any weather condition. Accessories shipped with KAENTM can also provide emergency power for your laptop, tablet or mobile phone.

This device is very small. It is so small that it can fit into your automobiles glove box.It is unique in the sense that compared the competition’s product which is large, clunky and will cost you a fortune, KAENTM is affordable, compact and ideal for any type of emergency use”.

                                                                                                                                                           

Did you ever meet below problem?

 


                                                                                                                                                          

The Best Solution: KAEN, the worlds first portable, safe and intelligent car emergency energy box

What can KAEN do?

1. Jump-start your car Safe, Fast & Intelligent

2. Charging everything safely, fast and intelligently.

Why is KAEN so special?
1. KAEN is SAFE as it comes with Aerospace Grade Battery.

KAEN comes with a 12000mAh battery, which is aerospace grade battery. It is normally used in the kits which is allowed used in airplane, like tablet specially designed for airplane and etc.

2. KAEN is FAST, It comes with SFIC Fast Charging


SFIC (Super Fast Intelligent Charging) is KAEN's special technology. it takes only 10minutes to charge iphone;and it takes only 1.5 hours charge-time for 12000mAh battery full charged. Change & go!

3. KEAN is INTELLIGENT, It comes with PIT® Jump Start Technology

PIT® (Professional Auto Intelligent emergency Jump-start Technology) makes KAEN safe & easy when you make jump-start. 

                                                                                                                                                         

We are on the news:


                                                                                                                                                        

Tips:

What is Aerospace Grade Battery?

 KAEN comes with a 12000mAh battery, which is aerospace grade battery. It is normally used in the kits which is allowed used in airplane, like tablet specially designed for airplane and etc.

1.Cells are with smallest positve and negative electrode microcrystal material, it makes Lithiumion move fast and react quickly. The battery provides high power, like 100c-rate. 

2.The battery comes with a special electrolyte, it makes electrode move faster. It charges and  discharges up to 100 times, faster than normal one.

3.Cell comes with a better internal structure, which lower down the rate of internal short-circuit.

4.KAEN cell is with Ceramic diaphragm, resist of short-circuit caused by heat .

What is SFIC Fast Charging?

SFIC (Super Fast Intelligent Charging) is KAEN's special technology. it takes only 10minutes to charge iphone;and it takes only 1.5 hours charge-time for 12000mAh battery full charged. Change & go!

What's PIT Jump Start Tech?


PIT (Professional Auto Intelligent emergency Jump-start Technology) makes KAEN especially safe & easy when you make jump-start. ALL KAEN  come with a PIT BOX. Even you put the two clips together, it still works and no fire.

High Current: PIT Box provides a 200~600A current in a short time, which makes you jump-start any car.

Intelligent protection: PIT BOX knows when to give this high current, when not. 

Special situation: with PIT BOX, KAEN powers your car even with car battery!

                                                                                                                                                         
KAEN'S Specifiation:




What We Need & What You Get

Developing cutting edge technology isn't easy, and it's also very costly/time intensive. With your support, we can finally hit  the cost for mass production, and meet the factory's minimum order quantities. Especially for our battery,we need order some special material to make it, which cost around 10,000usd.

Current Progress: We already have fully functional versions of KAEN. The overall build is excellent and identical to what would be the mass produced version.

Manufacturing Production Plan: A large cash outlay is always required to start production. Plastic molds, high quality battery cells and circuit boards need to be purchased upfront. Our production plan is starting. We are making our tooling. It will make us one months for the tooling. After that, we will do MAX production, same time as our champion finish time. 

The Final Product: The final products would be in your hand before the end of October, if we funded successfully.

Our Core Team:




    Risks & Challenges

    One of the biggest challenges is the manufacturing process. Quality control will be at the top of the list and most important issue. There are many reasons why the manufacturer's cooperation will not be easy. We understand that Indiegogo backers want their product as soon as possible, but we are limited by factory's capabilities. In our experience, most pre-production samples still have a slight variation from the final mass produced unit.
story_txt:
With an Aerospace Grade Battery (12000mAh) and Super Fast Intelligent Charging (SFICTM) the multi-purpose energy supply box has enough power to jump-start your car and only requires 1.5 hours charge-time. Enhanced with PITTM Jump Start Technology, KAENTM is extremely safe and usable in any weather condition. Accessories shipped with KAENTM can also provide emergency power for your laptop, tablet or mobile phone.

This device is very small. It is so small that it can fit into your automobiles glove box.It is unique in the sense that compared the competition’s product which is large, clunky and will cost you a fortune, KAENTM is affordable, compact and ideal for any type of emergency use”.
                                                                                                                                                           
Did you ever meet below problem?
 




                                                                                                                                                          The Best Solution: KAEN, the worlds first portable, safe and intelligent car emergency energy box

What can KAEN do?
1. Jump-start your car Safe, Fast & Intelligent
2. Charging everything safely, fast and intelligently.



Why is KAEN so special?

1. KAEN is SAFE as it comes with Aerospace Grade Battery.


KAEN comes with a 12000mAh battery, which is aerospace grade battery. It is normally used in the kits which is allowed used in airplane, like tablet specially designed for airplane and etc.
2. KAEN is FAST, It comes with SFIC Fast Charging




SFIC (Super Fast Intelligent Charging) is KAEN's special technology. it takes only 10minutes to charge iphone;and it takes only 1.5 hours charge-time for 12000mAh battery full charged. Change & go!
3. KEAN is INTELLIGENT, It comes with PIT® Jump Start Technology



PIT® (Professional Auto Intelligent emergency Jump-start Technology) makes KAEN safe & easy when you make jump-start. 
                                                                                                                                                         

We are on the news:








                                                                                                                                                        
Tips:
What is Aerospace Grade Battery?
 KAEN comes with a 12000mAh battery, which is aerospace grade battery. It is normally used in the kits which is allowed used in airplane, like tablet specially designed for airplane and etc.
1.Cells are with smallest positve and negative electrode microcrystal material, it makes Lithiumion move fast and react quickly. The battery provides high power, like 100c-rate. 
2.The battery comes with a special electrolyte, it makes electrode move faster. It charges and  discharges up to 100 times, faster than normal one.



3.Cell comes with a better internal structure, which lower down the rate of internal short-circuit.
4.KAEN cell is with Ceramic diaphragm, resist of short-circuit caused by heat .

What is SFIC Fast Charging?
SFIC (Super Fast Intelligent Charging) is KAEN's special technology. it takes only 10minutes to charge iphone;and it takes only 1.5 hours charge-time for 12000mAh battery full charged. Change & go!


What's PIT Jump Start Tech?


PIT (Professional Auto Intelligent emergency Jump-start Technology) makes KAEN especially safe & easy when you make jump-start. ALL KAEN  come with a PIT BOX. Even you put the two clips together, it still works and no fire.

High Current: PIT Box provides a 200~600A current in a short time, which makes you jump-start any car.
Intelligent protection: PIT BOX knows when to give this high current, when not. 
Special situation: with PIT BOX, KAEN powers your car even with car battery!
                                                                                                                                                         KAEN'S Specifiation:


  What We Need & What You Get 
Developing cutting edge technology isn't easy, and it's also very costly/time intensive. With your support, we can finally hit  the cost for mass production, and meet the factory's minimum order quantities. Especially for our battery,we need order some special material to make it, which cost around 10,000usd.
Current Progress: We already have fully functional versions of KAEN. The overall build is excellent and identical to what would be the mass produced version.
Manufacturing Production Plan: A large cash outlay is always required to start production. Plastic molds, high quality battery cells and circuit boards need to be purchased upfront. Our production plan is starting. We are making our tooling. It will make us one months for the tooling. After that, we will do MAX production, same time as our champion finish time. 
The Final Product: The final products would be in your hand before the end of October, if we funded successfully.
  Our Core Team:









  Risks & Challenges  One of the biggest challenges is the manufacturing process. Quality control will be at the top of the list and most important issue. There are many reasons why the manufacturer's cooperation will not be easy. We understand that Indiegogo backers want their product as soon as possible, but we are limited by factory's capabilities. In our experience, most pre-production samples still have a slight variation from the final mass produced unit.

story:
Short Summary

We are making an awesome-looking and simple-to-use wishlist service that works on the web and in mobile - without ads, spam or selling user information to others. Unlike virtually any other social service. WishSimply will be the best tool for co-ordinating gifts/wishes.

My Story

Have you or your kids ever received gifts that were unwanted, duplicated or just inappropriate? Or wrong size? Or have you had problems inventing gifts for somebody else?

Wouldn't it be nice to be able to tell others easily what you would like to get and also find out what others would like to get?

I would certainly like that.

Ever since I got married almost 15 years ago and made a wishlist for wedding gifts, I've been trying to find a good wishlist service. I've used several, but all of them have had big issues. Most of them are limited to the offering of one shop. Others have a user interface that is so bloated and messy I had a hard time figuring it out myself. There's no way I can share a list like that with anybody. The point of the wishlist is to save time, not to turn me into a help desk person. Also, many services have ads that may even make it hard to distinguish between what's actually being wished and what's just an ad. A media-savvy person will manage, but what about kids or senior citizens?

Later, it's also become a matter of protecting my personal data. A wishlist service would get data on what I like and wish and the people I know, including their email addresses. Do I want to give those data to a company that reserves the right to do what it pleases with them? Or to a company with shady affiliate agreements that are only mentioned in the small print? A company that places various cookies and beacons to my computer to make tracking me efficient? Most of all, do I want to ask others to use a service like that? Nope. I can make my own decisions, but I don't want to endorse a service that's not going to keep its hands off from my friends' and family's data.

I worked for an online stock brokerage company/exchange traded bank for almost 15 years. I led the software development department that made almost all the core services, from client applications and web pages to automated order management systems. After the bank was acquired, I got the opportunity to work on this project that I had long had in my mind, and I knew I could do well.

Solution - What does WishSimply offer?

WishSimply does all you need it to do. It has a clean and nice GUI without ads. It's optimized for simplicity. This is derived from stock trading applications, where time is money and unclarity will make huge costs.

It has very simple processes, but still everything that is needed. Everything you need is in the same view. This is possible, because the service doesn't have ads that take up space from the screen. It also has two layouts, one optimized for a big screen and the other optimized for small mobile devices. We haven't made a compromise layout that would serve neither screen size well.

Beautiful and Simple GUI

WishSimply service has a beautiful, clean and simple GUI. We've put everything you need in one screen, and in normal use you don't need to change page. This might sound surprising at first, but the GUI is very spacious and makes clever use of in-line pop-ups that keep the context clear all the time. The controls are clear and big. The service is used from a web browser, but it feels more like an application than a web page.

The first time you use the service, there is a wizard on top of the GUI that shows you hands-on how to use the service in 2 or 3 steps, depending on whether you are creating your own list or using somebody else's list.

Not limited to any one shop

WishSimply is not bound or limited to any particular shop. This means that you can add to this service any wishes you want. You can add items from any shop you like or you can add wishes that are not available in any shop. You can use this service for sharing the wishes of anyone, from your toddler to your grandmother. You can use it for name giving, birthday, graduation, Christmas, wedding or any other event.

No Ads

WishSimply doesn't serve ads, send spam or have any affiliate agreements now or later. We consider this a very important aspect of the service we want to provide and we are committed to not changing this part of the service in the future.

Not showing ads in the service enables us to provide you a better service by making the GUI clean and pleasant instead of distracting. We can maximize the page area and show you more of the stuff that really matters than other services.

Protecting your and your friends' privacy

As WishSimply doesn't serve ads, send spam or have affiliate agreements, it doesn't need your information. WishSimply doesn't give or sell your information further. WishSimply also excludes the option to change that part of the service later on, so you will know that it won't change in the future either. Quite an exceptional and refreshing approach compared other social services, isn't it?

All personal information that is filled to the service is used for providing the service for you and your friends that you have invited to the service. Connection to the service is protected with the same SSL technology that banks use, making it virtually impossible for outsiders to get your data.

How does it work?

Login to the service and follow a wizard that shows you how to use the service in three simple steps: 1) add wishes to your list, 2) fill in event and list details, and 3) share your list with your friends.

The view your friends have to your list is almost exactly like your own. The only difference is that the only thing they can do is mark wishes fulfilled, and if you have many lists, they only see the list that is shared with them.

The people you invite to the service will receive your personal message (if you have typed one) and a unique link to the service. By clicking the link they are directed directly to your list and presented with a brief introduction to the service. Then they are guided to use the service with two simple steps involving two clicks. One on an image and one on a button. And that's all! You can't make it simpler. The service is easy to use for all, from children to seniors.

End result

No more duplicates and gift replacements. No more gifts that end up hidden in the storage room or garage. Less headache for inventing gifts. Event and gift conversations are neatly in one place.

Why IndieGoGo?

What I really want is to connect with people who value this project and its principles. And putting your money where your mouth is is an easy way to prove it. I have set the pledges very low so that showing support won't be an issue for anyone.

I am not so much collecting money with this project, although everything is very welcome and I hope that the funding goal will go over many times. So far, I've been putting money to this project from my own pocket, and anything that this IndieGoGo campaign will manage to collect will be used to further develop this service for you and everybody else.

Later on, this service will be collecting the money needed for its upkeep from web shops that interact with it by using a 'Wish' button (similar to the Facebook 'Like' button or Pinterest 'PinIT' button). Shops will also love this service, but that is another story. If you want to find out more, you can find more information about that in the WishSimply.com About Us section.

In this IndieGoGo project, I'm offering a limited-time opportunity for a very limited number of participants to be among the first to join this service. To take part in making a great service. Something that you can proudly recommend to your friends. Something that looks great, works smoothly, is safe to use and won't mess with your or their user data.

We've just seen how another privacy-honoring project (ello) got over 5 million in funding, and has 3 million users waiting invitation to the service.

Jump in now before the seats are gone and help create a better world where companies will respect their users.

(I have no doubt that this project would get the money should I seek it, but with your small donations we can stay independent together.)

What You Get

  • A great feeling that you have participated in creating this unique, great and useful social web service that will help you, your family and your friends now and in the many coming highlight moments in their life.
  • You take your privacy back by showing that there is a need for privacy-respecting services like this. You are not a product!
  • An account in this service among the first users and updates in the future.
  • The privilege to participate in deciding how the service is developed in the future
  • A letter from the original Finnish Santa Claus (operated since 1950) with a personal message (written by me), where Santa Claus will thank you (by mentioning your name) for supporting this project and making his work easier. The letter will be franked with the Arctic Circle's special postmark that you can't get from anywhere else. It's so cool! You can hang that letter on your wall, and show it proudly to your whole family! 

The Impact

In addition for being the best wishlist service, we will protect your personal data and respect your privacy. According the latest Peer Research survey, 90% of people believe that they have lost control over their privacy. If this project is a success, chances are that other services will follow suite, and users will start getting their privacy back piece by piece. I would like to see that and help make it happen.

Risks & Challenges

The service is ready to use, and we have been using it already for more than a year while developing it further. The mobile apps are also working already, and are being fine tuned at the moment. They will be submitted in app stores asap. There is a risk that Appstore won't accept our app in time, but we have done and submitted two other apps in appstore before, so we have quite a good understanding of the process, and we are confident that it will be there by the time this campaign is over. In case of any delays, I will be transparent about them and will update you.   

Our service has been load tested, but real usage is always different from test data. Participation in this project is limited, so we believe that the service can easily handle that. Should this not be the case, we are determined to delay any further features and put all focus on fixing possible churns and improving the service for existing users. (We are using this service ourselves, too, so we're in the same boat with everyone else.)

Other Ways You Can Help

If you like this project please spread the word. Post it on Facebook, Twitter, or any social media that you use. All that is very valuable, and to encourage you to do it even more, we have also created for you a great financial incentive.


Possible financial gain

We're offering a 50% commission on every pledge you bring in up to 100$. After that the commission is 30%. The baseline for this program starts at $30. Once you've referred $30 worth of pledges via your IGG unique URL, you’ll automatically be eligible for participation and set to receive your payout at the end of the campaign.

For example: Say you bring in $45 in referrals (~3 people) that's $22,5 in your pocket (~already $7,5 more than you paid) and all you had to do was get people to click your link and support this project. Or if you bring in $280 in referrals that's $104 in your pocket.

How it works: Simply log in to Indiegogo to get your personal tracking URL, then press the share buttons or share your unique URL (below the main video at the top of the page). Spread the word about us with your friends all over the Internet and you'll earn refunds quickly! You can track your own progress by visiting your Indiegogo "My Profile" page and clicking on "Referrals."

story:
Wifier is a very valuable addition on your desk, because it will help you upgrade some of your devices by allowing them to connect to the network. It’s designed to make regular everyday tasks easier and faster.

We all still have some good printers and speakers that still in a good working condition and we are happy with the good quality it provide to us, but today everything seems to be wirelessly reached and controlled, which make our old devices not suitable to use. With Wifier, we found the solution.

Wifier is a small router designed to connect to your regular devices like: printers, speakers, web-cams, and external hard drives or flash drives and make them reachable using the wifi network, 


So now you can:

  • Make a print out of any document on your mobile or tablet, or any device connected to your wireless network.
  • Enjoy the best sound quality by streaming your audio files from your mobile or tab or directly from your hard drive to the speakers, 
  • Stream live video from your regular webcam to your mobile
  • Manage and control all your files on your hard drive or flash memory, back up, save, transfer, and share larger files in few clicks


Webcams

Wifier can turn your regular webcam to a security  camera, it'll allow you to stream live video wirelessly to your mobile or tab.

Full list of supported Webcams can be found here: http://www.ideasonboard.org/uvc/




Sound Systems:

By connecting your regular sound system to Wifier you'll be able to enjoy your favourite music with the best quality without worrying about copying or transferring files from one device to anther, you can stream audio files directly and wirelessly to your speakers using any of your devices and enjoy the best music around your house:
 


Take the best of what the technology can offer

We believe that technology should not always be about throwing your well-working devices and buying new ones just to get some extra feature. 

Wifier is not a new technology; it’s a smart way of using the technology in your advantage instead of spending more money and throwing devices.

It’s a small router which can connect to your devices via USB ports and audio jack that serves as a bridge in connecting to the wireless network.




Affordable for EVERYONE

One of the main reasons behind creating the wifier is saving money that could be wasted on buying new devices or getting different solution for each regular device separately and that’s why we did our best and used every possible way to lower the total production cost as much as we can.

We rolled our sleeves and grabbed everything we can find in order to manually build the first prototype and we believed that it had come out to an amazing result.
story_txt:
Wifier is a very valuable addition on your desk, because it will help you upgrade some of your devices by allowing them to connect to the network. It’s designed to make regular everyday tasks easier and faster.We all still have some good printers and speakers that still in a good working condition and we are happy with the good quality it provide to us, but today everything seems to be wirelessly reached and controlled, which make our old devices not suitable to use. With Wifier, we found the solution.Wifier is a small router designed to connect to your regular devices like: printers, speakers, web-cams, and external hard drives or flash drives and make them reachable using the wifi network, So now you can:Make a print out of any document on your mobile or tablet, or any device connected to your wireless network.Enjoy the best sound quality by streaming your audio files from your mobile or tab or directly from your hard drive to the speakers, Stream live video from your regular webcam to your mobileManage and control all your files on your hard drive or flash memory, back up, save, transfer, and share larger files in few clicks


WebcamsWifier can turn your regular webcam to a security  camera, it'll allow you to stream live video wirelessly to your mobile or tab.
Full list of supported Webcams can be found here: http://www.ideasonboard.org/uvc/

Sound Systems:By connecting your regular sound system to Wifier you'll be able to enjoy your favourite music with the best quality without worrying about copying or transferring files from one device to anther, you can stream audio files directly and wirelessly to your speakers using any of your devices and enjoy the best music around your house: 



Take the best of what the technology can offer
We believe that technology should not always be about throwing your well-working devices and buying new ones just to get some extra feature. 
Wifier is not a new technology; it’s a smart way of using the technology in your advantage instead of spending more money and throwing devices.
It’s a small router which can connect to your devices via USB ports and audio jack that serves as a bridge in connecting to the wireless network.





Affordable for EVERYONE

One of the main reasons behind creating the wifier is saving money that could be wasted on buying new devices or getting different solution for each regular device separately and that’s why we did our best and used every possible way to lower the total production cost as much as we can.
We rolled our sleeves and grabbed everything we can find in order to manually build the first prototype and we believed that it had come out to an amazing result.

story:
Jo "Boobs" Weldon

is the Headmistress and Founder of the New York School of Burlesque, and quite likely the most recognized burlesque instructor in the world. Internationally renowned as burlesque personality Jo Boobs, she's rounded her heels on stages from Coney Island to Sydney Harbour. She's taught thousands of women (and men!) to twirl tassels, and has conducted performance workshops producing some of the most respected new performers in burlesque. She recently taught burlesque to disabled performers at DaDaFest in Liverpool. She's the winner of such exotic titles as Best Bump N Grinder, Best Teacher and Mentor, and Biggest Cougar in Burlesque! She has worked with performers from Leonard Cohen to Spinal Tap, and has been featured on television shows from CBS Sunday Morning to Gossip Girl. She's taken it off in the grimiest strip clubs and at the most esteemed venues, including The New York Public Library, and has performed and headlined at dozens of festivals all over the world. She is Co-Director of Education at The Burlesque Hall of Fame in Las Vegas, Co-Curator of Burlycon, and conducts the Master Class in Burlesque at Coney Island USA. She has released three acclaimed how-to burlesque DVDs, and her book The Burlesque Handbook, with a foreword by Margaret Cho, was released by HarperCollins/ItBooks in 2010.

 

Short Summary

My name is Malgorzata "Maggie" Saniewska, NYC photographer and creator of "PlayMe Burlesque" cards,

but today I'm just a friend and I'm raising money for Jo Boobs 50th birthday gift.

Jo Boobs has been active member of the burlesque community for ever, donating her time and hard work to others over many years. She is an amazing and inspiring woman -beautiful and talented - with a big heart devoted to helping others.
 
She is JO BOOBS!
 
But 
 
I found one flaw!
 
With today's internet social media networks and electonic life style, Jo's very old computer (with my count crashed 1,000 times last year) which makes it extremely difficult to run her every day busy buisness and life.
 
So for her big 50 I ask all of you:
 
friends, family and fans to help me raise funds for her brand new laptop.
 

There is no reward in this Fund Raiser but Jo will receive a big gift and birthday card including a full list of names of all of you who contributed. 
 
 

What We Need & What You Get

Every $ counts!

Regardless of the amount, all the funds donated will help us to make our goal possible.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Please spread the word

 

THANK YOU

story:
What Happened?

In 2009, Mark Hales, a respected journalist, was invited to drive a Porsche 917 belonging to David Piper, a former Formula 1 champion. He drove the car at the superb Cadwell Park circuit in Linconshire, UK.

The car blew up.

Mr Piper was not pleased, and a legal battle ensued. The car was repaired and sold, but the legal battle has only just ended.

After a long, drawn-out case, Mr Hales was ordered on January 22nd by a UK court to pay $174,000 in damages a mixture of legal fees and the cost of repairing the car.

For more information on the story, you may wish to see:

The Telegraph: 'You bend it, you mend it': motoring journalist sued after £1.25m porsche engine explodes

Yahoo Autos: Writer ordered to pay $174,000 after rare Porsche blows up in test drive

MotorSport: Mark Hales found liable in Piper case

MSN: Journalist owes $174K for rare Porsche's blown engine

PistonHeads: Chris Harris explores the issues raised after Mark Hales is sued for blowing up David Piper's 917

What's This Fund?

This is a complicated case, and a situation that many of us car enthusiasts deal with every day on the track or the road. At the end of the day, a historically important car has been badly damaged and a well-known journalist has had a very bad start to the year. I'd like to raise as much as we can towards Mark's bill so that we car nuts can continue to see these great vehicles on the track as they were meant to be driven, and continue to read the writings of those given the opportunity to drive them for us. Let's put this particular event behind us and allow racing journalism to continue in future in the fashion it has for a hundred years.

Where Will the Money Go?

The money will be transferred into UK pounds and given as a cheque to Mark Hales. There are other moves afoot to raise money for the same purpose - if we all end up in the delightful position of having too much money, Mr Hales will be asked to nominate a motoring charity of his choice to which the remainder of the money will be donated.

Who Set This Up?

My name is Chris, and I'm just a car guy like you. I have a race car that I let other people drive (not a Porsche 917, sadly) and I'm passionate that this event shouldn't scare journalists or racers out of some great stories.

How Else Can I Contribute?

Mark is in touch with the UK magazine, Track and Driver, who have set up a fund here. If you know of other campaigns, let me know and I'll list them too.

 

Let's get this going!

Image courtesy of bjmullan, distributed under Creative Commons.
