Please read our story and contact us if you have any questions. We hope you will find MOVE to be as awesome as we do and we hope you will join us in the journey bringing it to market.Over 10,000 units is already sold. Make sure to pre order and get a great deal before its to late!Visit also our website  www.teptron.com
Universal application  MOVE is built to fit as many different manually operated indoor blinds and shades as possible that has a cord or bead chain. MOVE can be controlled directly by a smartphone or automated based on time, temperature or solar conditions.Super easy to install  Anybody can easily and quickly install MOVE without the need of craftsman or electrician. Its housing is either fastened using wall bracket or dual side tape. The housing contains the necessary batteries. Solar panel for battery charging included. No connection to electrical outlets necessary.  









Rise and shine!  
Use the timer function and wake up to natural light. Every MOVE unit can be set individually which means that you can set multiple time schedules of your own choice.



Movie time  
If you want the livingroom to be dark just sit back, relax, and push the button in your app. Tada! Let the excitement begin.


Once you finished your movie the regular settings will be re-applied automatically.

Controlled inner climate
Wouldn’t it be nice if your blinds and shades would react to sunshine or temperature? MOVE does all that for you! 
Activate the settings and your windows will be shaded automatically, making it cooler and protected from strong sunshine. When the sun is clouded or goes down, the window shades will open up again.





Fully controlled
All settings are managed in the app and MOVE can be controlled directly by a smartphone or automated based on time, temperature or solar conditions.

A basic schedule is easy to set for every MOVE unit and will be remembered even if temporary motions are performed by you manually. This way MOVE will always open and close the blinds according to your settings while also allowing you to sometimes run them by the app. The app will initially be launched to Android and iOS followed thereafter by a Windows Phone app.



Inside MOVE technology
MOVE uses a CSR1010 module with Bluetooth Smart, the module have CSRmesh radio which is a mesh protocol running over Bluetooth Smart. This means multiple units can communicate with each other forwarding transmissions making the radio coverage better. This also makes it possible to link MOVE units together making them act as one.


We have put a lot of time into designing and testing the custom metal gearbox. Our goal has been to make it very powerful yet as quiet as possible. In order to ensure its function even under heavy load the gears are made of metal and the output axel has dual bearings. The motor is controlled with back EMF which is a way of determining the rpm of the motor, thanks to this it's possible to calibrate endpoints. MOVE also have a force limiting safety feature making it safe to use.

MOVE is pretty strong.



MOVE will have a open API to the hardware making it possible for anyone to tweak it into a existing home automation systems or just make a own cool control app.

Making MOVE go
We wanted MOVE to be as easy as possible to install out of the box so we made MOVE run on standard batteries (4 x AAA) as default and by using our included solar panel in combination with rechargeable batteries MOVE will become self-sufficient.

MOVE can also be installed with permanent power by using a USB port power supply with a micro USB cable (not included).  

Specification  
Power: Battery 4xAAA (not included), AC adapter (not included)  Radio protocol: Bluetooth SmartMCU chip: CSR1010Motor torque: ≈1NmReel mechanism: Spool and cogwheel Weight: 213g Size: Length 154mm, with 32mm, height 28mm 

In the package when delivered 
1x MOVE unit 1x Solar panel 2x Reels (spool and cogwheel)1x Wall mount 1x Double-sided tape1x User manual

Why did we make MOVE?
A while back we were on the lookout for a motor that could motorize existing indoor blinds and shades. Although nearly all home automation companies uses motorized blinds and shades we could not find anything that could be retrofitted. The only options we found would force the replacement of existing products for new expensive ones. Furthermore you need to hire an electrician to have it installed. We thought there should be a better way, so we made -MOVE.
Our goal was very clear! ”Produce a motor that is universal, affordable, simple to install and multi-functional!”


Timeline  
November	2014- Start designing gearbox  December	2014- First and second prototype built January	2015- Endurance test of the gear motor February	2015- Circuit board test Mars	2015- Tests of solar panels April	2015- Enhancements of gear motor setup Maj	2015- Second endurance test of the gear motor June	2015- Finalize 3D files of plastic parts July	2015- Start campaignAugust	2015- End campaign, prepare certification testsSeptember	2015- Make all certifications (CE, FCC and others) October	2015- Finalize software, app and order plastic molds November	2015- Finalize packaging, receive first batch plastic partsDecember	2015- Make first batch of MOVE January	2016- Start production April 2016- Start shipping MOVE to you, our backers 


Risks and challenges
We are a small company and small companies can be faced with difficulties when it comes to manufacturing a new product. Problems and costs may come up that are unexpected for us. We have done all we can do before launching this campaign to remove stumbling blocks. We now have our ducks in row for starting manufacturing according to our Timeline.
We will keep you informed during the process and let you know where we are at.

story:
As a certified mobile developer since 2009, I want to serve God with my technical gift to make a FREE CEV (Contemporary English Version) Gospel of Luke Audio Bible app with audio and images for iPad, iPhone & Android phones. I want to use it to advance the Gospel of Jesus Christ to the world for teenagers and people with English as a second language. I have all the skills, knowledge and technology, but I need to pay the royalty fee to get the non-profit distribution license for the CEV Bible text from the American Bible Society.

As a full time theological student $500 fee is a bit much for my pocket. I have prayed to God and I had the idea to start this crowdsourcing campaign. I only need a few dollars from each person to get the project going.

Please pray that many young people, those with less opportunities for education, new migrants to English speaking countries and other unreached groups will hear the full gospel of Luke in His Word, and come to faith in Jesus Christ.

I have built one iPad app for Australian Indigeous groups in Anindilyakwa and I have certified/completed the Scripture App Builder course through SIL/Wycliffe Bible translators. All the program codes and resources are ready, I only need the funding to pay the Royalty Fee for CEV translation.

Please keep this project in your prayers and spare a dollar or two for me to make it happen.

story:
Short Summary

Philip.K musical instrument inventor launched to make a new concept instrument named Bluetooth EleUke project.

This uniquely designed instrument enables wireless connection between smart phone and an EleUke using bluetooth which can be used to enjoy karaoke play along with practicing or live performances.

Made up of solid wood and carpentered with CNC machine, EleUke has one more variation made up of plastic injection mould technique, priced lower than the wood body. Bluetooth EleUke has similar concept as traditional electric guitar but has different function with earphone output so that one can play or practice without bothering anybody in night time.

Below is Bluetooth EleUke's basic concept diagram.

EleUke, a newly designed instrument works best when connected with a smart phone using bluetooth. All the operations of Bluetooth EleUke like start & stop, volume turn up & down of a track etc. can be controlled using a smart phone. Furthermore, its volume & tone can be controlled by using independent knobs on EleUke. The instrument comes with 3.7V 500mA rechargeable battery that can be charged with the help of an USB cable of smart phone charger.

Bluetooth module installed in EleUke automatically turns on when 1/4” jack or earphone jack is plugged in and becomes ready to connect with smart phone, which needs to connect with EleUke’s bluetooth by pairing both the devices.


Born and raised in Korea, Philip. K is an  inventor and designer for acoustic musical instruments. He has already launched and successfully completed another Indiegogo campaign for BugsGear brand soprano & concert size plastic Ukulele.

What We Need & What You Get

We made this project's target amount $20,000 to make plastic version peanut EleUke's tooling and Electronics production and these all process will be done from China for Philip.K living in China.

Below is perk list for contributors

1. Bluetooth receiver   - $15  including shipment For old version EleUke users.     This Bluetooth receiver enables EleUke old version users connect their smart phone and EleUke. But, EleUke's 9V battery should be replaced when it's drain out. Also, Bluetooth receiver could be recharged with enclosed cable.


2. Bluetooth EleUke Electronics - $50  For luthiers or for repairman who can replace or install on old version EleUkes.


3. Plastic version Bluetooth EleUke peanut - $100 

     All plastic peanut EleUke's color is Orange head top, Black fingerboard, Orange          body top, Black bridge and Side&back, neck, head back are all black colored.


4. Old version EleUke + Bluetooth receiver - $120  We ship old version below EleUkes with Bluetooth receiver. You need to change 9V battery when it goes drain and recharge Bluetooth receiver with enclosed cable.


5. Wood version Bluetooth EleUke peanut - $120 

6 Bluetooth EleUke CC100-PHP - $150 


7. Bluetooth EleUke TCJ100-SUHP - $170 

8. Bluetooth EleUke SL-T  - $ 190

9. Bluetooth Baritone EleUke BCJ100-MHP - $ 200


10. Bluetooth Steel string EleUke TCP-T, LSP-T - $220

Above is old version's picture and new version will have 1 volume and 1 tone control.
 Perks for acoustic ukulele lovers

11. BugsGear soprano solid spruce top  $ 80

It's made of all plastic except top sound board and bridge head machine. it has 350mm scale 18fret  has amazing loud sound with body internal resonance. Sound better than all solid ukulele.
12. BugsGear Concert solid spruce top $100

Made of all plastic except top sound board and bridge, head machine. It has 380mm scale 18fret sound more than all solid wooden ukuleles.
13. BugsGear all plastic tenor ukulele $130

We will put Tenor neck & fingerboard on Concert ukulele's body scale 430mm, 14fret joint total 20frets  people normally call Long neck concert.
Risks & Challenges

We were making EleUkes from factories in Guangdong China and managed many quality problems during last couple of years so, we will do final electronics installation, set up and inspection by our hands to avoid any quality issues.

Any defectives or quality issue units will be replaced with a new one through dealers.

story:
Ultimate Deer Protection for Gardening Enthusiasts and Great Home Security for Concerned Property Owners

Brilliant flashes of blinding light with blasts of ultrasonic waves (only audible to deer) scatter deer as if running “for their lives”!

DeerRepeller provides you the best protection by combining ultra-bright flashes of light with powerful blasts of ultrasonic waves (not audible to humans) triggered by infrared motion detection, all solar powered and mounted on a ground stake!  No wires, no mounting, no problem!

In addition to all that powerful artillery, the system alerts other "field units" of an intruder through its built-in radio communication gear.  When one unit “fires” a blast of light and ultrasonic sound, the other units "fire" simultaneously as well!  It drives the deer “crazy with fright”.  Poof! They are gone!

Just push the attractive strobe stake into the center of your flower bed or garden, and you’re protected. It’s that simple!

DeerRepeller is powered by the sun like your flowers and is equipped with a heat-triggered strobe light that blasts brief but brilliant flares of light and ultrasound whenever deer come close.  Unlike conventional yard lights that gently show the deer where their food source is, the startling light and sound “shots” from DeerRepeller will effectively and reliably provide the ultimate deer repellent.

Best of all, unlike other light “deterrents” that are hidden some safe distance from the area to be protected, DeerRepeller is boldly positioned in the center of your garden, prepared to blast any intruding deer the instant they come close from any direction.

Any human intruder will also be detected, and the homeowner can be immediately alerted via the optional remote wireless internet-caller module.

Please Note: The product is currently in development, and all images are professional drawings of the proposed final design.

 

 

DeerRepeller is also a must for improving home security.  One flash is normally all it takes to scare off any potential human burglar or night time intruder. – Who knows…, “Did someone just take a picture of me?”  Because the system itself is self-contained, you can stick it into any remote ground location you are concerned about.  All it needs are six hours of good sunlight to recharge its internal batteries, and it is ready to protect 24/7. 

 

Finally, DeerRepeller combines the best features of other existing products, such as the common solar powered garden lamp, a PIR, Passive Infrared (body heat), surveillance detector, ultrasonic pest control, and unit-to-unit radio communication.  What a wonderful winning combination!

Below is a block diagram showing the many functional modules inside each unit that make it all happen.  As you can see, the intruder detector, the DeerRepeller, is sophisticated and complex technology.

 

 

Fully ready for its mission, just drive the stake into the center of any area that you want protected.  The PIR sensor, Passive Infrared sensor, covers a 360 degree area and approximately 25 foot radius (see drawing below), so there is NO sneaking up on it; sensitivity can be user adjusted.

 

 

Target Features:

  • Patent Pending-unique design features provide strong team defense.
  • Completely self-contained with solar-powered detector and strobe light—no need for wiring or mounting; just stake and go!
  • Built-in motion sensor activates when deer or human invader moves into the coverage zone (approx. 1960 sq. ft.)
  • Long flash life—over 1,000,000 high intensity flashes (estimated 3 to 5 years of operation)
  • Soft blue dome light with power indicator inside reveals system readiness when fully charged.
  • Environmentally safe
  • Maintenance-free
  • More cost effective and convenient compared to any fencing arrangement
  • Rugged ABS plastic design for long life
  • Allows for full garden/property visibility without unsightly fencing and view obstruction.
  • Protecting your garden investment saves loss of time and money.
  • Can also be used to as a nighttime human deterrent.
  • High power ultrasonic waves blast with corresponding flashes of high intensity light proving effective and reliable 24/7 property defense.
  • Customer support and consultation for more extreme, unusual, or hostile environments.

 

 

Product Accessories:

Command and Control Center--The Control Center is a remotely mounted tactical information center with a lighted display.  The remote Control Center communicates with the field units by radio waves.  Critical tactical information is transmitted 24/7 by the field units to the Control Center so the intelligence officer (you) can properly assess battlefield conditions.  The Command and Control Center displays the number of intrusions that have occurred and were "fired" upon during any given time period.  Other critical operation information will be displayed such as ammunition supply level of each of the field units (power level of each field unit's batteries).  The intelligence officer (you) can set alarm thresholds if need be, such as an alarm if the power level of a field unit is too low to protect an area.

 Delta-Force Surveillance Module--For even larger areas to be secured, you need the help of the Delta-Force Surveillance Module. The module is a remote PIR surveillance device which is strategically placed in known traffic areas, such as a corner, where deer or an intruder might enter your yard.  If an intruder is detected, a radio signal is sent to all the field units.  Immediately all units will provide a simultaneous response of heavy "fire" with bright light and an ultrasonic shotgun blast.  This event will shock, frighten, and abruptly terminate deer or human intrusion.  It’s like having a firework show in your back yard (but you will not be able to hear the sound--only the deer will).  It’s a sight you've got to see!

Remote Switch–-A wireless activation and deactivation switch is an option.  This can be used to disarm the DeerRepeller system during any such occasion or time period the operator desires for the system not to be in use. 

For those who want to stay in the know, an internet camera and alert system can quickly notify you of any DeerRepeller intruder activity. This product development will depend on demand and pledge amount received. 

Words from the Founder and Design Director ,Craig Coad:

Craig Coad:  "As a gardener myself and wanting to have my plants survive to enjoy, we needed to develop a secure way to protect our invesment.  By combining the best technologies available for effectiveness and reliability, we have developed a device we can depend on.  Please join our family team in bringing this wonderful product to all who are concerned about their home security and value their gardens. 

Testimonials:

Neil Soderstrom, well-known gardening expert, nature author/photographer and expert on pest control:

"As a deer scare, your concept for solar-powered strobes, with ultrasound option, sounds promising.  This would be more cost-effective and less labor-intensive than unsightly solar-powered fencing, which of course also becomes a shock hazard for pets and people.  I'd be glad to help with field-testing."  

Deer are scared of bright and sudden lighting:

“Motion control spotlights can effectively stop deer from eating garden plants”, suggests the National Sustainable Agricultural Information Service.

"What a great product!!!  "Pam, Founder and CEO of Innovative Product Technologies, Inc.

"I have been a judge in Vegas for the National Lawn and Garden show for a few years... I can tell you that I would vote for that one!!!  "Pam in Sagle, Idaho

“We have tried everything…”  Tim in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho:

“We sure need a product like this; because I have tried everything else, and nothing else works over the long run!  Even my dog used to scare them (the deer) away, and now he plays with them!”

 

   “I have just about given up…”  Laura in Hayden, Idaho:

“I have tried everything that is legal to keep deer away, but they keep coming!  This will be great to protect my large garden.”

 

Testimonial from Josiah in Sagle, Idaho, a witness to the effectiveness of the working prototype:

 “I was amazed at the effectiveness of protection a power strobe light placed in the center of our family’s flower bed could be!  We had bought about 20 mature and full blooming mum plants (with hundreds of flowers) and placed them in a flower bed near the woods, a place known to have frequent and heavy deer traffic; it was a place where flowers had not survived before.  We put the DeerRepeller in the center of the flower bed.  Even though deer were grazing in our neighbor’s yard, to my amazement, not a single flower of ours was touched!  The deer were around but effectively being kept at bay due to the awesome protection power of the DeerRepeller.”

 

                                              

 

Thank you for partnering with us through your generous investment in helping provide the long-awaited solution to the problem of unwanted deer intruder damage and an effective deterrent to human night invaders as well.  We hope that you will find satisfaction in contributing to providing the opportunity for improving enjoyment and yield for gardeners—including you!—everywhere.  

From the DeerRepeller Product Development and Marketing Team

 

Risks and Challenges:

As with any high volume product, there is an inherent risk taking a product from a working prototype state to full mass production. There are two paths we can take depending on funding level.  One is to license it to a company to manufacture and market the product (all awards will given out as well), or we can produce it ourselves!  We are working with an experienced overseas manufacturing expert who has a reputable manufacturing facility in China ready to produce the DeerRepeller.  Since they already have experience in making solar powered yard lamps, the risk should be minimal. They have the full engineering staff to make sure quality remains high and the professionalism to deliver on time. Thus, with such a strong production facility as part of our team, we feel we can deliver high performing products to our supporters.  Our goal is to surpass customer expectations in all areas.  This will be an exciting and fun project to be part of!

                                       Come Join Us Today!  Thanks!

“Motion control spotlights can effectively stop deer from eating garden plants”, suggests the National Sustainable Agricultural Information Service.
"What a great product!!!  "Pam, Founder and CEO of Innovative Product Technologies, Inc.
"I have been a judge in Vegas for the National Lawn and Garden show for a few years... I can tell you that I would vote for that one!!!  "Pam in Sagle, Idaho
“We have tried everything…”  Tim in Coeur d'Alene, Idaho:
“We sure need a product like this; because I have tried everything else, and nothing else works over the long run!  Even my dog used to scare them (the deer) away, and now he plays with them!”
 
   “I have just about given up…”  Laura in Hayden, Idaho:
“I have tried everything that is legal to keep deer away, but they keep coming!  This will be great to protect my large garden.”
 
Testimonial from Josiah in Sagle, Idaho, a witness to the effectiveness of the working prototype:
 “I was amazed at the effectiveness of protection a power strobe light placed in the center of our family’s flower bed could be!  We had bought about 20 mature and full blooming mum plants (with hundreds of flowers) and placed them in a flower bed near the woods, a place known to have frequent and heavy deer traffic; it was a place where flowers had not survived before.  We put the DeerRepeller in the center of the flower bed.  Even though deer were grazing in our neighbor’s yard, to my amazement, not a single flower of ours was touched!  The deer were around but effectively being kept at bay due to the awesome protection power of the DeerRepeller.”
 
                                              
 
Thank you for partnering with us through your generous investment in helping provide the long-awaited solution to the problem of unwanted deer intruder damage and an effective deterrent to human night invaders as well.  We hope that you will find satisfaction in contributing to providing the opportunity for improving enjoyment and yield for gardeners—including you!—everywhere.  
From the DeerRepeller Product Development and Marketing Team
 

Risks and Challenges:

As with any high volume product, there is an inherent risk taking a product from a working prototype state to full mass production. There are two paths we can take depending on funding level.  One is to license it to a company to manufacture and market the product (all awards will given out as well), or we can produce it ourselves!  We are working with an experienced overseas manufacturing expert who has a reputable manufacturing facility in China ready to produce the DeerRepeller.  Since they already have experience in making solar powered yard lamps, the risk should be minimal. They have the full engineering staff to make sure quality remains high and the professionalism to deliver on time. Thus, with such a strong production facility as part of our team, we feel we can deliver high performing products to our supporters.  Our goal is to surpass customer expectations in all areas.  This will be an exciting and fun project to be part of!
                                       Come Join Us Today!  Thanks!

story:
Logo design contest! Look at the end...


Who am I?

I've been working on this project for a little more than a year now, produced a lot of prototypes to get the result that I am showing to you in this video.

I'm also the creator of www.limpkin.fr , so you can see that I'm very active in the open hardware initiative.

I've already commercialized some products, so it is not the first time that I embark in this kind of adventure!


What is the Toktoktok Project?

The Toktoktok project aims to create a simple, intuitive, and unified interface for all aspects of home automation. This product converts any surface into a touch sensitive input device for home automation purposes. To do so, I propose a cheap, simple-to-use and easy-to-implement box that only needs to be attached to a surface to make it sensitive to user interactions. This new technology is remarkable because it does not require specific indoor conditions to function and provides an intuitive input interface that anyone can use.

You may ask why is that useful? Well, imagine being able to control your home within arm's reach... 


A Patent Free Idea!

I went to the Institute of Intellectual Property in Bern, Switzerland (where Einstein was working), and found that this idea of knock detecting boxes has not been patented.

Therefore, when this idea goes public, it falls into public knowledge and can't be patented anymore. 

Everyone can then use it but also twist it!


So who is it made for and how can you use it?

Toktoktok is made for everyone, as it is so simple to implement. 

But more specifically, it is particularly suited for persons having a low-mobility. So not only will you back an interesting project if you chose to do so, but you will also help elderly people to have a better everyday life.

Currently, the toktoktok system is composed of toktoktok boxes, lamp/power switching sockets and RF receivers for computers.

Therefore, it will allow you to:

  • add additional switches in convenient places
  • not spend 10 minutes looking for the light switch, especially if you are in the dark
  • switch off all electronic devices when leaving the house
  • control your computer music player from anywhere
  • quickly turn off your computer (not the hard way ;) ): this is for people (like me) that like watching films from their beds....
  • simplify your life...


What is wonderful is that you only need to get one toktoktok box to start your toktoktok install.

Power/lamp switching sockets can be bought in your country from various companies, and you can make the computer RF receiver yourself.


That's why I'm asking support to get these toktoktok boxes produced!


The Impact

If successful, I'm confident that this campaign will help toktoktok to be known around the world. 

I really think that if some people like one product, they will talk around them about it and therefore create a growing community of toktoktok enthusiasts.

You can be part of an initiative that may change the way people interact with their homes.

Knocking on one surface is a simple gesture that everyone is already used to!


Toktoktok logo design contest!


Here is the thing: I don't have a logo to put on the toktoktok box.

Therefore, I have decided to let people contributing to this project to propose their design.

Depending on how you contribute to the toktoktok project, you'll be able either to enter the contest or to vote for one design you like.

That's right... I will not have a say in the chosen toktoktok logo!


What I Need & What You Get

Well, I need funds to have a first batch of at least 1000 toktoktok boxes produced, as the interest on this project can only start with products actually built.

Please note that a lot of money will be used to buy the initial tooling required to get the production going. For example, the mould tooling costs 11000$.

Once the production is started, the toktoktok box price will decrease. For your information, a toktoktok box produced in a 10k batch is 3/4 the price of a box produced in a 1k quantity. So this project can only succeed if a lot of people are interested.

The finished product wil be neater than the one shown in the video above, as the production process will not be the same (from rapid prototyping to plastic injection).

Depending on your contribution, you can get presents from Switzerland (yay, chocolates!), get some toktoktok boxes, and even ask for a personalized toktoktok box.


Toktoktok and the open hardware/software initiatives

If the campaign is successfull, all the hardware and software files will be released under a TAPR open hardware license.

I know there are a lot of students out there that would like to play with toktoktok and may not have the money to buy one.

As i also want people to twist the toktoktok idea, everything will be available for you to download!


But wait, what if I dont reach this goal?

Here is what will happen. Since I can't start the project without full funding, if the campaign is not sucessfull, Indiegogo will refund the entire amount to you. So, you can support this project in full confidence. This is my promise to you and it's a risk I am taking.


Other Ways You Can Help

How can we get people interested in this project?

Please help me spread the word to friends, news papers, students and family that you think would be interested in the toktoktok project.  

Thank you for reading all this and I hope to shout out your name and a big thank you on the toktoktok facebook page soon!

story:
Manage iOS your way



Along with increasing iPhone camera capabilities, storage solutions are becoming increasingly important for taking and keeping better quality photos. But is it your iPhone that needs all that storage? With iKlips DUO it’s not about keeping everything on the go. It’s about managing your device better with the content you need when you need it.

Now can easily and securely share your music, photos, videos, work projects, and all your other creations between all your devices – iPhone, iPad, iPad Pro, Mac, and PC. Having the ability to organize, store more and share on the go with friends, family, and colleagues gives you the power to do more on the go.

   EXPAND

It’s a step we’re all familiar with – just plug and play. No need to sign up for a cloud account. No account details to remember. No need to backup with iTunes. Simply insert iKlips DUO into your device, and you’ll be able to expand your storage space on the go. So the next time you’re on vacation or on location doing photography, you’ll have the storage you really need to capture your moment.

   SHARE


With both Apple Lightning and USB 3.1 connectors, iKlips DUO lets you easily and securely share your content between all your devices – iOS, Mac and PC. But it’s not just about storage. It’s about performance. Produced with top quality MLC flash memory, iKlips DUO has the fastest flash memory type for iOS devices. All your music, photos, videos, and other content can be shared in an instant. 

 

    MANAGE

By using our companion iKlips 2.0 App, you manage iOS your way. – all on the go. So you can load your iKlips DUO with the content you want from your PC or MAC, and then you can play, watch, listen, and edit your media and work on your device without using its storage. If it’s your HD/Full HD movie to watch on the plane or your HD/Full HD movie project to edit on your iPad, by managing iOS with the content you need, you can do things your way.




Manage iOS your way



iKlips App 2.0 is one half of what makes iKlips DUO even better. It’s an intuitive app that makes using your iKlips DUO an even easier experience, featuring 3D Touch support, multi-select, Split View, Touch ID password protection, Drop To, and even integration with Apple’s Music app to access your iTunes purchases. It's your go-to app for managing the content you want to share and use on the go. But with Airplay integration, it’s also mobile content ready for the big screen. Available for iKlips and iKlips DUO from mid-April.



The DUO you've been waiting for



If you became attached to iKlips the first time round, then you’ll love what we have in store with the new iKlips DUO. With a newly designed Lightning connector body that fits even more iPhone and iPad cases, a silicone body sleeve for total protection, a handy key ring, and a more powerful iOS app than ever before, it's quite the DUO.

Available in four vivid colors and four storage capacities, iKlips DUO has a style and purpose for everyone. When your iPhone is crammed full of photos, music, and games, iKlips DUO gives you the external storage you need – and with a style that complements your device and yourself. Available in 32GB, 64GB, 128GB and 256GB models.


Design

A Step-up

It’s a design that’s been perfected to be more practical, with a redesigned Lightning connector stepped body to fit even more iPhone and iPad cases. Use your iKlips DUO and keep your iPhone where it belongs, scratch-free and snug inside the case you love.

Protection All-round

A protective silicone sleeve stretches around both ends of iKlips DUO, giving its connectors the much-needed protection for day-to-day use. And because it wraps around iKlips DUO’s body, losing protective connector caps is now a thing of the past. There’s nothing to lose.


Being Attached

The simplest ideas can be the best. We’ve added a handy key ring, so that you can always keep it close without fear of losing it. Attach it to a keychain on your bag, clothes, or your actual keys. It is an attachment worth having.


Hardware

 

Better connected

With USB 3.1 and a Lightning connector, you can get your content from your iPhone or iPad to your PC or Mac in record time. Make real, physical backups of your precious Camera Roll memories or your iTunes music library. Think of it as your backup for the cloud and as your tool for sharing on the go. It’s better to be connected when and where you need it.

exFAT – no limits

With iKlips DUO, you can forget about limitations. Formatted with exFAT, iKlips DUO doesn’t have restrictions on individual file sizes. Other drives with FAT32 are limited to a measly 4GB per file – not even enough for most HD movies. If you’ve got the capacity, use it how you want. 



MLC Flash memory.

Produced with top quality MLC flash memory, it has the world’s fastest memory for iPhone, iPad, and iPad Pro. Besides enabling greater speeds, it provides greater stability and a longer lifespan. It will last as long as you want it to.

Apple MFi-certified. 

Fully certified and licensed by Apple as a product Made for iPhone, iPad & iPod. Designed specifically for Apple, iKlips Duo meets strict performance and manufacturing standards and is guaranteed  by ADAM elements.





FUNDING 

We've turned to Indiegogo to open our idea to you in the hope that we can reach more people. And with your support, we can get iKlips DUO to the market much more quickly and cheaply. We can guarantee that those who back us will receive their perks. But the demand we hope to generate here will show that we’re right to commit iKlips to mass production. That means more people will be able to benefit from making it easier to manage their content on the go.

BUILDING OUR APP YOUR WAY

We also invite your suggestions for building the app that suits how you want to manage your content iOS, which will be available for release in April. We want to improve workflow and manageability, so if you feel that is there anything else you’d like to see, then please contact us so we can build the features we can all benefit from: indiegogo@adamelements.com

PERKS

 TECHNICAL

 TIMELINE


FAQs

How iKlips DUO Works

iKlips DUO works together with our free iOS companion – iKlips. When inserting iKlips DUO into your device, you’ll be prompted to download the iKlips app automatically. iKlips DUO will then be powered by your device – no battery needed. 

Or you scan the QR code below to download it.

Can you store apps on iKlips?

No, iKlips can store and stream media files (.mp3,.wav,.mp4,.mov file formats support) and documents (.pdf, .txt, .doc, .docx, .xls, .xlsx, .ppt, .pptx, .jpg, .png, .tiff, .gif, .bmp).

Supported Video Formats

The following formats are supported: mp4, mov, m4v, mkv, avi, rm/rmvb

Supported Subtitle Formats

The following formats are supported: mp4 and srt in utf-8 coding.

Supported Music Formats

The following formats are supported: mp3, wav, acc, diff, and m4a.

Supported Formats

In addition iOS-native formats, the following file formats are supported: pdf, epub, txt, doc, docx, xls, xlsx, ppt, pptx, jpg, png, tiff, gif, and bmp.

Additional Apps

Apps cannot be installed only iKlips DUO directly. iKlips DUO is for content and file types, not apps.

Warranty

Each iKlips DUO has a one-year warranty.

Lead Time

All Indiegogo orders will be dispatched mid-April.

Shipping

All products will be sent with DHL for peace of mind. Please provide your telephone number. After dispatch, a tracking number will be provided for you to track your order. Orders take around 5 working days for delivery.

Returns

If you wish to return an item, please contact us at indiegogo@adamelements.com.

OUR TEAM – ABOUT US

ADAM elements offers an exceptional selection of the world’s best mobile smart products from renowned manufacturers. Covering mobile devices, smart wearables, intelligent peripherals, smart health products and other intelligent equipment, ADAM elements provides a diverse range of exciting products.


Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed." 

Thank you for backing our campaign.

story:
Ω Project Overview Ω 

THIS JUST IN- I had to change the name from AA-aid to Addicaid for legal reasons. This came to attention because I got second place at the AT&T social good summit hackathon. 

Our mission is to make the world more sober through mobile technology with an app that makes meetings easy to find and friends easy to make in Alcoholics Anonymous.

The problem: AA meetings are often difficult to find. For years, the main resource has been a hyper-local meeting booklet that easily gets out of date. Existing online resources are cumbersome, and there is no good mobile experience. The solution: An easy-to-use app for iOS, Android and Web platforms that helps AA members find and rate meetings, and connect with others interested in the program. Meetings go hand and hand with the community network, so I thought it’d be great to have an app that extended the AA service to the cyber realm.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Application Features

 
 

Meeting Finder/Keeper

With geolocation, finding a meeting nearby is easy. As soon as the app opens, you’ll know the location and time of all the meetings in your immediate vicinity. You can also search by location, day, time, special topic or interest -- and export into your calendar.

Sober Network Connecter

Make an anon/semi-anon profile so you can give back to the community and let it give back to you. Put in as much or as little as you like. Answer 5 fun multiple choice personality/penchant revealing questions to anonymously show yourself. Add a preference so people can call you without releasing your number. AAade also keeps tracks of what meetings you go to so everyone gets a better feel for where people are.

*Privacy Policy 12th Tradition: 

. Anonymity is the spiritual foundation of all our Traditions, ever reminding us
to place principles before personalities. All the information is completely anonymous.

Event creator and meeting feedback

For recovering alcoholics, finding the right meetings can be key to their sobriety. But how do you know which meeting is right for you? With AAade, users will be able to rate and review meetings along establish criteria. I remember first being disenchanted with the program because I kept finding myself in meetings with attendance in the single digits. I’ve also discovered terrific meetings held in yoga studios infused with incense, where there were 40 people under 40 and everyone went out to the diner down the street afterwards and stayed there and shared battle stories until 4 in the morning. Everyone should be able to get to the right meetings at the right times.

The AAade adds these crowd-sourced categories to the meetings to help you get to the right ones:

  • size big/medium/small
  • snacks/beverages
  • window/basement space
  • social after meeting
  • younger crowd
  • older crowd

Each meeting has a comment board so people can continue the conversation.

Sobriety Incentive Track

People love rewards and easter eggs, which is why, in addition to the evolving app design, I'll be forging relationships with local businesses so they can offer discounts and services (like yoga discounts, health food, museums passes) for different sobriety streaks. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Spreading The Styles and Code

All the graphics, UI, and frameworks are going to be easily transparent and fun for everyone to remix and futz with. I'll have everything broken down and downloadable so it's easy to make apps with a similar flow or graphics of similar filters. 

Technical Details

The application is using the most slick n' swag frameworks that make styling and developing it liberating and robust. Using parse.js with their Javascript SDK so the whole app is responsive and device agnostic with the slickest, most reusable code in town. Then we use phonegap to wrap it up and use tilemill to style our maps.

 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Funding Uses

 

In order to gather all the information on the meetings in the United States & Canada, data digging, deep development and dedicated design is required to make sure we get all the right information set up in the right places.Giving the app the proper look and feel to bolster its functionality is a long and painstaking process.

  • The Design Process
  • The Development Cycles
  • The Implementations
  • The Toolbox 
  • The Servers
  • The Backend
  • The Legalities 
  • The Technicalities
  • The Testing

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

About Alcoholism

As one of the most deadly diseases, alcoholism is highly dangerous and prevalent. But Alcoholics Anonymous has proven itself time and again to be the best treatment option. Even then, its success rate is mediocre at best: The majority of AA members leave the program -- and many of them don’t stay on this planet much longer than that. With meetings worldwide and over 2 million members, there is no shortage of an AA community, but there is a dire shortage of tools to help members find help and support in the most effective way.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Your Rewards

For helping out with this project, I wanted to create a whole aesthetic around it in the form of grateful tokens of my appreciation by making things that you all can use and love. Every contribution level bestows options for rewards- starting with bookmarks going all the way up to dinner and dev design. Here's just a few examples of what's in the works.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GOGO All The Way!

If we surpass our goal then we can do it for the world rather than just the US and Canada. Check out our blog soon to see more images of what to look forward to, sign up for email notifications and beta-testing or design contribution. 

If you can't throw any green our way, please help out by spreading the link to your network and get victims of the disease the help they need. 

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*please share responsibly
story_txt:
Ω Project Overview Ω 

THIS JUST IN- I had to change the name from AA-aid to Addicaid for legal reasons. This came to attention because I got second place at the AT&T social good summit hackathon. 
Our mission is to make the world more sober through mobile technology with an app that makes meetings easy to find and friends easy to make in Alcoholics Anonymous.

The problem: AA meetings are often difficult to find. For years, the main resource has been a hyper-local meeting booklet that easily gets out of date. Existing online resources are cumbersome, and there is no good mobile experience. The solution: An easy-to-use app for iOS, Android and Web platforms that helps AA members find and rate meetings, and connect with others interested in the program. Meetings go hand and hand with the community network, so I thought it’d be great to have an app that extended the AA service to the cyber realm.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Application Features

 
 
Meeting Finder/Keeper
With geolocation, finding a meeting nearby is easy. As soon as the app opens, you’ll know the location and time of all the meetings in your immediate vicinity. You can also search by location, day, time, special topic or interest -- and export into your calendar.
Sober Network Connecter
Make an anon/semi-anon profile so you can give back to the community and let it give back to you. Put in as much or as little as you like. Answer 5 fun multiple choice personality/penchant revealing questions to anonymously show yourself. Add a preference so people can call you without releasing your number. AAade also keeps tracks of what meetings you go to so everyone gets a better feel for where people are.
*Privacy Policy 12th Tradition: 
. Anonymity is the spiritual foundation of all our Traditions, ever reminding usto place principles before personalities. All the information is completely anonymous.

story:
Help bring the Hindu Temples iOS App to Android

Help me create an awesome Hindu Temples Directory App on Android and GIVE IT AWAY for FREE.  I created the above iOS app but had to put it behind a Paywall to cover costs, help me make the ANDROID app and give it away for free:

  • I am the creator of the World's Best Hindu Temples Directory (free)
  • I also created the Hindu Temples iOS APP (paid 1.99)
Now I want to create the Hindu Temples Android APP and I think

FREE > PAID

Free  | Libre | Gratis | Muft | Ni Shulk  | Mukt | Illavacu |

Help me make the Android app FREE, 

No catches, no ads, no strings, no BS.   This will help millions of Hindus all over the world find and get information on Temples near them.

There are many apps to find Churches, Mosques and other places of worship, there isn't a good one to find Temples......Yet.  We will make one.

The Hindu Temples Android app will help Hindus the world over find and get contact details, opening hours, Phone numbers , websites, address and other information about temples all in one easy to use app.

Your contribution would help Hindus all over get to their nearest temples quicker and in turn support the temples as they will find a bigger audience.


I need ~2000 $ to create an awesome Android app + expand our world wide coverage to more countries. So far, I have already spent thousands creating the Free Directory and the iOS App just for it to be a useful resource for Hindus.

We currently have ~ 2000 Temples in 50 countries in the directory.  This is nowhere close to the real number of Hindu temples, We want to expand this to include more countries and more details for the larger temples.

IndieGOGO Goal : 2000 $

Android App Creation Cost : ~ 1500$,

Any extra funds raised go to improving the coverage and mapping temples in India.

  • I also have funding campaigns going on privately with friends / groups, etc.
  • I have already spent over ~ 6000 $ of my own money coming so far.
  • If I don't meet the 2000$ goal the funds will be used to map more temples.  

What The Hindu Temples Android APP will do ?

Give everyone a list of 100 Temples near them based on location.  Allow them to save their favorite temples offline.

For every temple it will give the following details.

  • Address / Map Location
  • One Click Driving directions
  • Directly Call Temples phone numbers
  • View their Opening hours
  • Email Address
  • Website
  • Photos
  • Facebook Pages
  • Background story / description of the temple

We have done this before in our iOS app and on our website. The number 1 feedback I got when I released the iOS app was "What about Android ?"

Here's YOUR chance to Help build the an awesome Android APP and help Hindus the world over.

What other people have said about us ?

World's best Hindu Temples Directory - Vishwa Hindu Parishad

Don’t waste time ....  All Hindu Temples is the best Global Hindu Temples directory - Hindu Council of Australia

See other reviews for the iOS App here 

    Risks & Challenges

    I have done this all by myself on iOS app and on our website, I will do it again.  There can be delays but I'll build this, There is no Turning Back.

    I also have a strong team of volunteers who have gotten in touch with me offering support so rest assured that we will build this. 

    Other Ways You Can Help

    No Money, No problem, stay in touch with us here Hindu Temples Android

    • Follow us on Facebook orTwitter.
    • Please share this campaign to friends / family who might like to support !

    || OM ||

story:
Short Summary

Our website News-Collector.com

What is news-collector.com? 

This is website which collect headlines from most popular news web sites for different countries.

For example,  you are reading the news on the popular news web site. 

After, you decide to read the news on other web page.

For this you must open a page in browser. It's not comfortable and you lost your time. We collect all information from different websites in one place. 

Also when you are reading the news you are get a lot of unnecessary information like ads and other.

Our web service give you a chance to save your time and get pure information from different places.

Our Goal

I want to create global news network which will be 

provide to our users breaking news from most popular news services easy and fast.

What We Need & What You Get

1/ We need a growth. :)

2/ We want add to our service more than 50 countries.

3/ We need money for advertise.

My project is a live. It took 18 months to get this website up and running. I made it  after main work. But now I need money for advertise and I need one more person to my team. I want to evolve my project. That's why, if I don't reach my goal, I will spend all money on advertise. In that case I can not hire another person and therefore will need more time to develop pages for other countries. But I will do it. :)

For all who will support our website I prepare awards:

1.

Stickers with our logo

2. 

Cup with our Logo (news-collector.com)

3. 

T-shirt with our logo (news-collector.com)

The Impact

People,  I done this project already. But I need money that it is not dead.

Risks & Challenges

The biggest challenge will be making this website entirely comprehensive. News-Collector.com wants to take advantage of every opportunity and new tool that comes along and doing that could be difficult as a one man operation. That's why one of our stretch goals would be expanding the team and hiring at least one staff member

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Other way to support our website is here .

story:
Making condoms free

 

This is a preview business plan for Condoms are Cool

 

Objectives

 

  • To make condoms accessible to anyone who would like them and give them away for free
  • To help anyone who is afraid to go buy them or just unable to buy them a chance to protect themselves. 
  • In the heat of the moment on the way out of a club you might see someone passing them out. Just in case you forgot to stop by the store. Here's one on us.

 

HOW WILL WE DO THIS? Thanks for asking!


This will be done in a few ways. The first is by going to local businesses and having them advertise with Condoms are Cool. Their is going to be a number of ways to do this as well, the first being on the condom wrapper itself. We will place the business logo and advertisement of its choice on the outside of package. Making sure of course no damage is done to the packaging. Ads can be anything the company would like to advertise from coupons to slogans. I will offer different options upon request such as flyers, leaflets etc. in any case the revenue raised from the ads will help fund free condoms as well as other business expenses.

 

I am offering zones in which companies can target there ads to be placed, such as, downtown and maybe NE Minneapolis for instance, they would be charged for each zone and the amount of circulation of condoms desired to be dispensed at local events. For example a concert or Friday night during bar hours etc. Say a company wanted to advertise on 1000 condoms in those two zones it would be spread out at a number of places by me and other volunteers. Therefore giving 1000 condoms out for free but giving a local business a possible new or returning customer.

 

 

 

I am in the process of getting a website built that will be interactive for the guest with blogs and other information on how to get these condoms and where they will be. I will be putting advertisements for businesses on the website as well as opening that up to other advertisement opportunities which will create additional and substantial revenue.

 

All the while focusing on distributing condoms to the public for free. One thing I plan to do as well and something that this fundraiser could really help with is to make a type of vending machine that would give out free condoms at a specific location 24 hours a day. This is something that I won't be able to do unless I had some help from you all at indiegogo.com

 

The reason I am doing this? Why not? Also sex should be free safe or not. I just want to help people that's the bottom line!

 

Thank you for checking out Condoms are Cool on indiegogo.com
Please feel free to donate to help make this a reality! If you can't donate please spread the word and use the indiegogo share tools on Facebook etc. or just tell someone you know. This could save someone's life someday.

 

Sincerely,
Thomas James

 

 

Hello Everybody!!

Have you ever been in the situation where you were shopping for those things  we never like to speak of?

 

You know, those things for.... um sex... Yes you know what I am talking about!! CONDOMS! Dun dun dun... So now that I have said the uncomfortable word... condom, hopefully we can talk about more important issues regarding them, Like their price for instance!

 

Hi I am Thomas James Sederberg and I am a 29 yo guy living in Minneapolis, Minnesota and I recently was at the store purchasing those things that no one ever likes to speak of (condoms in case you weren't listening) and I had a dilema... I had to get condoms and lubricant  alongwith  some other non related items.  Well as I realized that the other non related items with the lube added up to just about what I had left in cash, in hand I started to negotiate in my head what items to put back and which to keep. What amazed me was that of all of the items I could put back, I chose the condoms!! HOLD UP! Wait one second... Now why did I chose the one potential  thing protecting my life?  I wanted to give it up because it cost nearly $7.00 for 3 condoms! I tried to justify in my mind that I didn’t really need to buy the condoms. Fortunately for me I realized that the  $7.00 was not worth keeping compared, to the price of  becoming HIV +.

Now I asked myself.. why should something that is my right as a human being to have, SEX, be anything but how it is intended naturally to be.... yep people, I'm talking about SEX!  And SEX should be FREE! But still it should be safe if desired.

 

My reason to put myself out on Indieogogo.com is that I am starting a business as well as to make condoms accessable to everyone who wants them for absolutely free! Every year countless people around the world become infected with an STD or become HIV positive as well as young teens  who become parents too early.  I believe that there are many communities  that are being unfairly managed when it comes to accessibility of free condoms such as low income or sexually active  teenagers.  I am not picking on the low income communities because I think they have a disadvantage to safer sex practices but urge look at any community, and you will see that there are not enough condoms being given out by government agencies (no offense I think ya'll are doing awesome!) their just always seems to be funding issues.

Well, I am proposing and am in the process of getting local businesses together that have some advertising leeway that want to access new clients/customers with a different medium of advertising to go where few have gone before, right in the condom package. I am going to utilize these businesses to advertise THEIR business on the condom with an ad.  So now there can be ads to, for example: $5 off your next meal or 50% of next oil change on the package of condoms.  Advertising on these will be very benneficial to those businesses because for one it is promoting a healthy and safe sex life as well get there name out there.  Even if there is no intent to use the condom at first, one might hang on to a "free drink" ticket, in turn, helping the advertiser and potentially keeping someone from throwing it away and possibly having a condom for the next romantic experience.  

I am so passionate about doing this as my business because its a great cause that can potentially save lives and/or futures.  

 

Now the part I'm sure you have all been waiting for... I will be going around with other volunteers to pass out these free condoms at permitted events such as bars and nightclubs, concerts and just on the corner of the street so people have more access to these sources (many many other avenues for them to be given out as well)

 

I don't think the condom companies should be without their payment, they are a business after all and thats why my advertising as well as the group of followers I feel that will grasp this idea of change, which will be additionally funded by donations, will go to covering the purchase and printing costs for condoms and advertising.

 

I am so excited for the opportunity to not let anyone play "russian roulette" with there life over not being able to buy the protection they need.  

What I am asking for from the Indiegogo platform here is to come up with some starting up business/movement funds for initial start up.  $10,000 I feel will help out a cause that is bigger than any one person.  This will help everyone who wants it, I am not going to stop my personal journey and mission to bring condoms to the masses for free and as we grow as a business and grow as a movement towards our right to love our bodies with or without access to money at that time.... even if you have money there may come a time you don't have 4 quarters to put in the machine at the gas station or u don't have the time to go get condoms during the heat of the moment, but if you already had them because someone put them in your hand at the bar earlier that night or as you were walking down the street that afternoon then maybe, just maybe you will use it!

This is my goal and I hope to for everyone to have the opportunity to have sex as close to free as it was always intended.

 

If you are unable to donate I still need you your help if you believe in my mission! Please spread the word of what i'm doing and you can see some of my updates on facebook  under    Condoms are Cool    

For those of you who are able to donate, Thank you so much for your generosity! Every single dollar could help indirectly save the life of stranger someday!

 

Please share me on Indiegogo share tools!

 

Sincerely,

 

Thomas James

I tried to justify in my mind that I didn’t really need to buy the condoms. Fortunately for me I realized that the  $7.00 was not worth keeping compared, to the price of  becoming HIV +. 
Now I asked myself.. why should something that is my right as a human being to have, SEX, be anything but how it is intended naturally to be.... yep people, I'm talking about SEX!  And SEX should be FREE! But still it should be safe if desired.
 
My reason to put myself out on Indieogogo.com is that I am starting a business as well as to make condoms accessable to everyone who wants them for absolutely free! Every year countless people around the world become infected with an STD or become HIV positive as well as young teens  who become parents too early.  I believe that there are many communities  that are being unfairly managed when it comes to accessibility of free condoms such as low income or sexually active  teenagers.  I am not picking on the low income communities because I think they have a disadvantage to safer sex practices but urge look at any community, and you will see that there are not enough condoms being given out by government agencies (no offense I think ya'll are doing awesome!) their just always seems to be funding issues. 
Well, I am proposing and am in the process of getting local businesses together that have some advertising leeway that want to access new clients/customers with a different medium of advertising to go where few have gone before, right in the condom package. I am going to utilize these businesses to advertise THEIR business on the condom with an ad.  So now there can be ads to, for example: $5 off your next meal or 50% of next oil change on the package of condoms.  Advertising on these will be very benneficial to those businesses because for one it is promoting a healthy and safe sex life as well get there name out there.  Even if there is no intent to use the condom at first, one might hang on to a "free drink" ticket, in turn, helping the advertiser and potentially keeping someone from throwing it away and possibly having a condom for the next romantic experience.  
I am so passionate about doing this as my business because its a great cause that can potentially save lives and/or futures.  
 
Now the part I'm sure you have all been waiting for... I will be going around with other volunteers to pass out these free condoms at permitted events such as bars and nightclubs, concerts and just on the corner of the street so people have more access to these sources (many many other avenues for them to be given out as well)
 
 I don't think the condom companies should be without their payment, they are a business after all and thats why my advertising as well as the group of followers I feel that will grasp this idea of change, which will be additionally funded by donations, will go to covering the purchase and printing costs for condoms and advertising.
 
I am so excited for the opportunity to not let anyone play "russian roulette" with there life over not being able to buy the protection they need.  
What I am asking for from the Indiegogo platform here is to come up with some starting up business/movement funds for initial start up.  $10,000 I feel will help out a cause that is bigger than any one person.  This will help everyone who wants it, I am not going to stop my personal journey and mission to bring condoms to the masses for free and as we grow as a business and grow as a movement towards our right to love our bodies with or without access to money at that time.... even if you have money there may come a time you don't have 4 quarters to put in the machine at the gas station or u don't have the time to go get condoms during the heat of the moment, but if you already had them because someone put them in your hand at the bar earlier that night or as you were walking down the street that afternoon then maybe, just maybe you will use it!
This is my goal and I hope to for everyone to have the opportunity to have sex as close to free as it was always intended.
 
If you are unable to donate I still need you your help if you believe in my mission! Please spread the word of what i'm doing and you can see some of my updates on facebook  under    Condoms are Cool    
For those of you who are able to donate, Thank you so much for your generosity! Every single dollar could help indirectly save the life of stranger someday! 
 
Please share me on Indiegogo share tools!
 
Sincerely,
 
Thomas James

story:
My name is Hamid Pishkar and I am 34 years old  entrepreneur from Denmark.

Besides the love of my family; turning ideas into reality gives me the biggest kick in the world. It is a feeling that can not be described with a few words, so I leave it for another day :)

In 2002 I started a marketing company in Denmark from my apartment and grew the company to a succes with 13 employees and over 300 clients using our service. What I did not know was that in 2008 I would get my biggest lesson and challenge in my life. From one day to another I was forced to live my life with the highest level of panic attack/anxiety. The only moment I did not think I was going to die was the time I was sleeping.    The situation turned so ugly that everyday I was a witness of everything I worked so hard on  was slipping away from my hands, and this time I was not in a possition to do anything about it!

I used 4 years to recover myself with the support and love of my family and friends. I spent time playing basketball and coach 17 brave young teenagers and taught them how to play the game of basketball. My aim was to teach them not to be afraid of setting high goals in their lifes and never quit even if life gets tough. As my mentor said to me :´Reach for the moon, the worst thing that can happen is that you hit the stars´. Those boys gave me more than I gave them, and I want to thank them all for inspirig me to step up and follow my dreams!

So here I am:

January 2013 I was ready for a new chapter in my life. Fully recovered and full of energy I decided to move to Andalucia in Spain, where the sun shines 300 days a year. The first  week I was here I had difficulties to stay in touch with my, friends and family because I could not get any internet connection. I was very frustrated about the lack of internet and slow connections, because I was used to differend setup in Denmark. One day in my frustration I was thinking that many turists must have the same problems that I am running into, and why is no one offering a service that can help solve this problem. Every year over 50 million people decides to visit Spain, and as a turist the only choice you have to gain internet acces is to spend a lot of money on sitting in a different bars and restaurants in order to get wifi with slow connection, or you can buy it as an extra service in the hotels. (But only in the hotels) Some people also choose to use there own internet but they will have a huge Roaming fee waiting for them once they turn back home.

Thats the day Bring Your Net was born!


The Idea – Bring Your Net

Bring Your Net is a quality wifi rental company that provides highspeed internet connection to turists while they are on vacation and helps people to avoid expensive roaming fees.

COUNTRIES: Spain, England, Germany, France and Scandinavia

Turist´s, can surf on the internet, update on Facebook and other social medias or call home for free with the service of Viber, Tango, skype and ect..

Business, send emails, search in the internet, be close to clients/employees and stay up to beat with their business.


How does Bring Your Net work?

When you have our mini wifi router, you can put it in your pocket, bag or purse and bring it with you anywhere you want and still have highspeed internet connection. you turn the device on and within 10 sec you will be online. Enjoy your freedom on the beach, when you go sightseeing or when you want to find places with our minipocket wifi. Up til l8 devices can be connected to our router at the same time!


How can people rent wifi internet?


WEBSITE:

  • Enter the website
  • choose date of arrival and departure
  • enter address
  • recieve envelope in the lobby or mailbox
  • use your internet ( very simple )
  • send the device back on your last day with prestamped envelope
  • recieve your deposit 

EVENT:

  • Our team will pitch turists on the streets in 6 differend cities in Andalucia
  • Clients will recieve the device immediately
  • use the internet
  • Send the device back on your last with prestamped envelope
  • recieve your deposit


DONATION:

5% of our company income will be donated to differend anxiety associations in the world!

Denmark: http://www.angstforeningen.dk/

Sweden: www.angest.se

Norway: www.angstringen.no

Germany: http://www.panik-attacken.de/

UK: www.anxietyuk.org.uk

USA: www.adaa.org


RESEARCH:

We have asked 100 people in the streets about there vacations in Spain and their internet usage. All of them knew about the difficulties mentioned above. We also asked them if we could provide them with highspeed internet on their entire vacation, if it was interestnig for them and if they would rent it; 67 % said yes to our reting service.


What We Need & What You Get

To enter the last step of our jurney we need following things:

  • website
  • 4g wireless wifi routers
  • 3 event stands for the salecrew

Supporters get perks that you can see down below


You Can help my campain

I deeply appreciate all kinds of support, and you can already help me a lot with:

  • Sharing this campaign with people that migth be interested in supporting or using our service
  • Share this campaign via your social networks
  • I am also looking for team members in France, Italy and Portugal for sendig packages. If you live in any of these countries our you know someone who needs a job please send an email to info@pishroi.com


Our perks 

In all perks you will automatically be mentioned as a supporter on our website and facebook fanpage.  

3$ - You are a member of Bring Your Net adventure + You also recieve a cupon where you save 10% when you use our service.

20$ - A smart Bring Your Net T-shit + 1 cupon where you get 20% discount when you use Bring Your Net

30$ - For this support we give you 1 week free internet in Spain or Uk + we mention your support on our website. You can use this perk whenever you choose to take a holliday in Spain or UK

50$ - Bring Your Net is saving 5% of income to donate to differend anxiety associations in the world. With this support we make a donation in your name to an anxiety association listet on this campaign + 1 week free internet in Spain or Uk.You can use this perk whenever you choose to take a holliday in Spain or UK

80$ - For this support we give you 2 x 1 week free internet in Spain or Uk + 1 bring your net minipocket wifi router (worth 60 €) + we mention your support on our website. You can use this perk whenever you choose to take a holliday in Spain or UK

200$ - With this purk you will be able to promote your business through our email service on our website. When our clients make an online order, we send them a confirmation email and we will gain traffic to you by presenting your businness in the best manners with a clear message of your desire. This is a good perk for you who targets turist´s in Spain or UK


From buttom of my heart:
Thank you very much for reading my campaign!!! :)

story:
Why is this project needed?

 In 1986 I attended my first Conference on Lasers & Electro-optics. As I recall there were about 10,000 technical attendees, of which 5, yes FIVE, were women.

 

As the years passed, more women have gone into optics, but there are still few women studying laser physics and working in laser industries.  Lasers have been key to a number of American success stories in products as diverse as bar code scanners in the supermarket to LASIK eye surgery.  A laser is at the heart of 3D printing, a hot manufacturing area right now. 

It is innovation by our young people, in areas like lasers, that will bring economic success worldwide.  And studies have demonstrated that diversity in teams have significantly more innovation in their work than homogenous teams.

The Project

What’s more fun than a game to kids? Based upon the success of the successful Geckoman Nanotechnology video game developed by the NSF-funded Center for High-Rate Nanomanufacturing, this project is to develop a video game aimed toward middle school girls, giving them some background in laser physics, in a way that is fun and engages groups.   Obviously, there will be cute, cuddly creatures!  Plus the girls will be able to work cooperatively, eliminating stigma about playing a science game.

While women and girls don’t usually like the violence in most video games, women do enjoy their challenge and many people don’t realize the game PacMan’s main audience turned out to be female!  This game will involve girl characters, who have to complete fun tasks that will create laser light. 

For example, one task will involve aligning light waves so they are “coherent”, the characteristic that is so evident in colored beams in laser light shows.Your support will help give girls a positive science experience, while ensuring future generations of women go into fields that are key to our world economies.


We need your help!
We need to design the game which wil cost $10,000 for the graphical interface and back end programming.  We also want to create an online group challenge that will bring in girls to work together.

  

The perks we’re offering include getting 
girls to see some cool laser stuff....

such as dolls 3D printed from photos of themself! How cool is that?Just supply us with a photo and we'll turn it into a doll!

AND the special t-shirt design that was Crowdsourced on social media:

The machine washable t-shirt is available in S-M-L-XL sizes!

The Laser Safety Warning Sign reward is made of durable plastic as shown on the left.  IF you have a laser and want a specific Class of Laser warning sign such as the one of the right, that can be specified when we get your fulfillment information.  If you need help determining which class of laser you own, we can walk you through the Laser Institute of America guidelines.

PLUS, 10% of our proceeds will go to the Laser Institute of America, a great organization that helps spread laser information, but is also the all-important secretariat of 
the ANSI Laser Safety Standards.

Impact

Exposing girls to lasers in a way that is fun and engaging and meant JUST for girls increases interest in a topic area that has been almost exclusively male.  I was lucky enough to be a pioneer in the laser industry, as well as one of the Laser Institute of America’s few women Fellows.

I want to share that opportunity with girls today!

story:
A healthier and more comfortable way to use electronic devices at home.
Smart & resistant materials for a practical & minimalist design.

Covid 19 meant that a lot of people suddenly found themselves spending most of their time at home and the majority of us weren't fully prepared for this. YEKO is a kit that includes a personal table plus a cell phone stand plus a tablet stand, enabling you to work, study or entertain yourself in the most comfortable and healthy way possible.

 

 WHY 

We're spending more and more time on our electronic devices, but do not always maintain a healthy posture while doing so. With YEKO you can improve the position in which you hold your body and reduce the risk of...


 

 

 

WHO

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

WHERE (Table)

 

 

 

 

 WHERE (The accessories) 





 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 


THE TABLE


 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

THE ACCESSORIES 

 

IDEA and DESIGN STORY

 

FIRST THE IDEA

 

 


 

THE MATERIAL

THE DESIGN


 

 

THE PROCESS

 

 

REWARDS

 

 SHIPPING 

 

 

WHY SUPPORT US

 

RISK

Made in Mexico: we manage the whole production process from Mexico where we are established. We can react immediately to any problem. All the quality control is made by us.

Shipment can be a problem in Mexico, so we decided to work with FEDEX to be sure your YEKO will arrive quickly and safely, with a reliable tracking system.

Depending on the COVID situation at the beginning of 2021, we may face delays in the delivery of the materials or we may have to stop the production at some point, as it is considered a non- essential activity. These are things we cannot control. However, We will keep you updated with any situation that may affect your order.

We made all tests and previous samples of our product in the factory under controlled settings but issues may arise when dealing with a new production.
