story:
Our mobile phones are now the way we consume almost all of our entertainment, news, and information. We enjoy the speed, convenience and ease of our technology—but the problem is, our small screens isolate us, making it virtually impossible to share our entertainment and digital worlds with others. 

In 2014, we launched our first crowdfunding campaign to solve this problem and bring your small screens to life. Now, we’re back with our new and improved ODIN2. 

 

 

 

Redefining the smart projector.

ODIN2 combines the big picture experience of a projector with the smart and convenient functions of an Android tablet.  It’s the ideal product for people who consume most of their entertainment using Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, the web and mobile applications.  

 

 

 With ODIN2, you can: 

  • Stream movies from HBO Now, Netflix or Hulu. 
  • Make video calls using Skype or Google Hangouts.
  • Mirror your iPhone and Android phone screens to ODIN.
  • Access files from Dropbox or Skydrive. 
  • Surf the web on Chrome or Firefox. 
  • Use Google Docs and Office 365.
  • Play Xbox or Playstation on a big screen. 
  • Stream music on Spotify, Pandora, and more.
  • Download movies and files onto the internal hard drive.
  • And enjoy just about as many more functions as there are apps in the Android store!

 

  

 ODIN1 in Action

 

A completely updated device.

ODIN2 is a two generation upgrade from ODIN1 in terms of hardware, software and user experience. We reviewed all the feedback we received from ODIN1 users in real life scenarios, and incorporated their suggestions into creating a completely redesigned and reengineered ODIN2 from the ground up. 

Keeping the same functions you know and love from ODIN1, we’ve made a more functional, beautiful, and powerful ODIN2. 

ODIN1 vs. ODIN2 

NEW features at a glance:

  • Camera and microphone to allow video and voice calls 
  • Full color touch screen for easy control and interaction
  • Keystone picture adjustment
  • Auto Focus
  • Micro SD slot
  • HDMI w/ HDCP compatibility
  • Smart Quiet Fan System
  • Tripod Mount
  • Mobile apps for screen sharing with iPhones and Android phones
  • Screen orientation control – Reverse, Side Flips, Rotations
  • Sleep mode for energy efficiency Open root access

Key Features of ODIN2

Touch Screen

Big upgrade to ODIN2 - a beautiful 5 inch touchscreen.

In order to simplify the user interface experience and take full advantage of all the features of the Android OS, we’ve integrated the touch screen. Since it’s the same touchscreen you’ll find on your smartphone, you can get familiarized with ODIN in no time.

 Android OS

ODIN2 has an Android 6.0 OS installed inside, so you can access all your favorite entertainment and productivity apps such as Netflix, HBO Now, Skype, Youtube, Office 365, Pandora, Spotify, Chrome, and a million other apps. ODIN2 was designed as a standalone device so you can do most things that your smartphone can do - without your smartphone or computer. 

Android 6.0 OS will be running a Quad-core ARM Cortex-A17, 1.8GHz chip with 2GB DDR RAM.

Optical Projector

ODIN2's innovative LED light source generates 300 lumens of brightness with native HD resolution of 1280p x 720 and maximum resolution of 1080p; but is still efficient enough to connect to an external battery pack* and give you the portability to take it anywhere an electric socket is not readily available.  Moreover, ODIN’s LED light source will last over 30,000 hours or approximately 3.5 years of continuous play. 

From 1 yard away, ODIN’s optical beam can produce a 37” screen size, and a 110” screen size from 3 yards - allowing you to bypass the difficult setup and exorbitant cost of traditional home theatre systems.

 

* Requires 12V @ 3A or 19V @ 2A output external battery pack

Screen Sharing

While ODIN is a standalone device, you can also beam your phone screen to ODIN. This allows you to project content from all your iOS devices like iPhone and iPad, Android devices, and Windows computer.

Keystone Picture 

Keystone will be especially useful when ODIN2 is tilted at an angle. Due to physics, if a projector beam hits the surface at an angle, it will distort the image into a trapezoid shape. Having keystone function will readjust the picture to a rectangle. 

Auto Focus

We added an extra camera in front of ODIN2 to automate the picture focus without a manual mechanism.

Wide Angle Camera 

ODIN2 comes with an embedded wide-angle camera to allow for video calls using video apps like Skype and Google Hangouts. Unlike a smartphone, ODIN allows multiple people to gather around and be seen in a video call with your friends, family, or business . 

Microphone 

ODIN2 is equipped with microphones to pick up external sound, significantly increasing the number of voice apps compatible with the device. Microphones will enhance your experience when video calling through Skype, or using digital assistants like Google Now. 

Speaker

We are using a 23.8 mm diameter speaker with custom designed sound cavity to provide quality bass and sound.

Kickstand

The ODIN series is the only smart projector line with a built-in kickstand to adjust the screen angle 90 degrees, so you can project all your content any way you like (we recommend tilting at 90º for a great ceiling projection!)

Tripod

We received a lot of requests from our ODIN1 backers to be able to mount ODIN on a tripod, so we included this feature in our second version.

Internal Parts

Connectivity 

WiFi + Bluetooth

ODIN2 features a dual band 2.4Ghz and 5Ghz WiFi chip (802.11 b/g/n) to give you a more stable wireless connection for video streaming. You can also pair your bluetooth speakers, keyboard, mouse, presentation clicker, etc. via ODINs’s integrated Bluetooth 4.0 standard.

Memory 

ODIN2 comes with an internal 16GB memory space for you to save files, pictures and movies and access them directly from ODIN without connecting to the internet.  You can also connect your Dropbox or Google Drive storage apps onto ODIN to access all your entertainment and business files.

MicroSD | USB | HDMI | Headphone

We wanted to make it as easy as possible to showcase your GoPro videos by including a microSD card slot directly into ODIN. Now, it’s easy to share your experiences on the big screen with friends and family after a day of skiing, climbing, kayaking and more. 

ODIN2 comes with two USB 2.0 ports - you can attach your flash drive to access your files and attach accessories like your wired mouse and keyboard.  

You can also easily project and play video games on the big screen by connecting Xbox, Playstation, Nintendo and computers directly to ODIN’s HDCP compatible HDMI port.  ODIN2 also comes with a regular 3.5 mm TRRS headphone port.

Designing a digital world. 

Completely redesigned, we’ve made ODIN2 more beautiful, easy to use and intuitive.  Five-inch touch screen makes it easier to control and interact with ODIN2's Android operating system, thus we matched the touch screen width to the device's overall size dimension.  We also tilted the screen at a slight angle to make it easier to see when in use. 

"The overall shape was designed to be more slender and less obtrusive. The black top allows it to blend into the background when it is being used so it doesn't disrupt the viewing experience. The white underbelly is slightly recessed to protect and cover the front lens area." - Ed Mitchell

Early Design Sketch Concepts

Rewards

T-Shirt at $35

First Day Special at $425

One ODIN2 at our special 24 hour price. Grab one before it’s too late! First 24 hours Only.

Early Bird at $475

One ODIN2 at a discounted price for up to 3 days after launch! Up to 72 hours after launch time.

ODIN2 IndieGoGo Special at $525

One ODIN2 at an exclusive IndieGoGo price – approx. 20% off retail.

ODIN2 x 2 at $925

Two ODIN2 at an exclusive IndieGoGo price – approx. 30% off retail.

More use scenarios.

 

 

Our inspiration.

"Sometimes when a problem offers no apparent answers, the only solution is to radically alter the operating parameters. 

After being continuously frustrated with paying for cable service I wasn’t using, I decided to make the bold move to cancel my subscription. I was getting all my news and entertainment via the Internet and my mobile phone – watching cable shows on my television was something I rarely did. 

I decided to venture out and find a device that would meet my needs. I wanted a product that could handle all my viewing apps (Youtube, Netflix, Hulu, etc.) as well as something that would be as easy and intuitive to use as my smartphone. To my dismay, the only way I could achieve what I desired was hooking up my computer to a bulky projector (prone to inconvenient overheating) and separate, external speakers. 

Long story short, that search morphed into the initial idea for the creation of the Dos Owls ODIN – a multi-functional, portable visual display that solves a slew of A/V problems and opens the door to a limitless universe of content sharing possibilities. 

Necessity sparked invention and I haven’t looked back since."

- Alex Yoo, Founder

Why IndieGoGo? 

It’s thanks to the amazing backers from our successful campaign for ODIN1 back in 2014 that we were able to fund, expand, and bring this creative dream to life. Over 561 backers from over 37 countries supported ODIN1. We were amazed by the level of engagement and spirit of the global crowdfunding community. ODIN2 has been completely redesigned and re-engineered mostly based on feedback from our ODIN1 backers.

 

Timeline 

After we complete our campaign in December 2016, we expect to ship ODIN2 in June 2017.

 

Dos Owls Team

ALEX YOO BIO - FOUNDER

Originally from the suburbs of Chicago and currently residing in Ditmas Park, Brooklyn, Alex Yoo earned his first professional experience in the fast-paced financial world of Wall Street. For five years, he plied his trade diligently at Houlihan Lokey, Nomura Securities and Tri Artisan Partners.

However, he soon grew restless with the repetitive PowerPoint presentations and Excel sheets, so he decided to make a change. His next venture came about as a matter of necessity. A habitual sharp dresser, he’d always had difficulty finding dress shirts that worked for his body frame. He took a bold risk and launched an online custom shirt company called Alexander West. He poured all his energy and resources into the business, and Alexander West is presently an established player in the NYC custom clothing market.

Alex’s newest project is a tech venture called Dos Owls. The idea stemmed from a desire to enjoy his Netflix /Hulu content on a more compact, multifunctional device. The first Dos Owls product is called ODIN, which has several distinct features including an Android processor, portable theater-like viewing, wireless connectivity, exceptional sound output and innovative design.

Marketing + Design Team

  • Ed Mitchell, Industrial Design
  • Quinn Shephard, Director + Writer 
  • Michael Boswell, Art and Graphic Design
  • Alex Daly, Marketing 
  • Theo Munch, Marketing
  • Will Russell, Marketing
  • Omar McFarlane, Marketing
  • Rachel de Leon, Customer Service
  • Andrew Zimbelman, Illustrator

Engineering Team

  • H Wang, Head Engineer
  • Y. Cheng, Mechanical Engineer 
  • J.B. Chen, Software 
  • R.H. Luo, Hardware 
  • L. He, Hardware
  • Y. Zhang, Production and Logistics  

 

Full specifications.

Optical Projector Technology

  • Brightness: 300 Lumens ANSI 
  • Light Source: LED w 30,000 Hours 
  • HD 1280 x 720 Native Resolution 
  • 1080p Video Output Resolution 
  • Auto Focus 
  • Keystone Screen 
  • Size: 37" per Yard ; 110" from 3 Yards 
  • Contrast (FOFO): 500:1 
  • Throw Ratio: 1.12 
  • Image orientation: Reverse / Side / Flip 
  • Display Technology: 0.3" DMD – TI DLP 

Sensors

  • Touch Screen - 5” 
  • Wide Angle Camera 
  • Microphone 

Internals

  • Android 6.0 Operating System  
  • Quad-core ARM Cortex-A17, 1.8GHz 
  • 2GB DDR RAM Wi-Fi (B/G/N) 2.4 + 5 Ghz 
  • 16GB Internal Memory 
  • Bluetooth 4.0 
  • 3 Watt Internal Speaker with custom sound cavity 
  • Mobile Apps for Screen Sharing for iOS and Android Phones 
  • Open Root Access 

Connections

  • HDMI with HDCP 
  • Audio Port - 3.5 mm TRRS 
  • 2 x USB 2.0 
  • MicroSD Port 
  • Power Cord included (DC 5.5mm 12V 3A) 
  • Compatible with External Battery Pack - 12V w 3 Amp or 19V w 2 Amp required (sold separately)  

General

  • 5.75" W x 6.25" L x 1.45" H 
  • 1.3 pounds 
  • Dark Gray / White 
  • 90 degrees adjustable stand 
  • 3.5 mm TRRS headphone port 
  • Tripod Port
story_txt:
Our mobile phones are now the way we consume almost all of our entertainment, news, and information. We enjoy the speed, convenience and ease of our technology—but the problem is, our small screens isolate us, making it virtually impossible to share our entertainment and digital worlds with others. 
In 2014, we launched our first crowdfunding campaign to solve this problem and bring your small screens to life. Now, we’re back with our new and improved ODIN2. 


 

 

 
Redefining the smart projector.

ODIN2 combines the big picture experience of a projector with the smart and convenient functions of an Android tablet.  It’s the ideal product for people who consume most of their entertainment using Netflix, Hulu, Amazon Prime, the web and mobile applications.  

 
 

 With ODIN2, you can: 

Stream movies from HBO Now, Netflix or Hulu. 
Make video calls using Skype or Google Hangouts.
Mirror your iPhone and Android phone screens to ODIN.
Access files from Dropbox or Skydrive. 
Surf the web on Chrome or Firefox. 
Use Google Docs and Office 365.
Play Xbox or Playstation on a big screen. 
Stream music on Spotify, Pandora, and more.
Download movies and files onto the internal hard drive.
And enjoy just about as many more functions as there are apps in the Android store!

Utilize video calling apps like Skype to talk to family and friends
 
ODIN's simple easy setup allows movie nights on the roof, patio or anywhere
  
Watch movies on the ceiling or any surface
 
 ODIN1 in Action

 
A completely updated device.
ODIN2 is a two generation upgrade from ODIN1 in terms of hardware, software and user experience. We reviewed all the feedback we received from ODIN1 users in real life scenarios, and incorporated their suggestions into creating a completely redesigned and reengineered ODIN2 from the ground up. 
Keeping the same functions you know and love from ODIN1, we’ve made a more functional, beautiful, and powerful ODIN2. 

ODIN1 vs. ODIN2 
NEW features at a glance:

Camera and microphone to allow video and voice calls 
Full color touch screen for easy control and interaction
Keystone picture adjustment
Auto Focus
Micro SD slot
HDMI w/ HDCP compatibility
Smart Quiet Fan System
Tripod Mount
Mobile apps for screen sharing with iPhones and Android phones
Screen orientation control – Reverse, Side Flips, Rotations
Sleep mode for energy efficiency Open root access


Key Features of ODIN2
Touch Screen 
Big upgrade to ODIN2 - a beautiful 5 inch touchscreen.
In order to simplify the user interface experience and take full advantage of all the features of the Android OS, we’ve integrated the touch screen. Since it’s the same touchscreen you’ll find on your smartphone, you can get familiarized with ODIN in no time.

 Android OS
ODIN2 has an Android 6.0 OS installed inside, so you can access all your favorite entertainment and productivity apps such as Netflix, HBO Now, Skype, Youtube, Office 365, Pandora, Spotify, Chrome, and a million other apps. ODIN2 was designed as a standalone device so you can do most things that your smartphone can do - without your smartphone or computer. 
Android 6.0 OS will be running a Quad-core ARM Cortex-A17, 1.8GHz chip with 2GB DDR RAM.
ODIN Prototype Home Screenshot
Optical Projector
ODIN2's innovative LED light source generates 300 lumens of brightness with native HD resolution of 1280p x 720 and maximum resolution of 1080p; but is still efficient enough to connect to an external battery pack* and give you the portability to take it anywhere an electric socket is not readily available.  Moreover, ODIN’s LED light source will last over 30,000 hours or approximately 3.5 years of continuous play. 
From 1 yard away, ODIN’s optical beam can produce a 37” screen size, and a 110” screen size from 3 yards - allowing you to bypass the difficult setup and exorbitant cost of traditional home theatre systems.
ODIN2 Optical Lens + Auto Focus Camera
 
ODIN2 Connected to Battery Pack
* Requires 12V @ 3A or 19V @ 2A output external battery pack
Screen Sharing
While ODIN is a standalone device, you can also beam your phone screen to ODIN. This allows you to project content from all your iOS devices like iPhone and iPad, Android devices, and Windows computer.
Keystone Picture 
Keystone will be especially useful when ODIN2 is tilted at an angle. Due to physics, if a projector beam hits the surface at an angle, it will distort the image into a trapezoid shape. Having keystone function will readjust the picture to a rectangle. 
Keystone Correction
Auto Focus
We added an extra camera in front of ODIN2 to automate the picture focus without a manual mechanism.
Wide Angle Camera 
ODIN2 comes with an embedded wide-angle camera to allow for video calls using video apps like Skype and Google Hangouts. Unlike a smartphone, ODIN allows multiple people to gather around and be seen in a video call with your friends, family, or business . 
Microphone 
ODIN2 is equipped with microphones to pick up external sound, significantly increasing the number of voice apps compatible with the device. Microphones will enhance your experience when video calling through Skype, or using digital assistants like Google Now. 
Speaker
We are using a 23.8 mm diameter speaker with custom designed sound cavity to provide quality bass and sound.
Kickstand 
The ODIN series is the only smart projector line with a built-in kickstand to adjust the screen angle 90 degrees, so you can project all your content any way you like (we recommend tilting at 90º for a great ceiling projection!)

Tripod 
We received a lot of requests from our ODIN1 backers to be able to mount ODIN on a tripod, so we included this feature in our second version.

Internal Parts

Connectivity 
WiFi + Bluetooth
ODIN2 features a dual band 2.4Ghz and 5Ghz WiFi chip (802.11 b/g/n) to give you a more stable wireless connection for video streaming. You can also pair your bluetooth speakers, keyboard, mouse, presentation clicker, etc. via ODINs’s integrated Bluetooth 4.0 standard.
Memory 
ODIN2 comes with an internal 16GB memory space for you to save files, pictures and movies and access them directly from ODIN without connecting to the internet.  You can also connect your Dropbox or Google Drive storage apps onto ODIN to access all your entertainment and business files.

MicroSD | USB | HDMI | Headphone

We wanted to make it as easy as possible to showcase your GoPro videos by including a microSD card slot directly into ODIN. Now, it’s easy to share your experiences on the big screen with friends and family after a day of skiing, climbing, kayaking and more. 
ODIN2 comes with two USB 2.0 ports - you can attach your flash drive to access your files and attach accessories like your wired mouse and keyboard.  
You can also easily project and play video games on the big screen by connecting Xbox, Playstation, Nintendo and computers directly to ODIN’s HDCP compatible HDMI port.  ODIN2 also comes with a regular 3.5 mm TRRS headphone port.
Designing a digital world. 


Completely redesigned, we’ve made ODIN2 more beautiful, easy to use and intuitive.  Five-inch touch screen makes it easier to control and interact with ODIN2's Android operating system, thus we matched the touch screen width to the device's overall size dimension.  We also tilted the screen at a slight angle to make it easier to see when in use. 
"The overall shape was designed to be more slender and less obtrusive. The black top allows it to blend into the background when it is being used so it doesn't disrupt the viewing experience. The white underbelly is slightly recessed to protect and cover the front lens area." - Ed Mitchell
Early Design Sketch Concepts

Rewards
T-Shirt at $35
Designed by Brooklyn Artist, Michael Boswell
First Day Special at $425
One ODIN2 at our special 24 hour price. Grab one before it’s too late! First 24 hours Only.
Early Bird at $475
One ODIN2 at a discounted price for up to 3 days after launch! Up to 72 hours after launch time.
ODIN2 IndieGoGo Special at $525
One ODIN2 at an exclusive IndieGoGo price – approx. 20% off retail.
ODIN2 x 2 at $925
Two ODIN2 at an exclusive IndieGoGo price – approx. 30% off retail.
More use scenarios.
Stream Netlix, Hulu, HBO Now. Simple and Easy Set-Up
 
Connect ODIN2 to an Xbox or/ Playstation and experience game-play in completely new ways.
 
Connect to Keyboard, Mouse and Use Office 365 Apps for Productivity (via Bluetooth or USB Plug)
Our inspiration.
"Sometimes when a problem offers no apparent answers, the only solution is to radically alter the operating parameters. 
After being continuously frustrated with paying for cable service I wasn’t using, I decided to make the bold move to cancel my subscription. I was getting all my news and entertainment via the Internet and my mobile phone – watching cable shows on my television was something I rarely did. 
I decided to venture out and find a device that would meet my needs. I wanted a product that could handle all my viewing apps (Youtube, Netflix, Hulu, etc.) as well as something that would be as easy and intuitive to use as my smartphone. To my dismay, the only way I could achieve what I desired was hooking up my computer to a bulky projector (prone to inconvenient overheating) and separate, external speakers. 
Long story short, that search morphed into the initial idea for the creation of the Dos Owls ODIN – a multi-functional, portable visual display that solves a slew of A/V problems and opens the door to a limitless universe of content sharing possibilities. 
Necessity sparked invention and I haven’t looked back since."
- Alex Yoo, Founder
Why IndieGoGo? 
It’s thanks to the amazing backers from our successful campaign for ODIN1 back in 2014 that we were able to fund, expand, and bring this creative dream to life. Over 561 backers from over 37 countries supported ODIN1. We were amazed by the level of engagement and spirit of the global crowdfunding community. ODIN2 has been completely redesigned and re-engineered mostly based on feedback from our ODIN1 backers.
ODIN1 backers from around the world
 
Timeline 
After we complete our campaign in December 2016, we expect to ship ODIN2 in June 2017.

 
Dos Owls Team
ALEX YOO BIO - FOUNDER
Originally from the suburbs of Chicago and currently residing in Ditmas Park, Brooklyn, Alex Yoo earned his first professional experience in the fast-paced financial world of Wall Street. For five years, he plied his trade diligently at Houlihan Lokey, Nomura Securities and Tri Artisan Partners.
However, he soon grew restless with the repetitive PowerPoint presentations and Excel sheets, so he decided to make a change. His next venture came about as a matter of necessity. A habitual sharp dresser, he’d always had difficulty finding dress shirts that worked for his body frame. He took a bold risk and launched an online custom shirt company called Alexander West. He poured all his energy and resources into the business, and Alexander West is presently an established player in the NYC custom clothing market.
Alex’s newest project is a tech venture called Dos Owls. The idea stemmed from a desire to enjoy his Netflix /Hulu content on a more compact, multifunctional device. The first Dos Owls product is called ODIN, which has several distinct features including an Android processor, portable theater-like viewing, wireless connectivity, exceptional sound output and innovative design.

Marketing + Design Team

Ed Mitchell, Industrial Design
Quinn Shephard, Director + Writer 
Michael Boswell, Art and Graphic Design
Alex Daly, Marketing 
Theo Munch, Marketing
Will Russell, Marketing
Omar McFarlane, Marketing
Rachel de Leon, Customer Service
Andrew Zimbelman, Illustrator

Engineering Team

H Wang, Head Engineer
Y. Cheng, Mechanical Engineer 
J.B. Chen, Software 
R.H. Luo, Hardware 
L. He, Hardware
Y. Zhang, Production and Logistics  

 
Full specifications.
Optical Projector Technology

Brightness: 300 Lumens ANSI 
Light Source: LED w 30,000 Hours 
HD 1280 x 720 Native Resolution 
1080p Video Output Resolution 
Auto Focus 
Keystone Screen

story:
NB. Although we are a way from our fully funded target the first part of the eMag is almost complete, as such I'll gap fund the project leaving us on target for imminent release.  So take the opportunity to get your copies at the reduced rate shown here on the funding page.


Summary

We're looking to fund an e-book series looking at the technological achievement that is the W05.

NB. Although we are a way from our fully funded target the first part of the eMag is almost complete, as such I'll gap fund the project leaving us on target for imminent release.  So take the opportunity to get your copies at the reduced rate shown here on the funding page.

As technical analysts both myself (Matthew 'SomersF1' Somerfield) and Will Tyson will explore the technical nuances of the Championship winning W05.  Explaining why the car succeeded where others failed and what set it apart, creating a car that was clearly superior to their rivals.

We will harness not only our own expertise on the topic, including illustrations but also tap into a wealth of multimedia options. 

The team will provide us with exclusive interviews from pivotal personnel such as Paddy Lowe (Executive Director - Technical) and Andy Cowell (Managing Director - Mercedes AMG High Perfromance Powertrains) adding further insight into how the W05 was shaped.


What We Need & What You Get

The initial investment we are looking for covers the expenses.  Predominantly for the procurement of images and software for the conversion of the source material into eBook formats.

The project will be split up into 4 eBooks, to create a series that will focus on key areas, helping the reader to ascertain just where the teams advantage came from. 

The kickstarter offers a discounted purchase plan for the reader if they wish to purchase multiple parts at the start of the project, whereas retail prices will be upward of £5 per eBook.


The Impact

Dependent on the success of the project and feedback, we will also investigate the option of creating a hard copy for purchase. (Obviously this won't have the same multimedia presence though)

Furthermore the option to expand into the coverage of other Formula One machinery could be taken up based on the series' success.  For example I'm keen to pursue a series in which we expose the Championship winning cars of Red Bull 2010-2013.


When can I get it?..

We ideally want to have the first installment out and ready for download by Christmas (makes for a low cost present for the F1 fan out there). Each subsequent eBook in the series will follow a month later, owing to production time as although the framework is in place for most of the project it still needs time for meat to be put on the bones.

How you can help

Christmas is just around the corner funds may be a little tight at the moment, so if you can't purchase right away but support our campaign please help to get the word out.

Share the link to our page with your friends and colleagues or simply RT our posts on Twitter.

The eBooks will still be available down the line for those that don't get onboard initially.

story:
We have all suffered the embarrassment of a dead phone. The accusing looks of family and friends. That blank screen that leaves you helpless as you turn into an unfamiliar neighborhood with no map. That horrible feeling when you miss your flight, simply because your phone alarm did not go off as you forgot to plug it in last night. Why oh why, must our smartphones die?

Until there is a real breakthrough in battery technology, a portable charger might be the best solution. We developed amazing multifunctional device for you. With 6000mAh, our device’s elegant design makes it very comfortable to handle. There is USB and Micro USB ports, so it can charge two devices at once. You get a 23cm cable in the box with it. 

MOREOVER, it is not just a charger – it is a Gamepad!

Many of us moved from plastic cartridges and link cables to smartphones with console-level graphics and five-point multi-touch. However, even with games like Angry Birds and Fruit Ninja that make excellent use of the ever-expanding real estate of today’s HD smartphones, it is hard not to feel like we have taken a step backward as we strain to look past our own fingers in titles like Minecraft and Zenonia. Some games are just more fun with real analog sticks and a full gamut of triggers and buttons.

Games that require quick and accurate input – like racing games and first-person-shooters – feel completely different when played with our gamepad. Everything feels smoother and more responsive. Since you fingers are not covering half of the screen, the level of in-game immersion will be much higher.

For $49 you get a portable charger and Bluetooth gamepad, moreover you can add a mounting that holds your phone comfortably against the gamepad. 

Our aim is to gather the money for production of the first batch of 100 pieces of         gamepad chargers. 

To our first one hndred Indiegogo  supporters ONLY - we are offering our device for the manufactoring cost.                                                                                    

We are currently looking for partners and distributors
worldwide, if you are interested in our product, please do not hesitate to
contact us via email ipacman.info@gmail.com

Important Disclaimer: By submitting your contribution you agree that all questions and communication related to this project, contribution and transactions is to be directed to and handled by the project team ONLY (ipacman.info@gmail.com). You further agree that no other party is liable for the contributions or any communication. By sending your contribution it is legally binding that you have read and consent to this disclaimer. 


WE RECOMMEND

story:
Professional cameras have had smooth zoom control for a long time, but how about  mobile phones? Today mobile phones are used for the shooting of some commercial videos. But getting a quality, smooth zoom screen, by stretching your fingers while shooting, is almost impossible ... How to smoothly shoot a video where the objects came close and then smoothly zoom out during shooting? We designed the 4Pzoom just for this and more. This device is very comfortable to hold in your hand while shooting and make a smooth professional zoom by just turning the knob. An important feature is the two buttons on the handle to start recording video or  take still photos. Shoot video easily and professionally with the 4Pzoom! 

Zoom in-out smoothly like a professional!

"4Pzoom BASIC"

This device is very comfortable to hold in your hand while shooting and make a smooth professional zoom by just turning the knob. An important feature is the two buttons on the handle to start recording video or  take still pictures. 


"4Pzoom PRO"

Smooth zoom control, Power, style and purpose.

This device is very comfortable to hold in your hand while shooting and make a smooth professional zoom by just turning the knob. A built-in standby switch allows you to choose when you want to use the juice pack battery, or save some power for when you really need it. Durable and stylish, that greatly extends your time to shoot video and pictures.


"4Pzoom BUNDLE"

4Pzoom PRO model & mini tripod in one package.


The 4Pzoom will be produced in Hungary, Budapest (EU). Work in progress!

story:
Over the course of this week's party fandagos at our house, Cadie's Macbook Pro was decimated by liquid of one sort or another. It's cooked. And we all know the kind of pricetag we're talking about here. If you can, please chip in a few dollars to help cover the cost of repairs or replacement. It would be so appreciated.

Cadie is unaware of this campaign, so please share discretely (but frequently) among friends. Hopefully with enough numbers we can scrape up enough to help. Thank you so much.

story:
Pic #1: Current Cabled Foil system we are replacing: Lame is attached to body cord, body cord is attached to cable from reel (15 meters of cable), reel is attached to stationary 8 meters floor cord, floor cords connect to rear of Display.

Pic #2:  Current Cabled System we are replacing (Foil)

  

Pic #3: Cable-Less Foil system (dummy):  lame is unattached, short cables connect Bay Station to Display, no reels, no floor cords; in production elx will be under Foil guard, ie no cable to radio from Foils!


A.  Executive Summary

There is a worldwide unmet demand in the Fencing sport for a wireless method to display scoring, replacing the hampering cables and reels and body cords. In 2013 the Federation Internationale d'Escrime (FIE) issued the Wireless 2016 international Contest, for inventing, developing, & proving a working system.  The winner of the contest will receive an order for 1,000 systems.

SaEF Technologies has submitted two Proposals toward this Contest.  We are NOT basing this business venture on the presumption of winning the Contest.

As our two systems will satisfy the Fencing community's requirements, we shall request approval ("homologation") by the FIE, and offer systems for sale at a reasonable price.

A rough estimate of the worldwide market at saturation is $170,000,000.

B1.  Introduction & Team

Since the beginning of Electronically Scored Fencing in the 1950's, Fencers have had to live with electrical cords attached to and trailing behind their bodies, with spring operated reels attempting to keep up with body movements, and living with restrictions to formerly accepted actions such as “touch from behind back”, "touch from behind head",  and more.

Moreover, the very presence of electrical wires, connectors, contacts, and the like in the highly dynamic sport of fencing always causes constant problems with equipment breakdowns, spoiling the dynamics and enjoyment of the game.  There is no fencer on Earth that does not loathe the incessant problems caused by the wires, cords, and connectors.

For twenty years a method has been sought to create a wireless system.  To no avail.  Indeed three companies attempted to resolve the problem, but ran afoul of an electronic engineering hurdle that defeated them, namely the inherent absence of a physically closable circuit between the fencers, in other words the absence of a direct connection when using wireless.  A bypass to the problem by arbitrarily declaring both fencers' bodies to having the same electrical potential (ground), was found to be untrue, and causes the systems to fail.

Within a very few years, a good wireless system would sweep away the old cords-based technology.  Also open the sport to multitudes of potential fencers currently unable to afford the expensive and cumbersome equipment that is plagued by frequent breakdowns.

Team:

Mr Harry A. Shamir, Entrepreneur, M.E., Head Coach SaEF Fencing Clubs, a Mechanical Engineer with 40 yrs industry experience

Mr Larry Hill, Team Head of Engineering Consultants

Mr. George Boerger Esq., attorney, Fencer

Dr. Clifford Robbins, Senior Business Advisor, MA Small Business Development Ctr (MASBDC), www.CliffRobbinsSpeaks.com, crobbins@msbdc.umass.

Mr. Shamir's fencing students


Short Term Goals and Needs:

B2.  FIE Wireless 2016 Contest

In 2013 the Federation Internationale d'Escrime (FIE) issued the "Wireless 2016" international Contest, for inventing, developing, & proving a working system.  The winner of the contest will receive an order for 1,000 systems.

SaEF Technologies has submitted two Proposals toward this Contest, on Oct 26, 2013.  We are NOT basing this business venture on the presumption of winning the Contest, nor do we assume we shall win - though it would be very welcome indeed, and absolutely need to meet the April 14 deadline.    In any event we are confident to receive FIE Homologation (Approval) for our Cable-Less system, even if not winning the prize.

Note:  the original deadline for the first validation test of the proposed systems was expected to be at end of Oct. 2014.  On Feb 1, 2014 this was accelerated to April 14, 2014 !

The submitted proposals are for:

Cable-Less :  the SaEF Technologies' wireless product that eliminates all cables and cords and connectors, but retains the wires embedded in the Foil and Epee blades.

Wire-Free :  the SaEF Technologies' wireless product that also eliminates the wires embedded in the Foil and Epee blades. However, we do not have sufficient time to finish the work on this system for the Contest.

B8.  Immediate Goals

The Feb 2014 first goal is to create one Off-Strip Receiving Station connecting to any standard Display, and one prototype pair of Cable-Less Foils.  We will bring this system to multiple Fencing Clubs to get feedback from the customer base.  We will offer presale of equipment and systems at a 50% discount from the expected retail price.  Upon receipt of sufficient funds from presales and you! , the next milestones will be:

1.  Creation of Foil prototypes per the schedule and preparing for the "Wireless 2016" Contest tests, now updated from October to April 2014, yes, two months from now!!!

2.  Mid March:  same for Epee

3.  Late March:  same for Saber

4.  Use of all prototypes at all SaEF Fencing Clubs activities, to identify systems weaknesses

5.  Participate in the four Contest validation tests

6.  Receiving FIE homologation (approval)

7.  Contractually finalize a current oral agreement with another firm (non competing Fencing products), for mutual marketing and sales assistance

8.  Increased marketing activity to show off the prototypes at more Fencing Clubs

9.  Engineering the Cable-Less system for manufacturing versions, and identifying vendors

10.  Creation of 100 to 500 units of final product 

11.  Marketing and Sales of Cable-Less products

12.  R&D and Engineering of the wireless Wire-Free product line


B9.  Current Immediate Funding Requirements

  #1 thru #4 are estimated at $65,000;

  #5, #6  estimated at $ 20,000;

  #7, #8  estimated at $ 20,000;

Total $105,000, but we'll make do with whatever comes (within reason).


What You Get

Contributors will receive the choice of 

*   Cable-Less Equipment calculated at 50% discount from retail (up to half the contribution)

*   Equity (where up to $500,000 aggregate equity investment at this time will receive 20% ownership, prorated)

*   If in Mass South Shore, Fencing lessons based on each $2 contribution receiving $1 lesson

*   Lower level supporters will receive a token of appreciation, to be determined


What It Means

If we receive the funding, we will be the ONLY American company submitting a system for the Contest.  The others are all European. We do not know who else is submitting, but are certain there will be at least four.

Whether we win or not, our systems will be in the marketplace sooner or later.


The Impact Of SaEF Technologies On The Sport of Fencing.

To quote Dr. Robbins, this project promises to be an example of “Creative Destruction” of current business and activity levels.  In other words, an example of the step change that comes along every so often, that alters the landscape of the industry and many associated endeavors.

Consider:

  • Reduction in the cost of wireless electronic scoring, from $10,000 per system, to under $2000 
  • With Cable-Less, restoring the “feel” of the sport as it had been before the 1950’s, before the advent of electronic scoring with its vexing cables and wires
  • With Wire-Free, the elimination of the wires embedded in Foils and Epees as well as the wire-grooves in the Foil blades, leading to reduction in weight and blades'  crossection, increasing blades’ lightness and flexibility, and reducing the cost of manufacture
  • Potentially restoring the unity of the Fencing community, currently divided between the Classical and the Electronic sections
  • Adding many tens of thousands of people to the Fencing Sport community, stemming from the simplification and cost reductions of SaEF Technologies' products.
  • Potentially reducing the amount of social tension and low achievement in certain Middle and High Schools due to the current insufficiently available means to peacefully and safely release combative juices in the souls of our young people (adrenalin flow), a release enabled by Fencing
  • Potentially increasing the intellectual potential of our young people by training their brain to be more rapid and better at instant situational analysis with more speedy and appropriate response;  the same works with adults of all ages
  • Today many Universities offer Fencing as an official Athletic activity.  Others have Fencing Clubs organized by the students.  Some far-sighted US High Schools especially in N.J. also either sponsor Clubs or offer Fencing officially.  Should the required capital investment be reduced by the SaEF Technologies' equipment, to enable 1,000 additional US schools to offer Fencing or enable Fencing Clubs, the total number of competing Fencers in the US will rise by over 20-30,000 (currently about 20,000)!  The number of non-competing Fencers will also rise, at the expected ratio of 5-10 to 1 vs competing fencers, to perhaps 100,000-300,000.  All would use SaEF equipment!
  • Add Europe to the equation, and the numbers increase exponentially
  • Add Asia to the equation, for Asian Fencing (not European), and completely new markets open, as well as branches of the sport
  • Add the Elementary grades 3 thru 8 which could also be served by the SaEF improvements, and we get several thousand more schools and students.   BTW, Mr Shamir’s MA South Shore SaEF Fencing Clubs offers SabreK today for the 8-10 age group, with substantial success.
  • In other words, the adoption of SaEF technologies may multiply the Fencing Sport market several fold, expanding the business horizon by many, many $ Millions.
  • IMPORTANTLY:  the release into the marketplace of many hundreds, perhaps thousands, of old but serviceable cable & reel systems.  These could be donated to schools in third world countries, to enhance local expansion of the sport.

Basically, we need your Help, NOW!
story_txt:
Pic #1: Current Cabled Foil system we are replacing: Lame is attached to body cord, body cord is attached to cable from reel (15 meters of cable), reel is attached to stationary 8 meters floor cord, floor cords connect to rear of Display.Pic #2:  Current Cabled System we are replacing (Foil)  Pic #3: Cable-Less Foil system (dummy):  lame is unattached, short cables connect Bay Station to Display, no reels, no floor cords; in production elx will be under Foil guard, ie no cable to radio from Foils!A.  Executive Summary
There is a worldwide
unmet demand in the Fencing sport for a wireless method to
display scoring, replacing the hampering cables and reels and body cords. In 2013 the Federation Internationale
d'Escrime (FIE) issued the Wireless 2016 international Contest, for inventing, developing, & proving a working system.  The winner of the contest will receive an
order for 1,000 systems.
SaEF Technologies has
submitted two Proposals toward this Contest. 
We are NOT basing this business venture on the presumption of winning
the Contest.
As our two systems will
satisfy the Fencing community's requirements, we shall request approval ("homologation") by the FIE, and offer systems for sale
at a reasonable price.
A rough estimate of the
worldwide market at saturation is $170,000,000.B1.  Introduction & Team
Since the beginning of
Electronically Scored Fencing in the 1950's, Fencers have had to live with
electrical cords attached to and trailing behind their bodies, with spring operated
reels attempting to keep up with body movements, and living with restrictions
to formerly accepted actions such as “touch from behind back”, "touch from
behind head",  and more.
Moreover, the very
presence of electrical wires, connectors, contacts, and the like in the highly
dynamic sport of fencing always causes constant problems with equipment breakdowns, spoiling the dynamics and enjoyment of the
game.  There is no fencer on Earth that
does not loathe the incessant problems caused by the wires, cords, and connectors.
For twenty years a method
has been sought to create a wireless system.  To no avail. 
Indeed three companies attempted to resolve the problem, but ran afoul
of an electronic engineering hurdle that defeated them, namely the inherent absence
of a physically closable circuit between the fencers, in other words the absence of a
direct connection when using wireless.  A
bypass to the problem by arbitrarily declaring both fencers' bodies to having
the same electrical potential (ground), was found to be untrue, and causes the systems
to fail.
Within a very few years, a
good wireless system would sweep away the old cords-based technology.  Also open the sport to multitudes of potential fencers currently unable to afford the
expensive and cumbersome equipment that is plagued by frequent
breakdowns.Team:Mr
Harry A. Shamir, Entrepreneur, M.E., Head Coach SaEF Fencing Clubs, a Mechanical Engineer with 40 yrs industry experienceMr
Larry Hill, Team Head of Engineering Consultants
Mr.
George Boerger Esq., attorney, Fencer
Dr. Clifford Robbins, Senior Business Advisor, MA Small Business Development Ctr (MASBDC), www.CliffRobbinsSpeaks.com, crobbins@msbdc.umass.
Mr. Shamir's fencing

story:
Hi friends

Thank you for your appreciation of GREAT.

We will start to ship GTEAR, and we would like to ask you about the color you preferred. The available colors are as follows: Gray / white / pink / light aqua. Even if you you’ve selected before, please tell us again. We want to make a confirmation. As international shipping company requested，we need your cellphone number or just a phone number that we can contact with you.

After delivery, we will send the tracking number to you by mail.

这是非常常见的耳机很容易地从我们的耳朵掉下来，耳机这种连续脱落给我们带来了很大的不便。例如：

  • 当我们运行和听音乐的介绍你自己和你的背景，我们总是把我们的EarPods回从其连续脱落。
  • 当我们乘坐的音乐在自行车上，我们一定要注意，重新穿我们的EarPods。
  • 我们日常的身体运动时，我们的EarPods可能会掉下来。

一旦我们把EarPods，我们必须谨慎，我们的行动会受到限制

 

 

 

GTEAR是要改善这个问题

 

你的耳朵和EarPods的完美匹配与GTEAR的帮助

穿着GTEAR，EarPods将在我们的耳道稳步所以我们不必担心EarPods了。这种舒适穿着GTEAR后不仅在做运动，也在我们的静物的任何单一的时刻。

 

 

 

  • GTEAR是我们的产品（不包括EarPods）。
  • GTEAR适合了与iPhone 5，5C，5S，6，6Plus，6s，6sPlus，7，7Plus  ,iPod nano（第7代），iPod touch（第5代或更新版本）或苹果EarPod型号MD827ZM / A只提供了苹果电脑公司EarPods™。
  • 苹果电脑公司，EarPods™是苹果公司的商标。

 

 

设计过程

在近一年中，我们在许多不同的方式做了一些研究，我们发现，由于EarPods的单一固定的大小，对于很多用户来说，仍有一定的空间耳道，穿着他们EarPods之间离开了。它仅仅是剩余的空间，使定脱落的耳机。当我们发现了问题，我们就开始寻找解决方案的工作。起初，我们把AB胶放入剩余空间。加入AB胶后，EarPods是相对稳定的。

 

之后，当胶带的形状，我们用其制成的三维扫描。这样一来，我们当中有200人收集不同的耳道的数据。收集和分析的数据之后，我们设计了一个符合人体工程学的产品。

 

详情关于GTEAR

GTEAR采用耐用的材料分层梳理的强度，韧性和弹性。黑色部分是由柔软的材料制成，而白色部分是硬塑料制成的。 
GTEAR的每包有三种尺寸和各种规模可以在EarPods进行小幅调整。黑色部分的软质材料符合人体工程学允许GTEAR稍微改变其形状，以适合您的耳道。通过这种方式，可以GTEAR更适合不同的耳朵，你的耳朵，EarPods将不得不通过GTEAR完美匹配。

 

 

 

 

 

  • GTEAR有三种尺寸：L / M / S和GTEAR的每包包括三种尺寸。

 

  • 微调： GTEAR的网格是您的最佳选择调整EarPods到你的耳朵，也完全适合EarPods的空白区域。

 

 

 
  • 舒适：人体工程学设计，黑色部分的软材料


 

  • 四色

Eenvironment

 

在开始这个项目之前，我问自己一个简单的问题：我怎么能提高EarPods的脱落？我应该买另一种更稳定的耳机？ 

没有！在苹果公司为我提供了几个Earpods，我不能只是把它们扔掉。我们改变我们的电子产品频繁，这带来危害我们的星球。  

根据联合国的研究报告，全球制造电子垃圾高达起球，这是去年的4180万吨，但只有15％的回收，这是只有6.5万吨，回收利用。

报告全文全球电子废物显示器2014年 - 数量，流量和资源（2.4 MB PDF）

 

 

这是令人兴奋的为我们设计的附件，使Earpods完美的，而不是放弃它。现在我们的整个项目已准备就绪。我们希望，我们可以通过众筹获得更多的订单，通过这种方式，我们可以降低单位价格达到一个合理的价格。我们需要您的支持和推动，使大规模生产GTEAR的可能。

世界各地的电子废弃物的数量将上升20％在2018年，也就是5000万吨，这是由于增加电子设备的销售，缩短了电子产品的使用寿命。

电子产品的迅速发展和更新使他们有一个短暂的寿命。而且，因为它们是难以回收，它的威胁我们的环境，但它不可能停止发展。下面的方法有一些可行的方法来缓解这个问题。

 

 

扔掉或回收一个EarPods是不够的伤害或改善环境。当数以百万计EarPods数万在一起，情况则相反。你的行为使这个项目更有意义。

story:
A-case is the name of a series of unique, very light and solid cases for storing, protecting and transporting your miniature armies. Built from unconventional, exceptionally light and solid materials, they provide ongoing protection, and – most importantly - due to magnetic or sticky shelves, they make transporting your army much easier and markedly shorten the time needed to prepare yourself for each battle.


At last but not at least we would like to thank for your attention and trust in us. You are AWESOME!

We would like also to thank many people practically all over the world that have helped us by this project. Thanks to their advice and experiences we can avoid many mistakes
story_txt:

Built from unconventional, exceptionally light and solid materials, they provide ongoing protection, and – most importantly - due to magnetic or sticky shelves, they make transporting your army much easier and markedly shorten the time needed to prepare yourself for each battle.



























 


















At last but not at least we would like to thank for your attention and trust in us. You are AWESOME!
We would like also to thank many people practically all over the world that have helped us by this project. Thanks to their advice and experiences we can avoid many mistakes

story:
UBIK UNO's beautiful design, great display, solid performance, and unbeatable price will make it among the top smartphones available to consumers.

On TechnoBuffalo:


On CNET:

In The Media:

“Design by mob rule: Ubik's Uno is quite literally the phone you asked for.” – Digital Trends 

“The 5.5-inch Android phone is the first in a series, with a Kickstarter campaign up now and dreams of more features to come based on what community feedback demands.” - CNET 

“The UBIK UNO has all of the makings of a winner.” - TechRadar 

“Ubik's quest to build your dream Android phone starts with the Uno”    – The Verge 

“There can be only Uno: This Android phone is one of the best bargains of 2015” – Digital Trends 

“UBIK UNO is a highly affordable high-end smartphone” – Trusted Reviews


We want to cut the middleman.
UBIK UNO is simply one of the most exciting pieces of hardware we’ve seen in a long time.

Let's face it smartphones are OVER PRICED! Too much money is spent on marketing and advertising by big corporations. The consumer ends up paying for a pricier smartphone because of this, and buying a flagship phone is nearly impossible without committing to a yearly contract. 

For the first time ever UBIK is introducing an affordable no bezel flagship smartphone, with no strings attached. 

UBIK UNO's Retail Price (If the campaign is funded): $320



As of this moment, UBIK UNO is looking like the best Android Smartphone you'll be able to buy for the foreseeable future.



The UBIK UNO's camera takes amazing pictures even in low light conditions. Shoot anytime, anywhere for bright, sharp photos. Our camera boasts 6 physical lenses. Your photos will be more precise and detailed without suffering from distortion often caused by lower apertures. It also includes a 5 MegaPixel front camera with fixed focus.


Android Lollipop 5.1 has power for the long haul with a battery saver feature that extends life of it. And now it's easier to manage your power usage - see the estimated time left before you need to charge, and when you're charging, approximately how much time until it's topped up and ready to go.

4K (4096 x 2160) video footage at 30 fps, Full HD 1080p video at 60 fps, and HD 720p footage at 120 fps for creating slow-motion videos


But wait there's more :-) 

Fastest CPU in the market: 64-bit True Octa-core 2.2GHz Speed 3GB of Ram with a 933 Mhz Speed ARM Cortex-A53 Uses HMP Technology (Heteroneneus Multi-Processing) This means the processor can choose to utilize all of its cores at same time, or just a single core. This provides powerful performance and an increase in battery life. 

UBIK is here to offer you the first Open Source Brand.

- We have years of experience in the mobile business and are confident we can deliver the best product with the best quality at an affordable price.

- There is no need to buy an overpriced smartphone to get the best specs available. With UBIK UNO, you've got it all!

- Because at UBIK, we will create a community. UBIK is more than a phone, and you are more than just a Customer.

- The UBIK UNO's sleek design boasts a bezeless side to side screen with an aluminum frame. The UBIK UNO is not only affordable but also beautiful.

- We use Stock Android (5.1) which means you get the full Android experience with no bloatware.

- Because we are ready for production. The UBIK UNO is no longer a dream, It’s a reality!


“Our mission is to assign every function a price, so the community can choose what they like and build their own phone” - UBIK UNO.

UBIK UNO is just the beginning, it is much more than a mobile device. Our project is just the start of something much bigger, and our Backers can take part of this great experience that is our community.

The community is a key element of the UBIK Project, together we will create a real OPEN SOURCE BRAND, building the next generation of the UBIK mobile LINEUP.

Through forums, blogs and polls, everyone in the community can share ideas and input based on prior or current mobile device experience, wishes and even their dream device. With this we will have a continuous improvement of both our software and our hardware. Everyone’s voice will be heard (MAJORITY RULES). When many BIG brands have failed to listen to their users, The UBIK is committed to its community.

UBIK MOBILE is a product of an international team of engineers with 15 years of experience creating cell phones all around the world with passion and talent to give you the highest technology, made according to your needs. UBIK's team idea is to build on your experience and suggestions to make the necessary changes that let us remain the best product in the market. That means "UBIK WILL WORK VERY CLOSE TO YOU" UBIK is a community tailored cell phone brand and our users are going to be involved in the development design and pricing of our next product.

  • Why Ubik 

 With your help UBIK UNO is about to become a reality and start mass production! That's the reason why we are Launching this project on INDIEGOGO. We want this campaign to be the starting point for UBIK as well as to become the seed of our "Community". YES! A Community... a group of supporters with a voice... with bright and new ideas... whom will be part of UBIK, a breakthrough in Open Source Brand! BE PART OF UBIK!!

  • How can I get a UBIK UNO? 

You can reserve your UBIK UNO during the forty five (45) days Indiegogo Campaign at a lower price (compared to Retail Pricing). Once Indiegogo Campaign is over and Production starts in full, we will start pre-selling UNO through our UBIK Mobile website (www.UbikMobile.com). 

  • What is going to happen after Indiegogo campaign ends? 

Immediately after we finish our Indiegogo Campaign we will start production of our Flagship model... UBIK UNO! the most advanced mobile device in the market today. 

  • Ubik is going to use Invitation system? 

No, we are NOT going to use an INVITATION SYSTEM... Our aim is to create a community that is open to everyone who likes to be at the cutting edge of technology. 

  • How much will shipping cost, and how long will it take? 

There is only one shipping option, however terms and timetables will vary depending on the State. Also we are starting the delivery in Backers order. After Indiegogo campaign and pre-sales ends you will be able to choose the alternative that better suits your delivery needs. 

  • Is the phone unlocked? 

YES, UBIK UNO is a fully unlocked mobile device (3G, 4G & LTE) and ready to connect with most carriers in the United States and Canada. You just open your box, insert your sim card in the UNO, turn on the device and "Voila"! We must clarify however that carriers like Sprint and Verizon run their 4G networks on a CDMA band. Consequently, UBIK UNO's 4G connectivity might not work for Verizon and Sprint and in such case the data will run on 3G. 

  • In what countries I can use the UBIK UNO? 

The UBIK UNO is fully unlocked and will work great in many countries and carriers. The UBIK UNO's 2G and 3G bands will work with most GSM carriers. Please refer to our spec sheet and frequency list to make sure that it is compatible with your carrier.

  • Is the UBIK UNO going to work outside USA and Canada? 

YES, for users within the United States and Canada connected to any major or rural carriers within the area, UBIK UNO is ready and enabled to support the roaming networks per the service provider’s prevailing roaming agreements. Can I purchase UBIK UNO for Europe and Latin America countries? YES, UBIK UNO 2G and 3G bands will work and perform perfectly in any country with a GSM signal. In regards to UBIK UNO LTE capacity, for countries outside the United States and Canada, it will depend solely on the country, service provider and LTE bands available.

  • What are the size dimensions and weight?

Dimensions: 153x73.6x8.7

Weight: Weight: 170gr Aprox.

  • Which 2G/3G/4G-LTE Bands are supported? 

Ubik UNO will support:

Bands (Mhz) 2G-GSM: 850/900/1800/1900

Bands (Mhz) 3G: 850/1700/1900

Bands (Mhz) 4G-LTE: 2(1900)/4(1700)/7(2600)/17(700)

Basically, UBIK’s MTK solution can support up to 4 LTE bands at the same time. Here are some specs of different carriers: 

AT&T LTE: Band 2/4/17 

T-Mobile LTE: Band 2/4/12 

Verizon LTE: Band 2/4/13 Band 7 is one of the main LTE FDD frequencies in Canada (Bell, Rogers) and Latin America, which improves the overall performance of the phone while roaming.

  • What is UBIK's CPU?

GPU in MT6795 CPU : Imagination’s PowerVR series 6 (Rogue) G6200 at 700MHz

  • How is UBIK going to involve the community in further models launch? 

UBIK is more than a Mobile Device, UBIK is a Community, and like such, Communication is key. We want to be an interactive Community, we want to hear our Community, through Polls, Chats, Blogs, Open Forums, etc. We are committed to an open communication on a daily basis with our community and through this all of you will know what our next projects are and are invited to take part. 

  • When will accessories be available and how much will they cost? 

We are currently working on accessories for your UBIK UNO! We will be updating our backers with our accessory line and special promotions. Stay tuned!

  • What is the warranty and return policy for UBIK UNO? 

UBIK will offer a one year warranty on manufacture damages or defects along with a 24 hour customer support service via our 1-800 number. 

UBIK UNO's Retail Price (If the campaign is funded): $320

Risks and challenges

Like in any other new endeavor, there are risks and challenges and UBIK is not the exception. We know the business and we accept the challenge! Some might see us as the “New Players” in the mobile arena yet we are a group with more than 15 years of experience in the handset distribution and manufacturing field. 

We have an experienced and dedicated team with offices in Korea, China and the United States committed to bring users the most reliable, high quality and elegant mobile device in the market today. For the past year our researchers, designers and head of manufacturing have been working relentlessly with one goal in mind, the development of UBIK UNO. We are now ready! Each phase of every aspect of production is ready to start once we reach our funding.

story:
The latest in technological innovation in projectors portable video, with a variety of features such as music player, video, exhibitor presentations also shares photos in HD, and all this can be done almost anywhere and comfort of carrying everywhere thanks to its compact design that allows our SlimPro fits easily into a pocket.



INTERFACE


Because Slim pro?

One day when I was at my place of study (Complutense University of Madrid) I prepared, together with colleagues, for presentation of a work concerning the influence of Roman history in Spain. I remember that this work was group and we all had to agree to develop in the best way the presentation.

Without further ado develop work, but possessed a big problem, we could see the presentation on a screen of acceptable size, because we all had phones with small screens and also had no access to television, we could see the results of our hard work of research.

Between talks and jokes, my colleague (Johan) and I began to discuss the problem, (which was very recurrent among college students) and we wonder why the hell there is no projector audio and video that can bring in the pocket?

At that time we decided (Jonah and I) to develop a video projector capable carried in a pocket ...


Package Details

  • Handheld Projector with MP4 Player
  • CD (Manual + Drive)
  • USB Cable
  • Charging Adapter
  • Earphones
  • Manual (English)



some history


We are infinitely grateful to our families, because we always believed in us ...



Our great stroke of luck was when we had the opportunity to attend the 2015 CES technology fair, thanks to this, we had the fortune to meet Mehmet and Cheng, recently graduated from Jinwen UNIVERSITY OF SCIENCE AND TECHNOLOGY.

Talking about the technological innovations of the fair we reached the topic of our project (SlimPro) and at that time we proposed to the Asian couple, the idea of a cooperative alliance project development and they bluntly accepted the idea.

At first we started developing several prototypes, prototypes that were basically little ergonomic and also impractical, this due to its large size, our goal was to develop a projector clear enough guy to be able to be carried in a pocket.

After several prototypes already met SlimPro light.







Legal Disclaimer

"Delivery of rewards/perks are subject to best efforts and not guaranteed."



FAQ - Frequently Asked Questions


  • Can I project images onto a wall or do I need a special screen? 
    You can project images just about anywhere. A white wall will work best. A white screen is not necessary but can be used.


  • How bright is this projector?
    Bright enough to use under normal indoor lighting conditions. However, it is recommended to get the room as dark as possible for the best user experience.


  • Can I charge the projector and have it play at the same time? 
    Yes, you will can charge it through the charging adapter while use it at the same time.


  • I can connect the projector to an audio amplifier?
    if you can connect to an amplifier with 3.5 audio jack connection.


  • SLIMPRO supports1080 HD definition?
    if this definition is compatible


  • Which it is the maximum carrying capacity of the micro SD memory supports SlimPro?
    micro SD memory up to 8GB


  • Can you adjust the focal length?
    Yes, you can through the adjustment buttons found on our device SlimPro


  • The device is fully developed?
    The device was developed by 95%, are working hard to improve the quality of the device
